product.name: Wave Candlestick - Small
product.description: The Wave Candlestick combines traditional craft production with a contemporary design sensibility. Hand-turned by artisans in Jaipur, India and designed by Michael Dreeben for AKMD, the Wave Candlestick mimics the undulating curves of sine waves. Each candlestick is made from repurposed, sustainably-harvested Mango wood— a native tree to India— and is burned and oil finished. A weighted base secures its stability. Available in two sizes: small (12" height) and large (16" height). Sold individually.

product.name: Wave Candlestick - Large
product.description: The Wave Candlestick combines traditional craft production with a contemporary design sensibility. product.name: VP1 FlowerPot Lamp - Yellow
product.description: Created by 20th-century Danish designer Verner Panton, the Flowerpot VP1 lamp is a stellar example of mid-century design. Designed in 1969, the ceiling-mount Flowerpot lamp takes its inspiration from the sunny '60s and is comprised of a pair of nesting spheres. A smaller sphere discreetly hides the bulb and is protected by the larger dome, both made from vibrant lacquered steel with a color-matched fabric cord. Available in yellow, white, orange, red, turquoise, green, light grey, black, blue, light blue and stainless steel.

product.name: VP4 Flowerpot Table Lamp - Yellow
product.description: Inspired by the spirit of the 1960s, Danish designer Verner Panton's Flowerpot VP4 Table Lamp is an testament to the enduring power of mid-century design. Its distinctive spherical shape telegraphs modernist style while precision engineering creates perfectly diffused light sure to brighten any room. Made of spun lacquered aluminum in vibrant shades of yellow, white, red, green black and chrome with matching fabric cords and chrome tubular supports.

product.name: VP6 Topan Pendant Light - Yellow
product.description: Originally designed for Norway's Astoria restaurant and hotel in Trondheim, the Topan VP6 lamp is the first mass-produced lamp created by mid-century Danish designer Verner Panton. This simple ceiling-mount lamp evokes the design values of the early 1960s with clean lines and bold color variations. Made from spun aluminum with a glossy lacquered finish and color-coordinated fabric cord. Provides both direct and ambient light.

product.name: Spinning BH2 Pendant Light- White
product.description: The kinetic shape of a spinning top inspires this joyous creation by British designer Benjamin Hubert. Its pure and simple lines are rendered in smooth lacquered aluminum and paired with a matching color cord. Available in white, purple, black and dark grey matte. Batteries not included.

product.name: Full Circle Vision Globe - Almond/Metallic Grey
product.description: Tecnodidattica Ligure has been producing some of the world’s finest globes for more than half a century. Among them is its collection of Atmosphere globes, conceived by revered Danish designers Claus Jensen and Henrik Holbaek. Each meticulously detailed globe is blown much like glass and assembled by gifted craftsmen in Italy. Available in almond/metallic grey, amethyst/metallic grey, black/metallic grey, mint/metallic grey, and silver/metallic silver.

product.name: Braun Analog Watch - BN-32 - Black Face, Black Band
product.description: More than a quarter century after their creation, Braun’s classic timepieces remain as stylish and sought-after as ever. Emphasizing simple usability and clean, modern lines, the BN0032 Men's analog watch is a revelation of form and function. Features 3-hand quartz movement with date and leather band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Analog Watch - BN-32 - Black Face, Black Mesh Band
product.description: More than a quarter century after their creation, Braun’s classic timepieces remain as stylish and sought-after as ever. Emphasizing simple usability and clean, modern lines, the BN0032 Men's analog watch is a revelation of form and function. Features 3-hand quartz movement with date and leather band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Analog Watch - BN-32 - White Face, Stainless Steel Mesh Band
product.description: More than a quarter century after their creation, Braun’s classic timepieces remain as stylish and sought-after as ever. Emphasizing simple usability and clean, modern lines, the BN0032 Men's analog watch is a revelation of form and function. Features 3-hand quartz movement with date and leather band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Analog Chronograph Watch - BN-35 - Black Face, Black Band
product.description: Renowned designer Dieter Rams, who built his reputation at Braun, once said, “Good design is thorough down to the last detail.” This re-issue of Braun’s classic BN0035 Men's analog chronograph is a testament to that philosophy. Every detail—from the contrasting minute and second hands to the unfussy styling of the dial—is considered. Available with black face with black band or white face with black band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Analog Chronograph Watch - BN-35 - White Face, Black Band
product.description: Renowned designer Dieter Rams, who built his reputation at Braun, once said, “Good design is thorough down to the last detail.” This re-issue of Braun’s classic BN0035 Men's analog chronograph is a testament to that philosophy. Every detail—from the contrasting minute and second hands to the unfussy styling of the dial—is considered. Available with black face with black band or white face with black band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Square Analog Watch - BN-42 - Black Case, Black Face, Black Band
product.description: Braun’s Square Analog Watch has a retro look that is inspired by Braun’s classic designs. The square face has a typical analog display with a slight twist—instead of featuring an hour dial with numbers one through twelve, the watch has minute indicators, in intervals of five. The face also features ticks in between numerals for in-between minutes, as well as a calendar date indicator. The monochrome leather band, face, and case of the watch create a modern, minimalist aesthetic, making this accessory blend in with a wardrobe for every occasion, from jeans and t-shirts to more formal suiting.

variants.color: black case, black face, black band

product.name: Braun Square Analog Watch - BN-42 - Stainless Steel Case, Grey Face, Grey Band

product.name: Braun Women's Analog Watch - BN-21 - Black Face, Black Band
product.description: Inspired by Dieter Rams and Dietrich Lubs clean, modern designs, the Braun Ladies' Analog Watch is a recent reissue and a testament to the lasting power of great design. Features a black face with yellow second-hand, matte stainless steel case and black leather band. Water resistant up to 150-feet.

product.name: Braun Women's Analog Watch - BN-21 - White Face, White Band
product.description: Back in production since 2011, Braun has reissued classic timepieces and clocks inspired by Dieter Rams and Dietrich Lubs. The Braun Ladies' Analog Watch features a white face with yellow second-hand and stainless steel mesh band. Water resistant up to 150-feet.

product.name: Braun Swatch Clock - BNC-2 - White
product.description: One of Braun's most recognizable designs, the Braun Travel Alarm Clock is designed after Dietrich Lubs and Dieter Rams iconic 1994 version, the AB1A. With silent German movement, crescendo alarm and easy to read analog face in a matte black, grey, or white finish. Battery included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Braun Voice-Activated Clock - BNC-4 - White
product.description: A newly-editioned reissue of Dietrich Lubs and Dieter Rams' 1990 alarm clock, the AB30. The Braun Voice-Activated Alarm Clock features silent German precision quartz movement for reliable accuracy, and a crescendo alarm. The snooze function is voice- or clap-activated, or controlled by a pop up switch. Battery included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Braun Travel Alarm Clock - BNC-5 - Black
product.description: Braun's legendary travel alarm clocks are back in production after a too-long hiatus. The Braun Flip Cover Travel Alarm Clock features silent German precision quartz movement, a torch light and the iconic easy to read dial. A crescendo alarm has built in volume control and a motion activated snooze function. The flip cover interior details a world time zone map making it ideal for travel. Battery included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Braun Round Wall Clock - BNC-6 - Black
product.description: A newly-licensed edition based on Dietrich Lubs' 1987 design, the ABW31 wall clock. The Braun Round Wall Clock is a minimal statement with easily legible numbers that can be viewed clearly, even from far away. With silent German, precision quartz movement. Battery included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock - BNC-10 - Black
product.description: Designed in 2012 by Markus Orthey, the Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock maintains the integrity of Braun's legendary design ethic while incorporating the latest digital technologies. Sleek rounded corners and a blue LED back light lend a contemporary aesthetic while functions like a six-station AM/FM preset, both search and manual tuning options and snooze feature add convenience.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock - BNC-10 - Black with AC Adaptor
product.description: Designed in 2012 by Markus Orthey, the Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock maintains the integrity of Braun's legendary design ethic while incorporating the latest digital technologies. product.name: Attesa Waste Basket - Black
product.description: Designed by Enzo Mari in 1971, the In Attesa Wastepaper Basket is made of superior-quality, injection-moulded polypropaline. Uniquely angled for convenient use, the Wastepaper Basket is as easy on the eye as it is to use. Made in Italy.

product.name: Trapeze LED Task Lamp - Large - Charcoal
product.description: Designed by Peter Stathis with both home and office in mind, the Trapeze LED Lamp combines a bold, minimal form with innovative functionality. A 360-degree head rotation allows the Trapeze to bring light to any part of a room, stylishly aided by the double jointed arm featured on this larger model. The exterior— crafted from aluminum, iron, steel, and medical grade ABS— allows for a sturdy, light build, and an elegant user experience.

product.description: Designed by Peter Stathis with both home and office in mind, the Trapeze LED Lamp combines a bold, minimal form with innovative functionality. product.name: Trapeze LED Task Lamp - Small - Charcoal
product.description: Designed by Peter Stathis to complement either the home or office environment, the Trapeze LED Lamp is elegant in its functionality. A 360-degree head rotation and adjustable joint allow for spot placement of light in any space while its sturdy construction of aluminum, iron, steel, and medical grade ABS creates seamless movement.

product.name: SR1 Bulb Pendant Light
product.description: Created by Danish light designer Sofie Refer for &Tradition, the SR1 Bulb Lamp traces the form of a traditional incandescent bulb in thick, transparent, mouth-blown glass. An expression of Scandanavian simplicity, the SR1 Bulb is rendered in entirely translucent materials––from shade to bulb to cord––allowing for maximum light dispersion and glow. Naturally occurring irregularities in the handmade blown glass contribute to each piece’s unique character.

product.name: SR2 Mega Bulb Pendant Light
product.description: Mega Bulb, created by Sofie Reder (winner of the Wallpaper Design Award for Best Light 2006), mimics the outline of an early electrical light bulb. Crafted from mouth-blown glass and porcelain, the design of Mega Bulb is entirely transparent: lampshade, bulb and cord are clear allowing for light to pass through. The large bulb size is perfectly suited for lighting large interior spaces while the minimal Danish design imparts subtle sophistication and warmth.

product.name: Albers Nesting Tables
product.description: Bauhaus member and modernist pioneer Josef Albers designed an original set of stepped nesting side tables in 1926 for a family’s apartment in Berlin. Here they are exquisitely reproduced in solid oak and MDF topped with lacquered glass tops in sumptuous shades of green, yellow, orange and blue.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Braun ET66 Calculator
product.description: When it originally debuted in 1987, Braun’s iconic ET66 helped elevate the calculator to an everyday personal item. Its sleek styling, slim plastic casing and approachable interface were the masterstroke of influential German designer Dieter Rams and his partner at Braun, Dietrich Lubs. Here the ET66 eight-digit calculator is faithfully reproduced, down to the inviting round buttons and high-contrast palette of its number and function buttons. Slip-off case and battery included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Braun Analog Watch - BN-21
product.description: The re-issued Braun BN0021 analog watch pays tribute to the genius of German designers Dieter Rams and Dietrich Lubs, who created many of Braun’s iconic products in the 20th century. Marking a return to purity and simplicity, the BN0021 is a triumph of minimalist design. All of the elements—from its unadorned dial to the matte stainless steel casing—are stripped down to the essential. Features 3-hand quartz movement and a black leather band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Analog Watch - BN-24
product.description: Braun’s decision to re-issue its classic wristwatch collection is a testament to the company’s enduring influence in the design world. The unisex BN0024 analog watch is a prime example of its signature, understated look, striking the perfect balance of functionality and sleek sophistication. Features 2-hand quartz movement and a black leather band. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Digital LCD Watch - BN-36
product.description: Braun has re-issued its classic wristwatch line, including many LCD watches from the 1970s, paying homage to seminal design team Dieter Rams and Dietrich Lubs. Their innovative use of technology continues to influence industrial and product designers worldwide. The BN0036 Men's LCD watch is radio-controlled, ensuring maximum accuracy, and its EL back-lit face makes it easy to read. Features scratch resistant mineral glass and a 2-year warranty. Water resistant to 150 ft.

product.name: Braun Digital LED Watch - BN-76
product.description: A reissue of a classic Dieter Rams and Dietrich Lubs inspired design, the Braun Men's Square Stainless Steel Digital Watch is as refreshingly modern today as when it was first introduced to the market over thirty years ago. The square digital face features a LED backlit digital display encased by a matte stainless steel finish and textured black leather band.

product.name: Braun Digital LED Watch - BN-106
product.description: Part of the Braun Prestige line, this German-made digital watch features a LED backlit liquid crystal display and scratch-resistant glass and comes complete with the Braun patented EasySkroll v2.0 operating system, a 100-year perpetual calendar and countdown function. Water resistant up to 150 feet. Available in black-plated stainless steel or matte finish stainless steel with either stainless steel bracelet or rubber strap. Recipient of the Red Dot Award for Product Design in 2011.

product.name: Braun Women's Analog Watch - BN-31 - White Face, Mesh Band
product.description: Back in production since 2011, Braun has reissued classic timepieces and clocks inspired by Dieter Rams and Dietrich Lubs. The Braun Ladies' Analog Watch features a white face with yellow second-hand and stainless steel mesh band. Water resistant up to 150-feet.

product.name: Peter Maly Two-Piece Andirons
product.description: “I like working with clear, geometric forms: for me, they are the essential condition of their longevity,” notes designer Peter Maly. In his two-piece set of andirons, his sentiment is made visible. Distilling the form to its most fundamental, Peter Maly’s andirons are minimal and clean. Made in Germany from stainless steel.

product.name: Peter Maly Wall-Mounted Fireplace Tools
product.description: Peter Maly’s fireside tool set started out as a design challenge: to create the ideal pair of tongs to hold wood. The result: a trio of award-winning tools that meld high functionality with design innovation. Each stainless steel tool is wrapped in round-milled, full-grain leather bands to protect the handle from heat. The set comes complete with a wall-mount rack for convenient storage.

product.name: Enzo Mari: La Mela - Red Apple Poster
product.description: “Uno La Mela” (1963) by modernist artist and designer Enzo Mari celebrates the mid-century economy of form and exuberance of color in one iconic image. Part of the Nature Series, “Uno La Mela” is silkscreened and unframed. Each poster comes with two PVC bars for wall-mounting. Printed in Italy.

product.name: Enzo Mari: La Pera - Green Pear Poster
product.description: Renowned Italian modernist Enzo Mari presents his bold, graphic interpretation of an iconic form. Part of the Nature Series, “Due La Pera” is silkscreened and unframed. Each poster comes with two PVC bars for wall-mounting. Printed in Italy.

product.name: Enzo Mari: La Mela e La Pera - The Apple and The Pear Poster
product.description: In the hands of celebrated Italian modernist Enzo Mari, simple household objects— an apple and a pear— become graphic works of art. Part of the Nature Series, “La Mela e La Pera” (1963) is silkscreened and unframed. Each poster comes with two PVC bars for wall-mounting. Printed in Italy.

product.name: Enzo Mari: L'oca - The Head of White Goose Poster
product.description: Playful, bold and graphic, Italian modernist Enzo Mari distills an image to its most essential form in “L’oca” (1967). Part of the Nature Series, “L'oca” (1965) is silkscreened and unframed. Each poster comes with two PVC bars for wall-mounting. Printed in Italy.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Il Porcello - The Pig Poster
product.description: A master at distilling forms to their most essential, Italian modernist Enzo Mari creates a bold, playful print in “Il Porcello,” the pig. Part of the Nature Series, “Il Porcello” (1967) is silkscreened and unframed. Each poster comes with two PVC bars for wall-mounting. Printed in Italy.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Simboli Cube Silkscreen Poster
product.description: Created by one of Danese Milano’s most lauded designers, Enzo Mari, the Simboli Sinsemantici (Synsemantic Symbols) distills geometric forms into iconic symbols. Originally created in 1972 by Mari, the elementary graphic images––arrow, wave, clover, star, moon, cube––are silkscreened in black ink and newly editioned for 2013.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Simboli Arrow Silkscreen Poster
product.description: Created by one of Danese Milano’s most lauded designers, Enzo Mari, the Simboli Sinsemantici (Synsemantic Symbols) distills geometric forms into iconic symbols. Originally created in 1972 by Mari, the elementary graphic images––arrow, wave, clover, star, moon, cube––are silkscreened in black ink and newly editioned for 2013.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Simboli Moon Silkscreen Poster
product.description: Created by one of Danese Milano’s most lauded designers, Enzo Mari, the Simboli Sinsemantici (Synsemantic Symbols) distills geometric forms into iconic symbols. Originally created in 1972 by Mari, the elementary graphic images––arrow, wave, clover, star, moon, cube––are silkscreened in black ink and newly editioned for 2013.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Simboli Wave Silkscreen Poster
product.description: Created by one of Danese Milano’s most lauded designers, Enzo Mari, the Simboli Sinsemantici (Synsemantic Symbols) distills geometric forms into iconic symbols. Originally created in 1972 by Mari, the elementary graphic images––arrow, wave, clover, star, moon, cube––are silkscreened in black ink and newly editioned for 2013.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Simboli Star Silkscreen Poster
product.description: Created by one of Danese Milano’s most lauded designers, Enzo Mari, the Simboli Sinsemantici (Synsemantic Symbols) distills geometric forms into iconic symbols. Originally created in 1972 by Mari, the elementary graphic images––arrow, wave, clover, star, moon, cube––are silkscreened in black ink and newly editioned for 2013.

product.name: Enzo Mari: Simboli Trefoil Silkscreen Poster
product.description: Created by one of Danese Milano’s most lauded designers, Enzo Mari, the Simboli Sinsemantici (Synsemantic Symbols) distills geometric forms into iconic symbols. Originally created in 1972 by Mari, the elementary graphic images––arrow, wave, clover, star, moon, cube––are silkscreened in black ink and newly editioned for 2013.

product.name: Man Ray Chess Pieces
product.description: A lifelong friendship with fellow chess enthusiast Marcel Duchamp inspired Man Ray to create his unique chess pieces in 1920. In his set, Man Ray offers a personal interpretation of each character on the chess board: an Egyptian pyramid for the King, a medieval headdress for the Queen, a flask for the Bishop and the carved scroll of a violin for the Knight. Made of solid Beech wood, each character is rendered in sculptural, geometric forms. Made in Germany under the license of the Man Ray Trust. Chessboard sold separately.

product.name: Man Ray Chess Board & Pieces
product.description: A lifelong friendship with Marcel Duchamp inspired Man Ray’s interpretive design for a chess set. Made of solid Beech wood, this Chessboard is the ideal playing field for Many Ray’s geometric, sculptural pieces. Made in Germany under the license of the Man Ray Trust. Chess pieces sold separately.

product.name: Mangiarotti Maritime Table Clock
product.description: The Maritime Table Clock’s domed face and curved edges are inspired by the nautical tools and instrument panels found on seafaring ships. Created by Italian designer and architect Angel Mangiariotti in 1956, the Maritime Table clock’s angled, acrylic face is supported by a porcelain pedestal. Seiko quartz movement.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Bankers Wall Clock
product.description: The Bankers Clock, originally conceived for the Danish National Bank in 1971 by master architect and designer Arne Jacobsen, is here, faithfully reproduced by Rosendahl Copenhagen from Jacobsen’s original drawings. Cased in aluminum, and featuring precise Japanese Quartz Movement, this breathtakingly simple piece will bring timeless appeal to any space. Battery included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: City Hall Wall Clock
product.description: Heralded Danish architect and designer Arne Jacobsen originally created his iconic City Hall Clock for the Rodovre City Hall in 1956. Now being faithfully reproduced from Jacobsen’s original drawings by Rosendahl Copenhagen, the City Hall Clock’s monochromatic palette is encased in Chrome aluminum and curved crystal. The addition of Japanese Quartz Movement marries this classic design to contemporary precision.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Lorette Trailer
product.description: Designed by Wolfgang Sirch and Christoph Blitzer, the Lorette Trailer makes a perfect accompaniment to the Max and Flix Push Cars. Utilizing the highest quality European birch and made from start to finish in Germany, the Lorette Trailer is sure to please both the adult aesthete and the wide-eyed toddler.

product.name: Max Push Car
product.description: Designed by Wolfgang Sirch and Christoph Blitzer for family owned German company Sirch, the Max Push Car is a perfect toy for the robustly imaginative toddler— or the design conscious adult. Its minimal wooden form is made from steam-bent ash that has been rigorously tested. The EVA non-marking and silent wheels allow it to make its home in a cozy apartment without disturbing the neighbors or ridden freely in larger environments.

product.name: Max Bill Wall Clock with Numbers
product.description: Designed in 1956, Max Bill’s Wall Clock perfectly illustrates one of design’s hallmark adages: less is more. Restrained, elegant and enduring, his minimal approach to design allows for pure expression of form and proportion. The Max Bill Wall Clock can be easily mounted to any wall and runs on a single AA battery.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Max Bill Wall Clock with Lines
product.description: Designed in 1956, Max Bill’s Wall Clock perfectly illustrates one of design’s hallmark adages: less is more. Restrained, elegant and enduring, his minimal approach to design allows for pure expression of form and proportion. The Max Bill Wall Clock can be easily mounted to any wall and runs on a single AA battery.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Max Bill 3702 Mechanical Watch
product.description: A protege of Walter Gropius, Swiss designer, architect and artist Max Bill was a true Bauhaus polymath. In 1962, he designed a range of watches for German watch manufacturer Junghans. With hand-winding mechanical movement, a polished stainless-steel case and supple calfskin band, the 3702 Wrist Watch is as modern today as when Bill designed it over forty years ago.

variants.color: black dial, steel case, black band

product.name: Max Bill 3701 Mechanical Watch
product.description: Designed by Bauhaus disciple Max Bill in 1962 for Junghans, the German watch manufacturer. The 3701 Wrist Watch features hand-winding mechanical movement. A white face is encased in stainless steel with calfskin wrist-strap and stainless steel buckle. Waterproof.

variants.color: white face, steel case, tan band

product.name: Birillo Tissue Box - White
product.description: Envisioned by Piero Lissoni, the Birillo Tissue Box is a sleek take on an everyday essential. Crafted from shatter-proof, opaque white PMMA, the cleverly designed bathroom accessory smartly stows a traditional rectangular tissue box. Rounded corners complete the design for a minimal and modern finish.

product.name: Birillo Tissue Box - Grey
product.description: Envisioned by Piero Lissoni, the Birillo Tissue Box is a sleek take on an everyday essential. Crafted from shatter-proof, opaque white PMMA, the cleverly designed bathroom accessory smartly stows a traditional rectangular tissue box. Rounded corners complete the design for a minimal and modern finish.

product.name: Birillo Cotton Pad Dispenser - White
product.description: Part of the Birillo family of products created for Alessi by Italian designer Piero Lissoni, the Cotton Pad Dispenser is an innovative interpretation of an everyday essential. Made from shatter-proof PMMA, the top to the dispenser glides back to elegantly stow bathroom necessities while rounded corners lend the design a modern feel.

product.name: Birillo Cotton Pad Dispenser - Grey
product.description: Part of the Birillo family of products created for Alessi by Italian designer Piero Lissoni, the Cotton Pad Dispenser is an innovative interpretation of an everyday essential. Made from shatter-proof PMMA, the top to the dispenser glides back to elegantly stow bathroom necessities while rounded corners lend the design a modern feel.

product.name: Birillo Soap Dish - White
product.description: Sleek lines and rounded corners give the Birillo Soap Dish a minimal yet modern appearance. Designed by Piero Lissoni as part of the Birillo collection of bathroom accessories, the Soap Dish is made from shatter-proof white PMMA and polished, slotted stainless steel to allow for optimal water drainage.

product.name: Birillo Toilet Brush - White
product.description: The Birillo Toilet Brush lends a touch of elegance to an otherwise dolesome household chore. Created by Italian-based designer Piero Lissoni, the Birillo Toilet Brush is made from shatter-proof PMMA in opaque white and high polished stainless steel to create a mirror effect. Perfectly compliments the rest of the collection of Birillo bathroom accessories for the modern home.

product.name: Birillo Toilet Brush - Grey
product.description: The Birillo Toilet Brush lends a touch of elegance to an otherwise dolesome household chore. Created by Italian-based designer Piero Lissoni, the Birillo Toilet Brush is made from shatter-proof PMMA in opaque white and high polished stainless steel to create a mirror effect. Perfectly compliments the rest of the collection of Birillo bathroom accessories for the modern home.

product.name: Birillo Waste Bin - Grey
product.description: Designed by Italian-based designer and architect Piero Lissari for Alessi, the Birillo Bathroom Waste Bin’s sculpted, minimal form adds modern cool to any interior space. Crafted from lightweight, shatter-proof PMMA in opaque white, the Birillo Bathroom Waste Bin is designed to compliment the entire Birillo collection of bathroom accessories.

product.name: Baggu Reusable Bag - Carrot
product.description: BAGGU creates simple, high-quality bags that are designed to be used every day. The Reusable Bag is crafted in durable, ripstop nylon and is designed to be carried in your hand or over your shoulder. The bag is sized to be used as a shopping tote, book bag, or a purse, so it can be used wherever the day takes you. The reusable Baggu can hold two to three plastic grocery bags worth of items, and folds flat into a five-inch pouch when not in use. The simply designed bag is extremely durable, and it’s a great way to cut down on using plastic and paper shopping bags—just toss a folded reusable Baggu in your purse or coat pocket, and unfold when needed.

product.name: Baggu Reusable Bag - Black
product.description: BAGGU creates simple, high-quality bags that are designed to be used every day. The Reusable Bag is crafted in durable, ripstop nylon and is designed to be carried in your hand or over your shoulder. The bag is sized to be used as a shopping tote, book bag, or a purse, so it can be used wherever the day takes you. The reusable Baggu can hold two to three plastic grocery bags worth of items, and folds flat into a five-inch pouch when not in use. The simply designed bag is extremely durable, and it’s a great way to cut down on using plastic and paper shopping bags—just toss a folded reusable Baggu in your purse or coat pocket, and unfold when needed.

product.name: Baggu X3 Tote Set - Neon/Green/Forest
product.description: Set of three collapsable ripstop nylon bags, ideal for stashing in your purse, car or briefcase for when-you-need-it storage on-the-go. The trio comes in a compact zip pouch. Each bag holds up to 50-pounds. Machine washable.

product.name: Duck Bag - Chestnut
product.description: A take-anywhere tote made from durable recycled cotton canvas duck. The Duck Bag from Baggu features two carrying straps for over the shoulder or hand transport. With matte silver hardware, reinforced seams and an interior pocket for tucking away extra odds and ends.

product.name: Duck Bag - Blue Dot
product.description: A take-anywhere tote made from durable recycled cotton canvas duck. The Duck Bag from Baggu features two carrying straps for over the shoulder or hand transport. With matte silver hardware, reinforced seams and an interior pocket for tucking away extra odds and ends.

product.name: 02 Optic Alarm Clock
product.description: The second edition of Joe Colombo’s Optic Table Alarm Clock, this clock was originally designed in 1988. With a compact form and numbers 1-60 to denote the seconds, this stylish clock is a welcome addition to any home or office. And, has been a popular addition to numerous museum collections including the Philadelphia Museum of Art, Stedelijk Museum and the Kunstmuseum, among others. Quartz movement.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Pes Letter Opener
product.description: Designed by Giulio Iacchetti, the Pes Paper Knife––which translates to “fish” in the designer’s native dialect––takes the form of a fish made from highly polished stainless steel for a mirrored effect. The sharpened nose makes letter-opening a breeze, while the curved handle keeps ergometrics in mind. A whimsical yet functional addition to any home or office.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Chiringuito Cocktail Shaker
product.description: London-based designer Ron Arad has definitively answered the age-old martini debate “olives or a twist” with a sleek, sculptural response. The innovative design and unique twisting shape ensure cocktails are chilled to perfection. Made from stainless steel. Top strainer included. Included in the permanent collection of the Centre Georges Pompidou.

product.name: Massoni 870/50 Cocktail Shaker
product.description: With over one million sold, the 870/50 Cocktail Shaker is one of the world’s best loved bar accessories. Designed by Carlo Mazzeri and Luigi Massoni, this iconic shaker is made from highly polished stainless steel and boasts a 500mL capacity to ensure every cocktail is served at icy perfection. Included in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art.

product.name: Glass Family - Goblet - Set of 4
product.description: The Goblet from Jasper Morrison is a chic addition to any dinner––family or formal. Understated yet regal, the Goblet can be used as a water glass or dessert vessel. Made from crystal glass, the Goblet is part of the Glass Family collection which includes glasses for water, or white or red wine. Made in Italy.

product.name: Glass Family - Water Glass - Set of 4
product.description: With a height perfectly in between the red and white glasses of the Glass Family, the Water Glass is a sophisticated tablesetting for everyday use. The Water Glass is made from crystal glass for durability and presence. Designed by Jasper Morrison and made in Italy.

product.name: Juicy Salif Citrus Squeezer
product.description: Philippe Starck’s iconic citrus squeezer—featured in museum collections around the world—began with a simple sketch on a pizzeria napkin, drawn while vacationing on the Italian seaside. Its ingenious shape, cast from mirror-polished aluminum, manages to be both highly functional and consummately modern.

product.name: Richard Sapper Espresso Coffee Maker
product.description: The six-cup espresso coffee maker that started it all, Alessi's 9090 was the first object for the home in the company’s history, as well as its first product to be inducted into the Permanent Design Collection at New York’s Museum of Modern Art. It was also the Italian brand’s first "amphibious object": a tool for the kitchen so beautifully designed that it is equally welcome at the table. Crafted in 18/10 stainless steel with a cast iron handle. Made in Italy.

product.name: Mami Kettle
product.description: Stefano Giovannoni elevates the soft, round lines of a classic teakettle to create a nearly seamless form. So stylized and alluring is his Mami tea kettle that you might forget that it's boiling water and confuse it for a work of art. Crafted in 18/10 stainless steel, with handle and whistle in PA. Bottom in magnetic stainless steel. Made in Italy.

product.name: Todo Cheese Grater
product.description: Designer Richard Sapper, ten-time winner of the Compasso d'Oro, transforms a simple kitchen tool—the cheese grater—into something grand. At his own home, Sapper is in charge grating cheese for the whole family, so it was personal experience that spawned the idea for Todo’s long, truncated cone shaft, which grates enough cheese (or nutmeg) in a single stroke to satisfy a whole meal. Crafted in stainless steel and wood.

product.name: MU Flatware
product.description: Created by award-winning Japanese architect and designer Toyo Ito, this distinctive cutlery set draws on the tactile sensation of chopsticks. Its sleek, linear lines are softened with an organic quality inspired by plants. The result is an elegant harmony. Composed of one table spoon, one table fork, one table knife and one dessert fork in 18/10 mirror polished stainless steel.

product.name: Ovale Flatware
product.description: The Ovale collection, designed by Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec, draws on rustic and traditional influences to create a cutlery set perfectly suited for every day life. Composed of one table spoon, one table fork, one table knife, one dessert fork and one tea spoon in 18/10 mirror polished stainless steel.

product.name: KnifeForkSpoon Flatware
product.description: The pure, clean lines of Jasper Morrison’s KnifeForkSpoon Place Settling are characteristic of his minimalist style. Cutlery set composed of one table spoon, one table fork, one table knife, one dessert fork, and one tea spoon in 18/10 mirror polished stainless steel.

product.name: Dear Charlie Banana Holder
product.description: Dear Charlie, conceived by John Truex, is a cleverly designed support for bananas. Allowing them to hang much as they would on a tree, bananas avoid not only bruising but also contact with the gases of other ripening fruits, preserving them in an ideal manner. The rubber-covered base, together with the object’s weight, guarantees stability on every surface. Can also support other fruit or vegetables such as a bunch of grapes, chilies or garlic. Crafted in chrome-plated zamak.

product.name: Pescher Expandible Trivet
product.description: An expandable trivet—delightfully resembling a school of fish—accommodates pots, bowls and serving dishes of virtually any size. Designed by Paolo Lomazzi and Donato D’Urbino, it a stylish tool for protecting tables and countertops from heat and scratches. Crafted in 18/10 mirror polished stainless steel.

product.name: Russel Wright Residential Collection - Large Tumbler - Aqua
product.description: Mid-century industrial designer Russel Wright believed that the table was the center of the home. First designed over 60 years ago, the Russel Wright Residential Collection is available once again, crafted from durable, shatterproof melamine. Winner of the Good Design Award from the Museum of Modern Art (1953, 1954), the Residential Collection remains an icon of the 20th century––and now 21st century––home. BPA Free. Dishwasher safe.

product.name: Russel Wright Residential Collection - Large Tumbler - Lemon
product.description: Mid-century industrial designer Russel Wright believed that the table was the center of the home. Winner of the Good Design Award from the Museum of Modern Art (1953, 1954), the Residential Collection remains an icon of the 20th century––and now 21st century––home. BPA Free. Dishwasher safe.

product.name: Binaria Stool - Black
product.description: Designed by doctor Jordi Badía and industrial designer Otto Canalda, the Binaria Stool comes with a medical endorsement. Specifically created to position the back at a 135-degree angle in relationship to the legs, this stool is designed for optimal comfort in tasks requiring seated motions. A patented seat shape with a central division stabilizes the coxofemoral joint. Winner of ADI FAD Best Spanish Product, 2003.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Happy Hour Trolley
product.description: Designed by Zürich-based designer Alfredo Häberli, the Happy Hour Trolley is suitable for a wide range of functions— not just to hold your favorite beverage. Its chromed iron structure make it ideally suited for use as a side table in the living room or for additional storage in the bathroom. Tripod wheels make it an adaptable piece for any home.

product.name: USB Rechargeable Bike Light Set - Green
product.description: What began as a social project to equip university students in Stockholm with proper bike lights has evolved into Bookman––the design practice of Johan Lidehäll, David Axelsson, Victor Kabo and Fredrik Lindström. Their first product collaboration resulted in the UBS Rechargeable Bike Light Set. An oversized button makes power control a breeze (even with gloves) while the smart elastic strap ensures the light can be adhered securely anywhere. Best of all, the built-in USB port allows for battery recharge, so you’ll never be caught with the lights out. Five hour run time when light is steady; 25 hour run time when flashing. Set includes one front and one rear light and one USB cable. Weatherproof.

product.name: Revolution Glassware - Champagne Flute (2)
product.description: Deceptively simple in its form, the Revolution Collection from Fferrone is creating using an intricate glassblowing process by master craftsmen in the Czech Republic to combine two glasses into one. The result: a sleek and innovatively designed vessel that can be filled from either end. When filled, the contents appear to float, adding visual intrigue. Made from borosilicate glass. Oven, dishwasher and microwave safe.

product.name: Margot Glassware Collection - White Wine Goblet (2)
product.description: Designed by Felicia Ferrone for Fferrone, the Margot Collection presents a contemporary interpretation of cut glass. Handcrafted by master glassblowers, the Margot Collection is created from fluted Boroscilicate glass to allow for the pieces to function in a range of temperatures. Microwave, oven and dishwasher safe. Made in the Czech Republic.

product.description: Designed by Felicia Ferrone for Fferrone, the Margot Collection presents a contemporary interpretation of cut glass. Handcrafted by master glassblowers, the Margot Collection is created from fluted Boroscilicate glass to allow for the pieces to function in a range of temperatures. Microwave, oven and dishwasher safe. Made in the Czech Republic.

product.name: Margot Glassware Collection - Dessert Goblet (2)
product.description: Designed by Felicia Ferrone for Fferrone, the Margot Collection presents a contemporary interpretation of cut glass. Handcrafted by master glassblowers, the Margot Collection is created from fluted Boroscilicate glass to allow for the pieces to function in a range of temperatures. Microwave, oven and dishwasher safe. Made in the Czech Republic.

product.name: F1 Avionette Carry-On Suitcase - Blue
product.description: Inspired by the glamorous luggage that accompanied travelers in the 1960s, Flight 001’s Avoinette Carry-On Suitcase allows you to travel in style. Luggage includes: front and rear zippered magazine pockets, top and side handles, trolley handle, additional bag strap and silent moving wheels. With chic antiqued brass zipper pulls and a water resistant coated nylon exterior, the Avoinette is in a class all its own. 5.7 pounds.

product.name: 28.1 Single Pendant Light
product.description: Designed by Vancouver-based Omer Arbel, the 28.1 Single Pendant Canopy Light combines lustrous materials for optimal light reflection. An opaque glass orb conceals the bulb for a soft, incandescent glow. Installed as a single, stunning piece or in a celestial arrangement, the 28.1 Single Pendant Canopy Light brings warmth and style to any room.

product.name: 28.3 Random Pendant Chandelier
product.description: Designer Omer Arbel’s 28.3 Pendant Canopy Light creates a luminous low-voltage chandelier. Three orbs of opaque glass are encased in spheres of clear blown glass, each produced by a unique technique used to achieve the chandelier’s distinctive air bubbles. Brilliant when installed alone or clustered for a dramatic effect.

product.name: 28.5 Random Pendant Chandelier
product.description: Cascading droplets of light, the 28.5 Pendant Canopy Light joins five pendant lanterns to create one distinctive chandelier. Each glass sphere contains an interior opaque orb produced by using a specialized glass-blowing technique. Pendants are connected using a braided metal cable and secured by a brushed nickel canopy. Adjustable pendant lengths.

product.name: 28.7 Pendant Chandelier
product.description: Clustered in a fleurette of seven pendant lanterns, Omer Arbel’s 28.7 Pendant Canopy Light bathes any room in an impressive display of light. Using a specialized glass-blowing technique, each sphere is inset with an opaque orb which houses a bulb, casting a soft glow to elegantly illuminate any space.

product.name: 14.1 Single Pendant Light
product.description: Envisioned by designer Omer Arbel as a single sphere of light, the 14.1 Single Pendant Light gives the impression of floating as it adds soft illumination. The pendant is made of cast glass lending itself to handmade imperfections making each piece unique. A frosted cylindrical opening in the middle allows for a soft diffusion of light. Ideal as a single warm piece or brighter installation when clustered.

product.name: 14.3 Three Pendant Chandelier
product.description: The 14.3 Pendant Canopy Light by Vancouver-based designer Omer Arbel suspends three cascading orbs, giving the appearance of suspended candlelight. Each orb is made of cast glass lending a handmade appearance. A cylindrical frosted interior encases the bulb and a round brushed nickel canopy secures the fixture to the ceiling.

product.name: 14.5 Five Pendant Chandelier
product.description: Suspended from the ceiling by a brushed nickel canopy, designer Omer Arbel’s 14.5 Pendant Canopy Light creates a fountain of glowing light. Five cast glass pendants with frosted cylindrical interiors hang at vertical intervals giving the impression of floating candlelight. Individual markings due to the glass cast production process make each piece unique. Hang alone for a soft statement or in groups for a celestial skyscape.

product.name: 14.7 Seven Pendant Chandelier
product.description: The most brilliant of Omer Arbel’s Pendant Canopy Light series, the 14.7 suspends seven cast glass spheres from a brushed nickel canopy. Each sphere contains subtle distinctions due to the casting process, making each piece unique. A hollow frosted glass interior creates the ideal home for each 10-watt bulb, emitting a constellation of subtle lights and mimicking the effect of floating candlelight.

product.name: 21.1 Single Pendant Light
product.description: The 21.1. Single Pendant Light by Vancouver-based designer Omer Arbel owes its distinctive shape to an idiosyncratic production process. Sheets of flattened, raw porcelain are wrapped around frosted borosilicate glass and left to create their own hardened form making each piece unique. A soft 20-watt bulb softly diffuses light through each sculptural form. Lovely as a single addition to a room or brilliant as a clustered grouping.

product.name: 21.3 Three Pendant Chandelier
product.description: Designed by Vancouver-based Omer Arbel, the 21.3 Pendant Canopy Light creates a sculptural presence. Raw porcelain sheets are wrapped around a tube of frosted borosilicate glass creating a subtle contrast as light passes through. Suspended from a brushed nickel canopy, the three pendants of the 21.3 are hung at varied heights, evoking the look of hung flowers and emitting a warm, natural glow.

product.name: 21.5 Five Pendant Chandelier
product.description: The 21.5 Pendant Canopy Light, designed by Omer Arbel, owes its evocative shape thanks to a unique production process. Sheets of raw porcelain are draped over a frosted glass core and left to harden, creating individual, sculptural forms. Suspended at varied lengths, the five pendant lights of the 21.5 emit a soft glow which lends warmth and style to any room.

product.name: 21.7 Seven Pendant Chandelier
product.description: A special construction of wrapped porcelain and frosted borosilicate glass gives the 21.7 Pendant Canopy Light its sculptural, organic form. Designed by Omer Arbel, Seven pendants are suspended at varied lengths from a brushed nickel canopy to form a cascade of fluttering light evocative of hanging flowers. Adjustable ceiling height from 10 feet to 120 feet.

product.name: 28d Table Light
product.description: A marriage of form and function, the 28d Desk Lamp designed by Omer Arbel is anchored by a grey crochet memory cable which can be coiled to provide a safe resting place for the light. This innovative design allows the 28d Desk Lamp to comfortably sit on any horizontal surface––desk, table, bookshelf or beyond. The 20-watt bulb is contained within an opaque glass shade and surrounded by a blown glass sphere to optimize light dispersion. Bulb included.

product.name: 28s Wall Light
product.description: A unique glass blowing technique creates the 28s Surface Mounted Light’s distinctive shape. The large shade is made from cast glass and contains three alluring glass bubbles––two transparent and one opaque sphere which smartly houses a 20-watt xenon bulb. Perfect as a singular decorative element or even more brilliant when grouped together to create a sculptural formation. Designed by Omer Arbel.

product.name: Symbol Coat Rack
product.description: Designed by David E. Scott with both aesthetics and functionality in mind, the Symbol Coat Rack by Desu Design features flip-down hooks for convenient storage. When not needed, the hooks lay flat, hiding their function in a clean and modern design. Wall-mounted and holds up to 75 pounds. Anodized aluminum body. Made in the USA.

product.name: Tyler Table Lamp
product.description: From Brooklyn-based Egg Collective, the Tyler Table Lamp is a sculptural addition to any room. Emblematic of Egg Collective’s dedication to American-made furniture, the Tyler Table Lamp’s hand-blown glass shade is made in New York and the blackened white oak wooden base is made in the design collective’s Brooklyn shop.

product.name: F1 Spacepak Carry-On Suitcase
product.description: Perfectly sized for international carry-on travel, the Spacepak Suitcase from Flight 001 makes packing a breeze. The interior of the suitcase holds packing bags to conveniently stow away and compress enough of your belongings last up to two weeks: Suiter Bag holds one men’s suit or six dresses, Underwear Bag holds 13 socks and pairs of underwear; Clothes Bag holds 13 shirts and four pants. Exterior laptop compartment and accessory compartments included. Folding board included.

product.name: Linen Waffle Towel Collection - Face
product.description: Beautiful in its simplicity, the Linen Waffle Towel Collection from Japanese textile gurus Fog Linen Work is as durable as it is attractive. The waffle weave creates subtle texture, exfoliating as you dry, while the lightness of linen ensures easy water absorbency. The 100% linen composition will get softer and softer over time. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Linen Waffle Towel Collection - Hand
product.description: Beautiful in its simplicity, the Linen Waffle Towel Collection from Japanese textile gurus Fog Linen Work is as durable as it is attractive. The waffle weave creates subtle texture, exfoliating as you dry, while the lightness of linen ensures easy water absorbency. The 100% linen composition will get softer and softer over time. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Linen Waffle Towel Collection - Bath
product.description: Beautiful in its simplicity, the Linen Waffle Towel Collection from Japanese textile gurus Fog Linen Work is as durable as it is attractive. The waffle weave creates subtle texture, exfoliating as you dry, while the lightness of linen ensures easy water absorbency. The 100% linen composition will get softer and softer over time. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Desk Basket - Small
product.description: From Fog Linen Work’s Yumiko Sekine, the Desk Basket offers simple organizational solutions for the home or office. Made from sculpted iron, the medium Desk Basket is perfect for storing mail and magazines while the smaller Desk Basket is ideal for stationary or kitchen use. Made in India.

product.name: Desk Basket - Medium
product.description: From Fog Linen Work’s Yumiko Sekine, the Desk Basket offers simple organizational solutions for the home or office. Made from sculpted iron, the medium Desk Basket is perfect for storing mail and magazines while the smaller Desk Basket is ideal for stationary or kitchen use. Made in India.

product.name: Linen Placemat - Blue Chambray
product.description: From festive gatherings to everyday breakfasts, the Linen Placemat adds warmth and style to any meal. Made from durable and machine washable 100 percent linen, the Linen Placemat from Fog Linen Work will become softer with each use making it ideally suited for everyday dining rituals. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Linen Placemat - Grey with White Stripe
product.description: From festive gatherings to everyday breakfasts, the Linen Placemat adds warmth and style to any meal. Made from durable and machine washable 100% linen, the Linen Placemat from Fog Linen Work will become softer with each use making it ideally suited for everyday dining rituals. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: White Marble Trivets - Hexagon
product.description: Brooklyn-based industrial design studio Fort Standard has created these sleek Marble Trivets out of cut stone in simple geometric shapes. Described by designers Gregory Buntain and Ian Collings as imbued with a “warm-contemporary aesthetic,” the White Marble Trivets add sophistication to any room. Hand-stamped leather bottom protects table surfaces.

product.name: Dry Good Vessels - Medium
product.description: Though designed with the kitchen in mind, the Dry Goods Vessels from Brooklyn-based industrial design studio Fort Standard can be used throughout the house as safe storage for sundry goods. Made from thin yet sturdy glass, the Dry Goods Vessels are topped with sculptural turned hardwood handles with cork seal.

product.name: Dry Good Vessels - Tall
product.description: Though designed with the kitchen in mind, the Dry Goods Vessels from Brooklyn-based industrial design studio Fort Standard can be used throughout the house as safe storage for sundry goods. Made from thin yet sturdy glass, the Dry Goods Vessels are topped with sculptural turned hardwood handles with cork seal.

product.name: Linen Massage Bath Mat
product.description: Highly absorbent and naturally bacteria-resistant, this Linen Massage Bath Mat from designer Yumiko Sekine’s Fog Linen Work adds elegance to any bathroom. The durable looped linen fibers form a pleasing texture that both exfoliates and massages your feet. 100% linen with a cotton border. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Galvanized Steel Cutlery Box
product.description: A distinctive solution for home storage, the Cutlery Box from Fog Linen Work’s Yumiko Sekine serves dynamic functions. The carefully selected length is idea for housing both chopsticks and a knife and fork––or your desk collection of pens and pencils. Made from galvanized steel. Made in India.

product.name: Tool Stand
product.description: True to the tradition of Fog Linen Work, Yumiko Sekine has designed the Tool Stand with myriad functions in mind. The galvanized steel design will seamlessly blend into office environments as a storage component for pens, pencils, rulers and scissors. Or, when placed in the kitchen, the Tool Stand becomes a distinctive home for your favorite cooking instruments. Made in India.

product.name: Galvanized Steel Business Card Box
product.description: Made to fit snugly into desk drawers to aid in office organization, the Card Box’s elegant galvanized steel exterior is equally at home on countertops or nightstands. Created by Yumiko Sekine of Fog Linen Work, the Card Box is adaptable to a variety of home uses. Made in India.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Galvanized Steel Desk Tray
product.description: Ideally crafted for magazine and mail storage, this desk tray can also be used as a receptacle for contracts, notes and other miscellany. Made from sleek galvanized steel by Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work. Made in India.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Jeanine Bag
product.description: From Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work, the Jeanine Bag’s elegant simplicity lends understated chic to any outfit. An urbane combination of herringbone and plain weave linen add consummate style while wide straps and a reinforced gusset allow for extra support. 100 percent linen. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Lavender Sachet
product.description: A delight to the senses, the Lavender Sachet designed by Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work imbues any environment with the calming scent of lavender. Drawers and closets, bed linens and towels, even desk drawers all take on the pleasing fragrance with the addition of this bright little sachet. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Frank Glasses Case
product.description: Made from robust and durable heavyweight linen, the Frank Glass Case from Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work elegantly stows glasses, pens or small sundry goods. The strong linen fibers protect and support even delicate items while the understated design adds a touch of style to everyday use. 100% linen. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Carl Pouch
product.description: Simple yet refined, the Carl Pouch M from Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work is sized to comfortably fit an iPad, eReader or small notepad. Made from heavyweight linen, the Carl Pouch M is durable and protective. Made from 100% linen in Lithuania.

product.name: Linen Handkerchief
product.description: Supple but sturdy, the Linen Handkerchief from Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work offers an elegant bit of fabric when you need it most. An ideal solution for either a sneeze or for personal style, the Linen Handkerchief is crafted from 100% linen and made in Lithuania.

product.name: Linen Table Cloth - Blue Chambray
product.description: The Linen Table Cloth from Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work instantly brings easy warmth to any room. Made from long-lasting and durable 100 percent linen, the Linen Table Cloth is machine washable and will get softer with each wash—ideal for everyday use. Made in Lithuania.

product.name: Fog Linen Wire Storage Basket
product.description: A slightly larger version of the Desk Basket, the Market Basket from Japanese designer Yumiko Sekine for Fog Linen Work is roomy and accommodating. Sized to fit up to A4 paper, the Market Basket is perfect living room storage magazines and books, or for slippers, linens or towels in the bathroom. Made of iron in India.

product.name: White Marble Platter
product.description: Made from carved white Carrara marble, the Marble Platter from Brooklyn-based industrial design studio Fort Standard adds warmth to any table. An ideal presentation for a cheese platter or hors d'oeuvres, the Marble Platter is equally at home as a centerpiece, illuminating the table and lending elegance to the home. Hand-stamped leather bottom protects table surfaces.

product.name: Dish Coffee Table
product.description: Created by Seattle-based husband and wife design team Chelsea and James Minola of Grain, the Dish Coffee Table takes its inspiration from hand-carved African stools. This coffee table features a scooped-out tabletop whose smooth curves add sculptural allure to any room. Made in the USA from solid American ash.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Dish Side Table
product.description: Created by Seattle-based husband and wife design team Chelsea and James Minola of Grain, the Dish Side Table takes its inspiration from hand-carved African stools. This sculptural side table features a scooped-out tabletop that can double as a stool. Made in the USA from solid American ash.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Stitch Nonagon Mirror
product.description: Blending technological innovation with age-old craft techniques, the Stitch Nonagon Mirror adheres a water-jet cut nine-sided mirror to its backing using custom stitched hemp thread. Created by Seattle-based husband and wife design team Chelsea and James Minola of Grain. Made from rapidly renewable materials.

product.name: J Schatz Hummingbird Feeder - Red
product.description: A gorgeous addition to your backyard sanctuary. The J Schatz Hummingbird Feeder is made from glossy stoneware in bright colors designed to attract your feathered friends. Each feeder is gravity-fed—simply fill the feeder from the top to allow the nectar to flow freely. Handmade by J Schatz in New York.

product.name: J Schatz Egg Bird House - Stone White
product.description: Create an elegant place for your feathered friends to call home. The Egg Bird House is handmade from glossy, weatherproof stoneware that is resistant to temperature extremes, giving your flock a warm nest on colder days. A narrow 1 1/8-inch diameter entrance is perfect for chickadees, wrens and smaller birds, while also offering protection from outside predators. Handmade by J Schatz in New York.

product.name: J Schatz Mobile Bird Feeder - Stone Yellow
product.description: One part fine art object, one part fine dining experience, the Mobile Bird Feeder by New York-based Jim Schatz is perfect for both the nature lover and the design enthusiast. A single, handcrafted, weatherproof stoneware feeding tube is connected to an aluminum balancing ring and suspended by a vinyl coated wire creating a mobile structure that mimics the shape and movement of swaying branches. Feeding holes are located at either end of the mobile, giving our feathered friends the option of dining with a guest. Feeder holds up to 4 ½ cups of seed and includes seed scoop and user guide.

product.name: iPhone 5 Color Case - White
product.description: Korean-based company 11+ used the Pantone color guide for its uniquely rendered iPhone 5 Color Case. Made from high-quality plastic, this phone cover features a scratch resistant surface and protective side buttons. Each selected Pantone color code is inscribed on the cover’s interior.

product.name: iPhone 5 Color Case - Light Apricot
product.description: Korean-based company 11+ used the Pantone color guide for its uniquely rendered iPhone 5 Color Case. Made from high-quality plastic, this phone cover features a scratch resistant surface and protective side buttons. Each selected Pantone color code is inscribed on the cover’s interior.

product.description: Korean-based company 11+ used the Pantone color guide for its uniquely rendered iPhone 5 Color Case. Made from high-quality plastic, this phone cover features a scratch resistant surface and protective side buttons. Each selected Pantone color code is inscribed on the cover’s interior.

product.description: Korean-based company 11+ used the Pantone color guide for its uniquely rendered iPhone 5 Color Case. Made from high-quality plastic, this phone cover features a scratch resistant surface and protective side buttons. Each selected Pantone color code is inscribed on the cover’s interior.

product.name: iPhone 5 Color Case - Candy Pink
product.description: Korean-based company 11+ used the Pantone color guide for its uniquely rendered iPhone 5 Color Case. Made from high-quality plastic, this phone cover features a scratch resistant surface and protective side buttons. Each selected Pantone color code is inscribed on the cover’s interior.

product.name: iPhone 5 Color Case - Pale Mint
product.description: Korean-based company 11+ used the Pantone color guide for its uniquely rendered iPhone 5 Color Case. Made from high-quality plastic, this phone cover features a scratch resistant surface and protective side buttons. Each selected Pantone color code is inscribed on the cover’s interior.

product.name: Funiculi Floor Lamp - Moss Grey
product.description: The Funiculí Floor Lamp is an update of a lamp designed in 1979 by Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras, who is revered for the absolute simplicity of his designs. A simple pair of clips allows the lamp to be lowered or raised, while the shade rotates 360 degrees beaming radiant light wherever desired. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Floor Lamp - White
product.description: The Funiculí Floor Lamp is an update of a lamp designed in 1979 by Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras, who is revered for the absolute simplicity of his designs. A simple pair of clips allows the lamp to be lowered or raised, while the shade rotates 360 degrees beaming radiant light wherever desired. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Floor Lamp - Beige
product.description: The Funiculí Floor Lamp is an update of a lamp designed in 1979 by Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras, who is revered for the absolute simplicity of his designs. A simple pair of clips allows the lamp to be lowered or raised, while the shade rotates 360 degrees beaming radiant light wherever desired. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Wall Lamp - Moss Grey
product.description: Based on a lamp created in 1979 by Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras, The Funiculí Wall Lamp takes its name from the concept of “funicular” action: moving up and down. The height of its shade can be adjusted using the same double-clip mechanism of Porqueras’ original design. The shade itself rotates 360 degrees emitting radiant light wherever desired. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Wall Lamp - White
product.description: Based on a lamp created in 1979 by Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras, the Funiculí Wall Lamp takes its name from the concept of “funicular” action: moving up and down. The height of its shade can be adjusted using the same double-clip mechanism of Porqueras’ original design. The shade itself rotates 360 degrees emitting radiant light wherever desired. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Wall Lamp - Black

Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Wall Lamp - Beige
product.description: Based on a lamp created in 1979 by Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras, The Funiculí Wall Lamp takes its name from the concept of “funicular” action: moving up and down. The height of its shade can be adjusted using the same double-clip mechanism of Porqueras’ original design. The shade itself rotates 360º emitting radiant light wherever desired. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Table Lamp - Moss Grey
product.description: Thirty years after creating his original Funiculí lamp, Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras’ ultra-functional sensibility is as relevant and stylish as ever. The Funiculí Table Lamp is an extension of that design; using the same double-clip mechanism the height of the shade can adjusted as desired, while the shade itself rotates 360 degrees casting a brilliant glow in any direction. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Table Lamp - White
product.description: Thirty years after creating his original Funiculí lamp, Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras’ ultra-functional sensibility is as relevant and stylish as ever. The Funiculí Table Lamp is an extension of that design; using the same double-clip mechanism the height of the shade can adjusted as desired, while the shade itself rotates 360 degrees casting a brilliant glow in any direction. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Funiculi Table Lamp - Beige
product.description: Thirty years after creating his original Funiculí lamp, Spanish designer Lluís Porqueras’ ultra-functional sensibility is as relevant and stylish as ever. The Funiculí Table Lamp is an extension of that design; using the same double-clip mechanism the height of the shade can adjusted as desired, while the shade itself rotates 360º casting a brilliant glow in any direction. Base and stem are rendered in lacquered iron. Shade made of lacquered aluminum.

product.name: Mojito Soap Set
product.description: An elegantly packaged gift set from New York-based apothecary Malin + Goetz, the Mojito Soap Set lets you play bartender in the bathroom. Included in the set are three bars of pure vegetable-based soaps in uplifting fragrances of Peppermint, Lime and Rum. Each bar contains 2% natural fragrance for lightly scented, cleansed skin.

product.name: Rum+Lime Hand Wash Set
product.description: From New York-based apothecary Malin + Goetz, the Rum + Lime Hand Wash duo offers two popular fragrances in one smartly packaged set. Each foaming cleansing gel contains amino acid-based cleansing agents to hydrate the skin as they cleanse. Rum Hand Wash emits a warm, natural scent with notes of bergamot, plum, amber, rum and milk. Lime Hand Wash is an uplifting blend of lemon, lime, white musk and warm woods.

product.name: 1 oz. Carry-On Approved Essentials Set
product.description: Travel in style with New York-based apothecary Malin + Goetz’s 1 oz Essential Kit. Loved the world over as amenities for chic hotels such as the Hudson Hotel in New York and St Martins Lane in London, the Malin + Goetz product line can now travel where you do. The 1 oz Essential Kit contains the line’s best-selling products: body and hair–Grapefruit Face Cleanser, Vitamin E Face Moisturizer, Bergamot Body Cleanser, Vitamin b5 Body Moisturizer, Peppermint Shampoo and Cilantro Conditioner.

product.name: Duck Step Stool
product.description: Manny & Simon elevate a classic childhood toy— the rubber duck— to the realm of high design with this impeccably crafted wooden step stool for kids. Winner of a 2012 Cribsie award, it is constructed from eco-friendly materials and finished in bright yellow paint. Bound to lift spirits, not to mention a tiny foot or two.

product.name: Dump Truck Push Toy
product.description: Manny & Simon transform classic toys that kids love into contemporary keepsakes. Their Dump Truck Push Toy reimagines a familiar childhood favorite with clean, simple lines. Lovingly crafted from eco-friendly materials and finished in cheerful hues, it is designed to charm both children and parents alike.

product.name: Loader Push Toy
product.description: Manny & Simon’s Loader Push Toy is not only beautifully designed, but designed to stimulate your child’s boundless imagination. Its classic color palette is created with zero-carcinogen and non-toxic paint, ensuring safety for both children and the environment, and its wheels are crafted from sustainable solid oak.

product.name: Taxi Wooden Push Toy
product.description: Manny & Simon’s Taxi Wooden Push Toy is a brightly colored twist on a childhood favorite. Like all of Manny & Simon’s wooden heirloom toys, it is constructed of eco-friendly materials using sustainable methods at their factory in Del Mar, California.

product.name: Police Car Wooden Push Toy
product.description: A classic toy that is bound to get your child’s imagination going, Manny & Simon’s Police Car Wooden Push Toy is a playroom essential—not to mention an instant heirloom. Artfully designed and constructed of recycled wood, it reflects Manny & Simon’s modern aesthetic sensibility and enduring commitment to environmental and social responsibility.

product.name: Shapes Train Wooden Push Toy
product.description: Manny & Simon’s brightly hued Shapes Train Wooden Push Toy is a contemporary take on a childhood classic. Each car features an easy grip handle and is made from recycled wood residuals and painted with non-toxic, zero-VOC paint. For tots in the crawling stage, there’s no better way to roll.

product.name: Sendan Tokusa Salad Plate
product.description: The Sendan Tokusa Salad Plate features Japan’s traditional Tokusa design, originally created during the country’s Edo period. Blue lines radiate from the center intersecting with white circles in a pattern of consummate elegance. Made in Japan. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

product.name: Sendan Tokusa Dinner Plate
product.description: Japan’s traditional Tokusa design, originally created during the country’s Edo period, graces the Sendan Tokusa Dinner Plate. Blue lines radiate from the center intersecting with white circles in a pattern of consummate elegance. Made in Japan. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

product.name: Sendan Tokusa Bowl
product.description: A beautifully intricate take on the traditional Tokusa design, originally created during Japan’s Edo period, graces the Sendan Tokusa Bowl. Blue lines radiate from the center intersecting with white circles in a pattern of consummate elegance. Made in Japan. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

product.name: Think - basil - 3d - with adjustable lumbar
product.description: The first ever cradle-to-cradle product on the market, the Think Chair by Steelcase has been redesigned for the way we work today. The Integrated LiveBack™ System reacts to your body’s movement, moving with you as you change postures while the weight-activated seat creates immediate, responsive comfort for any body. The Think Chair prioritizes sustainability, considering environmental impact with every step of production and reuse. Recipient of the IDEA Gold Award, the Red Dot Award for Product Design, the iF Design Award among many others.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: cobi - basil seat back - white frame
product.description: Designed to foster collaboration and movement, the cobi Chair from Steelcase is built upon three ideals: sustained comfort over time, intuitive and automatic adjustments and multi-posture support. A built-in weight-activated mechanism automatically adjusts to the body’s center of gravity, while a variable seat height accommodates all body types. Recipient of the Silver Award in the Conference Chair Category (NeoCon 2008).
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Siento Mid-Back Executive Task Chair - ebony
product.description: Sleek and sophisticated, the Siento Chair’s elegant and minimal design belies its tremendous technological advancements. Embedded LiveBack® technology mimics the movement of your spine to adjust support with your body’s motion. Adjustable back tension and height further customize the chair for individual use. Siento is also eco-friendly: it has received a Cradle-to-Cradle Certificate and level™ 2 certified to the BIFMA e3 sustainability standard.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Bivi Bike Hook - Artic White
product.description: Designed by turnstone to encourage bike use in the office environment, the Bivi Bike Hook is wall-mountable and can hold up to 50-pounds. Easy to install in either the home or office environment, the Bivi Bike Hook offers an elegant solution to storage.

product.name: Hosu Convertible Lounge Chair - Light Grey
product.description: Designed by Patricia Urquiola to accommodate myriad work styles, the Hosu Convertible Lounge Chair offers the option to put one’s feet up with a foldout footrest. With rear and side storage pockets and an electrical cord pass, this unique chair offers comfort and functionality. Coordinating lumbar pillow included. Recipient of the 2013 iF Design Award and the 2013 Red Dot Design Award for Product Design.

product.name: Hosu Convertible Sofa - Light Grey
product.description: Designed by Patricia Urquiola for modern working environments, the Hosu Sofa blends comfort with practical functionality. With roomy seating built for two, the Hosu Sofa is designed for collaboration. The thoughtful design includes rear and side storage pockets and an electrical cord pass to reduce electrical clutter. Coordinating lumbar pillows included. Recipient of the 2013 iF Design Award and the 2013 Red Dot Design Award for Product Design.

product.name: Buoy Stool - Black
product.description: Designed to accommodate modern, mobile working environments, Buoy by turnstone is designed to work where you do. Weighing only 20 pounds and with a built-in handle, Buoy can travel anywhere in the office environment––perfect for impromptu meetings or collaborative work environments. Adjustable height ensures suitability for every body. Winner of Best of Neocon Innovation Award for Guest Seating, 2013. Made in USA.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Power Pod
product.description: Convenience and functionality blend into elegant design with Coalesse’s PowerPod. Designed by Scott Wilson and MINIMAL, PowerPod delivers two functions in one. When needed, the PowerPod houses six power outlets with built-in surge-suppression. When not needed, the outlet is converted to a sleek pencil organizer and accessory tray. Energy-saving on/off switch reduces vampire power consumption.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: 104 Series Watch - Blue/Pewter
product.description: Created by Oliver Fowles and Patrick Bek for Uniform Wares with an eye towards sophisticated British design, the 104 Series watch takes its inspiration from the minimal form industrial factory wall clocks. The design features contrasting cases and bezels and slim, long minute markers. The 104 Series functions on Swiss-made movement. Included in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art San Francisco.

product.description: Created by Oliver Fowles and Patrick Bek for Uniform Wares with an eye towards sophisticated British design, the 104 Series watch takes its inspiration from the minimal form industrial factory wall clocks. product.name: 203 Series Watch - Brown
product.description: The 203 Series was created by Oliver Fowles and Patrick Bek for Uniform Wares and inspired by the utilitarian beauty of mechanical stopwatches. With Swiss-made, 23-jewel movement, the 203 Series registers the time in hours, minutes and seconds, in addition to date and split chronograph functions. With minimal ornamentation, this simple and refined design is contemporary take on the classic chronograph watch. Included in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art San Francisco.

product.name: 203 Series Watch - Black
product.description: The 203 Series was created by Oliver Fowles and Patrick Bek for Uniform Wares and inspired by the utilitarian beauty of mechanical stopwatches.
