product.name: Pantop Pendant Light - White
product.description: The Pantop Pendant lamp from Verpan is a bold ceiling light that provides warm, direct lighting, and is best utilized in a dining room or over a counter in an open kitchen. Defined by its distinctive bell shape, the Pantop provides a refreshing take on the limits of overhead lighting. The widely flared shade is mounted with the aperture facing down, and is suspended from a fabric cord. Originally designed in 1964 by Verner Panton, the Pantop Pendant can be used as a single ceiling light, or arranged with other Pantops to create a striking visual statement.

product.name: Pantop Pendant Light - Black

product.description: The legendary designers Charles and Ray Eames pursued every form of creativity––from filmmaking to drawing to furniture design. With the House of Cards collection of inspiring creative images, the designers encourage you to do the same. Each notebook features essentials for any doodler, drawer, thinker or writer: an elastic closure to keep your pages secure, a bookmark to find your place and an expandable interior pocket to stash extra goodies you find along your travels.

product.name: Fun 1DM Pendant Light
product.description: The Fun Pendant Lamp was designed by Verner Panton in 1964. One of the most respected Danish designers of the 20th century, Panton was known for his innovative use of plastics and unconventional materials. Reproduced by Verpan, the Fun 1DM Pendant lamp effervesces soft light. This elegant construction is made from a three ring metal frame with descending threads of lightly opaque mother-of-pearl discs. The delicately textured finish of the shell provides a warm glow that disperses soft light. When touched, the motion of the shells provides a cheerful jingle, giving further personality to this innovative design and lending a sculptural and organic feeling to any living environment.

product.name: Fun 2DM Pendant Light
product.description: The Fun Pendant Lamp was designed by Verner Panton in 1964. One of the most respected Danish designers of the 20th century, Panton was known for his innovative use of plastics and unconventional materials. Reproduced by Verpan, the Fun Pendant lamp effervesces soft light. This elegant construction is made from a three ring metal frame with descending threads of lightly opaque mother-of-pearl discs. The delicately textured finish of the shell provides a warm glow that disperses soft light. When touched, the motion of the shells provides a cheerful jingle, giving further personality to this innovative design and lending a sculptural and organic feeling to any living environment.

product.name: Fun 1DA Pendant Light
product.description: Designed in 1964 by legendary Danish 20th century designer Verner Panton, the Fun 1DA Pendant Lamp is reproduced for today’s design enthusiast by Verpan. This elegantly constructed ceiling-mount pendant lamp is made from a three ring metal frame with descending strands of shimmering metal discs. Combined to form a cohesive whole, these brilliant circles glisten like the scales of a fish or gleaming beads. When illuminated, the reflective surfaces enliven any space with dynamic, ethereal light. When touched, the discs emit a soft twinkling sound that lends further animation to the lively design and lends beauty and dimension to any room.

product.name: Fun 2DA Pendant Light
product.description: Designed in 1964 by legendary Danish 20th century designer Verner Panton, the Fun 2DA Pendant Lamp is reproduced for today’s design enthusiast by Verpan. This elegantly constructed ceiling-mount pendant lamp is made from a three ring metal frame with descending strands of shimmering metal discs. Combined to form a cohesive whole, these brilliant circles glisten like the scales of a fish or gleaming beads. When illuminated, the reflective surfaces enliven any space with dynamic, ethereal light. When touched, the discs emit a soft twinkling sound that lends further animation to the lively design and lends beauty and dimension to any room.

product.name: Moon Pendant Light - 34 cm
product.description: Moon was designed by the seminal Danish 20th century designer Verner Panton in 1960 and is reproduced for today’s design enthusiast by Verpan. Poetic and sculptural, Moon is a spherical lamp made from a series of metal lamellae. Once the bulb is inserted, each fin of the Moon lampshade can be individually adjusted, allowing for complete seclusion of the bulb, or for a more direct exposure to the source of light. When completely unfurled, Moon presents an engaging and dynamic design that adds visual intrigue to its environment. Note: Moon will be shipped in environmentally-friendly flat packaging to reduce our carbon footprint.

product.name: Eames Mugs - Set of 6
product.description: Drawn from Charles and Ray Eames House of Cards collection of creatively attuned photographs of artist’s tools, these Eames Mugs are perfect for the budding artist, or the established professional. This set of six mugs is made from durable and lightweight bone china and is microwave and dishwasher safe.

product.name: Goddard Sofa - Dove Velvet
product.description: Designed by Russell Pinch for The Future Perfect, the Goddard Sofa blends bohemian glamour with superlative comfort. A sprung back and seat provide support while plush cushioning enables luxurious comfort. The sofa’s silhouette and walnut legs add understated elegance to any room’s décor.

product.name: Linden Chandelier - satin
product.description: Conceived of by designer Charles de Lisle for The Future Perfect, the Linden Chandelier takes its inspiration from a just-cut flowering bough. The organic form—crafted entirely from solid brass—gracefully suspends from its ceiling mount, adding drama and elegance to a poetically modern design.

product.name: Linden Chandelier - polished
product.description: Conceived of by designer Charles de Lisle for The Future Perfect, the Linden Chandelier takes its inspiration from a just-cut flowering bough. The organic form—crafted entirely from solid brass—gracefully suspends from its ceiling mount, adding drama and elegance to a poetically modern design.

product.name: TID no. 1 Watch - Black Watch Face
product.description: Stockholm based watchmaker TID, founded by Ola Eriksson and design studio Form Us With Love, takes its name from Swedish word for “time.” Its No.1 Watch is a perfect expression of the brand’s minimalist chic— all of its functions stripped down to the essential. Watch is made from milled stainless steel and finished with a black ion coating for durability. Features an easy-to-read dial and sports an adjustable strap.

product.name: Kent Sofa - White/Black Wool
product.description: Designer Jason Miller created the Kent Sofa for The Future Perfect with disparate influences in mind: the retro glamor of mid-century sofa silhouettes with the deep craftsmanship of traditional Shaker woodworking. The result is entirely contemporary. With a solid walnut plinth and legs and thoughtful upholstery detailing, the Kent Sofa exudes modern warmth.

product.name: Tardi Sofa - 2 Seater - Camel/Yellow
product.description: Inspired by her experience growing up in the 1970s as the daughter of an interior decorator, designer Lindsey Adelman created the Tardi Sofa––smartly named because “it took a damn long time.” The sensible silhouette is punctuated by the sofa’s playful colorways, evoking an element of surprise and irreverence and adding visual intrigue to any décor.

product.name: Wooden Tissue Box - White Oak
product.description: The Wooden Tissue Box by Taiwanese designer Lee Weilang is crafted from thin laminated wood that wraps magnetically around the base, maintaining its smooth and highly sculptural shape. To fill, simply take tissue paper from its original container and place inside the Wooden Tissue Box. Can be hung on a wall or stand alone.

product.name: Wooden Tissue Box - Sandalwood
product.description: The Wooden Tissue Box by Taiwanese designer Lee Weilang is crafted from thin laminated wood that wraps magnetically around the base, maintaining its smooth and highly sculptural shape. To fill, simply take tissue paper from its original container and place inside the Wooden Tissue Box. Can be hung on a wall or stand alone.

product.name: Paper Pot Tissue Holder - Black
product.description: Winner of the 2008 Japan Good Design Award, the Paper Pot is not your average tissue or toilet paper holder. Created by Japanese design house AI Collection, its fun sculptural shape—and vibrant color options—will make a cheerful addition to any kitchen or bathroom. Also makes a great housewarming gift.

product.name: Lumberjack Candle Holders - Small
product.description: Danish designer Simon Legald was inspired by the silhouette created in a tree trunk as lumberjacks slowly chop away toward its center when he conceived of this colorful series of Lumberjack Candle Holders. Each set is carved from a single, cylindrical piece of solid wood. Made in Denmark.

product.name: Lumberjack Candle Holders - Medium
product.description: Danish designer Simon Legald was inspired by the silhouette created in a tree trunk as lumberjacks slowly chop away toward its center when he conceived of this colorful series of Lumberjack Candle Holders. product.name: Ready Hook with Mirror - White
product.description: Created by British designer Kirsty Whyte for Normann Copenhagen, the Ready Hook with Mirror is a practical and playful home accessory. A mirror is integrated into the distinctive shape of the coat hook, inviting the eyes in myriad ways. The hook itself is exceptionally sturdy so coats, scarves and handbags are sure to stay in place.

product.name: Ready Hook with Mirror - Grey
product.description: Created by British designer Kirsty Whyte for Normann Copenhagen, the Ready Hook with Mirror is a practical and playful home accessory. product.name: Mag Table - Birch
product.description: The flexible Mag Table from Offi is a multipurpose table that, as its name suggests, provides a convenient space for storing magazines. The side table features a tabletop and an open side that resembles a file folder, which provides easy-to-access storage for media. In addition to its storage and side table function, the Mag Table can be used as a laptop desk. By simply flipping the desk on its side, the table becomes a perfectly sized laptop desk. The S-shape that the Mag Table creates in this position provides a convenient opening for knees when the table is used while sitting on the couch.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Mag Table - Walnut
product.description: The flexible Mag Table from Offi is a multi-purpose table that, as its name suggests, provides a convenient space for storing magazines. product.name: Nest Bassinet - Maple
product.description: The Nest Bassinet by Offi is a modern piece that is defined by its clean, simple design and blending of sleek materials. The chrome metal legs support the body of the bassinet, which is crafted from bent plywood with rich wood veneers. The plywood construction makes the bassinet lightweight and easy to reposition—the head and foot of the include convenient chrome handles—as well as sturdy. The bassinet features soft sides made of 100 percent cotton, and a foam mattress that is comfortable while still being firm for new babies. The elegant design of the Nest Bassinet makes it a perfect piece for baby that still maintains the contemporary style of modern bedrooms.

product.name: Nest Bassinet - Walnut
product.description: The Nest Bassinet by Offi is a modern piece that is defined by its clean, simple design and blending of sleek materials. The chrome metal legs support the body of the bassinet, which is crafted from bent plywood with rich wood veneers. The plywood construction makes the bassinet lightweight and easy to reposition—the head and foot of the include convenient chrome handles—as well as sturdy. The bassinet features soft sides made of 100 percent cotton, and a foam mattress that is comfortable while still being firm for new babies. The elegant design of the Nest Bassinet makes it a perfect piece for baby that still maintains the contemporary style of modern bedrooms.

product.name: Block Table Rolling Kitchen Cart
product.description: The light and airy design of Block Table, created by Danish designer Simon Legald, offers a fresh take on the familiar tray table. Outfitted with wheels and four handles extending from the legs, it is easy to move around as well as highly versatile. May be used as a side table, tea table, coffee table or bedside table.

product.name: Dustpan & Broom
product.description: Irritated by the dust and clay lying around his workshop, designer Ole Jensen began sweeping it up with a basic broom onto a folded newspaper. His system worked well enough that he decided to perfect it, spawning the idea for this innovative Dustpan & Broom. The flat polypropylene pan and beech broom with natural bristles allow you to clean with precision and style. When finished, simply rest the brush through the small hole in the pan and hang on the wall.

product.name: Embrace Media Table
product.description: Offi’s Embrace Media Table is s a furnishing that takes multifunction to another level. The table features two low tables that can be formed together—in an embrace—to create a storage space for books, DVDs, or other media. When connected, the tables create an extra space on each side, creating a perfect storage space for ready-to-read magazines. The low tables can also be used separately as a laptop table when sitting on the couch, as a children’s desk and bench, or even as a serving tray for breakfast in bed. The natural wood grain make it an occasional table that blends well into an existing décor.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Fold Tray
product.description: The Fold Tray from Offi is a traditional serving piece with unexpected elements. Made from a revolutionary material called e2e in Ithaca, New York, the tray is 100 percent biodegradable. The material is made from a combination of soy resin, grass fiber, water, and other natural ingredients like beeswax and seaweed. In addition to the Fold Tray’s environmentally friendly construction, it also features subtle folds at the sides of the tray, which is not only a distinct design element, but also serves a functional purpose—the tray is easy to carry, and items like napkins are less likely to slide off the tray with the protection of the folded lip. The Fold Tray is not only an effective serving tool, but can also be used as an accent or focal point on a coffee table or side table.

product.name: Look Me Kid's Chair
product.description: The Look-Me Kid’s Chair is an excellent choice for a playroom or a kid’s table. The open back of the chair provides a sense of lightness, almost as if it’s actually a stool. But the frame of the chair back provides support so little ones will not slip off. The open-backed frame also doubles as a handle, making the Look-Me Chair easy to move. Crafted from molded birch plywood, the chair is both lightweight and durable, making it an ideal choice for kids. The Look-Me Chair is a companion piece to Offi’s Woody Chalkboard Table.

product.name: W Molded Ply Magazine Stand - Birch
product.description: The W Molded Magazine Stand by Offi is a desk or tabletop organizer that can store magazines, files, paperwork, and other items that need corralling. Designed in the shape of a W, the stand has two compartments so it is easy to divide past and current magazine issues, or even paid and unpaid bills. The stand is crafted from molded plywood and includes a handle to make it easy to transport. The curved lines and natural wood grain of the stand create an organic feel that will be a welcome addition to an office space.

product.name: Scando Coffee Table
product.description: This low coffee table designed by Eric Pfeiffer for Offi is intended for small interiors that need furniture to work for everyone at home. The low stature of the table make it an inviting piece for young children—both as a place to pull up to stand for early walkers, and later as the ideal height for sitting at when coloring or eating a snack. For adults, the low table is a welcome piece for confined living spaces, as it blends into the existing area without taking too much free space away. The side storage on the Scando also provides a convenient place for storage, like holding coffee table books when the table is used as a child’s desktop or snack table.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Woody Chalkboard Table
product.description: This round table from Offi is the ideal table for children—it’s furniture they can draw on, without getting into trouble. The tabletop is covered with a black chalkboard surface, so children can color directly and safely onto the tabletop. The center of the table includes a built-in bowl, so chalk and erasers can be stored easily when not in use. The sturdy table legs are crafted from molded birch plywood that is sturdy enough to support years of tabletop drawing and the occasional kick from excited legs. The Woody Chalkboard table is a companion piece to Offi’s Look-Me Chair.

product.name: Mag Table - Black Laminate
product.description: The flexible Mag Table from Offi is a multipurpose table that, as its name suggests, provides a convenient space for storing magazines. The side table features a tabletop and an open side that resembles a file folder, which provides easy-to-access storage for media. In addition to its storage and side table function, the Mag Table can be used as a laptop desk. By simply flipping the desk on its side, the table becomes a perfectly sized laptop desk. The S-shape that the Mag Table creates in this position provides a convenient opening for knees when the table is used while sitting on the couch.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Bubble Stool - Light Grey
product.description: Designed by Objekten’s CEO and Co-founder Alain Berteau, the Bubble Stool is an innovative accent piece. Instead of being filled with foam or other fillers like traditional poufs, the Bubble Stool is filled with air. The lack of material filler makes the Bubble Stool an environmentally friendly choice that can be adjusted easily for comfort. The ultra light Bubble Stool is easy to move and store when not in use. Covered with thick knitted wool, the Bubble Stool has a cozy look, and will provide an attractive seating option in a living room or den.

product.name: Kontex Flax Line Organic Towel - Face
product.description: From Imabari, Japan, the Flax Line Organics towels are woven using traditional weaving machines at a slow speed to bring out the natural silky softness of the fibers. One side of each towel is made from woven cotton; the reverse features a highly absorbent looped cotton terrycloth pile made from 100% organic cotton. These distinctive towels feature a delicate chevron border, adding subtle coloration to the woven structure.

product.name: Kontex Flax Line Organic Towel - Guest
product.description: From Imabari, Japan, the Flax Line Organics towels are woven using traditional weaving machines at a slow speed to bring out the natural silky softness of the fibers. One side of each towel is made from woven cotton; the reverse features a highly absorbent looped cotton terrycloth pile made from 100% organic cotton. These distinctive towels feature a delicate chevron border, adding subtle coloration to the woven structure.

product.name: Kontex Flax Line Organic Towel - Bath
product.description: From Imabari, Japan, the Flax Line Organics towels are woven using traditional weaving machines at a slow speed to bring out the natural silky softness of the fibers. One side of each towel is made from woven cotton; the reverse features a highly absorbent looped cotton terrycloth pile made from 100% organic cotton. These distinctive towels feature a delicate chevron border, adding subtle coloration to the woven structure.

product.name: Yoshii Two-Tone Chambray Towel - Face
product.description: Though undeniably beautiful, the true magic of the Two-Tone Chambray Towel lies in its origins. The thoughtfully produced thread of these woven towels is made from 100% hand-picked, raw cotton that is naturally separated from the seed to prevent the tearing of the fibers. The result is a silky soft textile that is fast-drying, highly absorbent and durable enough for everyday use. Designed by Maho Ukai.

product.name: Yoshii Two-Tone Chambray Towel - Guest
product.description: Though undeniably beautiful, the true magic of the Two-Tone Chambray Towel lies in its origins. The thoughtfully produced thread of these woven towels is made from 100 percent hand-picked, raw cotton that is naturally separated from the seed to prevent the tearing of the fibers. The result is a silky soft textile that is fast-drying, highly absorbent and durable enough for everyday use. Designed by Maho Ukai.

product.name: Yoshii Linen Border Towel - Face
product.description: Made from 92-percent cotton and 8-percent linen, the Linen Border Towel highlights a spirited stripe pattern. On one half, the pattern features light-colored stripes on a bright white background. On the other half, the pattern is reversed: dark-colored stripes contrast with a natural white background. Designed by Maho Ukai and made in Japan.

product.name: Yoshii Linen Border Towel - Guest
product.description: Made from 92-percent cotton and 8-percent linen, the Linen Border Towel highlights a spirited stripe pattern. product.name: Yoshii Square Towel - Grey
product.description: The thoughtfully produced thread of the Square Towel is made from 100% hand-picked, raw cotton that is naturally separated from the seed to prevent the tearing of the fibers. This elegant pattern combines a bold block of color with a graphic white and grey striped side. A convenient fabric loop makes the Square Towel easily hung for access when you need it. Designed by Maho Ukai and made in Japan.

product.name: Yoshii Square Towel - Orange
product.description: The thoughtfully produced thread of the Square Towel is made from 100% hand-picked, raw cotton that is naturally separated from the seed to prevent the tearing of the fibers. product.name: Switch Wireless Speaker - Black
product.description: From Native Union, Switch is a portable three-way speaker, conference call unit and mobile phone charger. Switch pairs wirelessly with Bluetooth® devices so you can stream your music anywhere you are. Designed by professional sound engineers, Switch includes an active sub-woofer and enhanced bass-reflex system to produce a full range of frequencies with superlative clarity.

product.name: Slim Barstool
product.description: Designed by Objekten’s CEO and Co-founder Alain Berteau, the Slim Barstool is a contemporary take on a classic piece of furniture. The barstool is pared down to a restrained profile with a leather seat and a compact base. The steel frame creates a rounded rectangular shape that supports the seat and narrows to a sturdy cylindrical column and circular base. Berteau’s choice of a geometric silhouette is a decidedly modern one— the stool is a suitable accent for minimalist interiors. The Slim Barstool swivels, and the base of the rectangular frame can be used as a footrest.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Binchotan Pumice Stone
product.description: Created by artisans in the Kishu region of Japan, Binchotan charcoal has been used for centuries to purify and detoxify. This specialized charcoal is made from burnt oak branches and then ground to be ultra-fine. The Binchotan Pumice Stone incorporates this ancient charcoal to gently exfoliate the skin. For best results, use in the bath or shower to slough off dry or dead skin cells to reveal soft, cleansed skin.

product.name: Binchotan Body Scrub Towel
product.description: Using an ancient method in the Kishu region of Japan, Binchotan charcoal is created by burning oak branches at extremely high temperatures. This highly purifying charcoal has been blended into the fibers of the ultra-effective Binchotan Body Scrub Towel. For use in the shower or bath, this unique washcloth will help absorb orders, detoxify the body and remove excess oil from the skin.

product.name: Chikuno Cube Charcoal Air Purifier
product.description: Made in Kyoto, Japan, the Chikuno Cube naturally purifies the air with the power of activated bamboo charcoal and clay minerals. The unique micro-honeycomb structure of the Chikuno Cube increases the surface area and efficacy of the square, making this tiny object capable of absorbing odors and purifying the air in an enclosed space up to 17-square feet—perfect for refrigerators, closets, and bathrooms. Recipient of the Japanese Good Design award in 2008.

product.name: FD-GR Grater
product.description: Part of the FDStyle suite of products designed by Hagino Mitsonobu, the Grater is created for the discerning home chef whose tools are as essential as his or her cuisine. Ergonomic by design, the Grater is coated in a fluorocarbon polymer, giving it a chic matte black finish and an enduring rustproof exterior. Recipient of the Good Design award in 2009. Made in Japan.

product.name: FD-SS Smart Scissors
product.description: The Smart Scissors are designed by Hagino Mitsonobu as part of the FDStyle suite of products for the style-savvy home. The strong stainless-steel Japanese blade is sharp enough for outdoor tasks like trimming small branches, but delicate enough for indoor fine kitchen-work such as mincing herbs or cutting flowers. Recipient of the Good Design award in 2009. Make in Japan.

product.name: Kizara Maru Plate Set
product.description: Environmental protection blends with elegant design in the Kizara Maru Plate Set. Made from pine trees sourced from healthy sustainable forests in Japan, these disposable wooden plates are recyclable. Because of the specialized production process, no two plates are the same––each reveals its own intricate wood grain pattern for a alluring place setting at home, or in the outdoors.

product.name: Original Planter Box - White
product.description: Handcrafted in San Francisco by Yield Design Co, these planters lend contemporary warmth to your houseplants. Each planter is carefully stained and then cut into at an angled edge to reveal the subtle grain of raw birch plywood underneath––a perfect home for your kitchen herbs, sculptural succulents or flowering blooms. Because each planter is handcrafted, variations between each piece should be expected.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.description: Made with zippers instead of seams, the Picnic Bag from Yield Design Co. can open to lay entirely flat, providing a clean surface for outdoor dining. Made from water-resistant duck canvas, this all-weather carryall is optimal storage for groceries, lunches or any sundry goods picked up on the go. Natural leather details.

product.name: Arch Cutting Boards - Small
product.description: Beautifully crafted from birch wood, the Arch Chopping Board from Danish design studio Hay is as aesthetically pleasing as it is functional. Rounded corners and an impeccably smooth surface make the Arch Chopping Board ideal for serving fruit, cheese or other tapas––or for just preparing them.

product.name: Steel Bookends - Set of 3
product.description: An elegantly simple yet distinguished solution to book storage, the Bookend by Danish design studio Hay. Based around the principle “form follows function,” the Bookend design is sleek and minimal, allowing the object to recede and the emphasis to be on the books themselves. Made from steel.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Colour Glass - Carafe - Yellow Gradient
product.description: From the design duo Scholten & Baijings for Hay comes the Colour Glass collection. Using a unique language of color, form and line, the Colour Glass system employs a distinctive visual cue for each type of glass: gold lines to signify sparkling wine, a swath of pink to reference red wine, gold dots and color gradients for water. Combined with other pieces from the Colour Glass collection, a rich interplay of color and line is formed. Made from crystal glass.

product.name: DLM Table - 38 cm - black
product.description: From designer Thomas Bentzen for the Danish design studio Hay, the DLM (Don’t Leave Me) table’s cheeky design gives proof to its name: take it with you. product.name: Lup Candle Holder - Black Triangle
product.description: Inspired by Scandinavian tradition and the short daylight hours of the Northern climate, the Lup Candleholder brings warmth and light into the home. The minimal construction creates a continuous line and minimal form. The Lup Candleholder is made from copper which, when illuminated by candlelight, will glow. Designed by Shane Schneck for Hay.

product.name: Lup Candle Holder - Copper Triangle
product.description: Inspired by Scandinavian tradition and the short daylight hours of the Northern climate, the Lup Candleholder brings warmth and light into the home. product.name: Paper Carpet 80 x 200 - Cinnamon Powder
product.description: Designed by Scholten & Baijings for Danish design studio Hay, the Paper Carpet features the duo’s signature color gradients and soft palette. The unique construction of the Paper Carpet provides further visual intrigue: paper thread is woven together to form pattern. The carpet is reinforced by a rubber-coated backing making the Paper Carpet slip-resistant.

product.description: Designed by Scholten & Baijings for Danish design studio Hay, the Paper Carpet features the duo’s signature color gradients and soft palette. The carpet is reinforced by a rubber-coated backing making the Paper Carpet slip-resistant.

product.description: Created by innovative textile designer and weaver Merete Erbou Laurent, the Paper Mat features an inspired combination of natural and fluorescent yarns, adding dimension to the textile. product.name: Point Pillow - Brick and Greige
product.description: Designed by British fashion icon Paul Smith, the Point textile from Maharam combines traditional craftsmanship with bold use of color to create thoroughly modern patterns. Rayon warp and weft yarns are woven together and secured by a nylon binder, creating a rich texture evocative of fine embroidery. Used as a pure decorative or for comfort, the Point by Paul Smith Pillow adds smart sophistication to any room.

product.name: Point Pillow - Cobalt
product.description: Designed by British fashion icon Paul Smith, the Point textile from Maharam combines traditional craftsmanship with bold use of color to create thoroughly modern patterns. Rayon warp and weft yarns are woven together and secured by a nylon binder, creating a rich texture evocative of fine embroidery. Used as a pure decorative or for comfort, the Point by Paul Smith Pillow adds smart sophistication to any room.

product.name: Point Pillow - Cyan
product.description: Designed by British fashion icon Paul Smith, the Point textile from Maharam combines traditional craftsmanship with bold use of color to create thoroughly modern patterns. Rayon warp and weft yarns are woven together and secured by a nylon binder, creating a rich texture evocative of fine embroidery. Used as pure decorative or for comfort, the Point by Paul Smith Pillow adds smart sophistication to any room.

product.name: Point Pillow - Ivory and Ember
product.description: Designed by British fashion icon Paul Smith, the Point textile from Maharam combines traditional craftsmanship with bold use of color to create thoroughly modern patterns. Used as a pure decorative or for comfort, the Point by Paul Smith Pillow adds smart sophistication to any room.

product.name: Layers Pillow - Park Fabric
product.description: Berlin-based designer Hella Jongerius––known for fusing traditional craft with modern production methods––has created the Layers textile pattern for Maharam. The rich textile collection includes three embroidered patterns on wool-blend felt: Layers Garden, Layers Park and Layers Vineyard. Intricate needlework and cut-away layers speak to the tradition of handicraft, while the evocative pattern calls to mind natural landscapes. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Layers Pillow - Park Double Fabric
product.description: Berlin-based designer Hella Jongerius— known for fusing traditional craft with modern production methods— has created the Layers textile pattern for Maharam. The rich textile collection includes three embroidered patterns on wool-blend felt: Layers Garden, Layers Park and Layers Vineyard. Intricate needlework and cut-away layers speak to the tradition of handicraft, while the evocative pattern calls to mind natural landscapes. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Layers Pillow - Vineyard Small Fabric
product.description: Berlin-based designer Hella Jongerius— known for fusing traditional craft with modern production methods— has created the Layers textile pattern for Maharam. The rich textile collection includes three embroidered patterns on wool-blend felt: Layers Garden, Layers Park and Layers Vineyard. Intricate needlework and cut-away layers speak to the tradition of handicraft, while the evocative pattern calls to mind natural landscapes. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Borders Pillow - Natural
product.description: Inspired by narrow backstrap loom weavings of Guatemala and Mexico that are traditionally stitched together with ornate embroidery, Berlin-based designer Hella Jongerius created the Borders textile. The intricate patterns found on the Borders pillow––taken from archetypal stitching motifs––intersect to form an irregular grid adding visual allure to this considered textile. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Borders Pillow - Walnut
product.description: Inspired by narrow backstrap loom weavings of Guatemala and Mexico that are traditionally stitched together with ornate embroidery, Berlin-based designer Hella Jongerius created the Borders textile. The intricate patterns found on the Borders pillow––taken from archetypal stitching motifs––intersect to form an irregular grid adding visual allure to this considered textile. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Repeat Classic Stripe Pillow - Poppy
product.description: The pillow that started it all. Repeat Classic Stripe was Dutch industrial designer Hella Jongerius’s first collaboration with Maharam. First introduced in 2002, the textile was the first of many in the pair’s productive partnership. Repeat Classic Stripe features a large scale repetition of archival elements. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Repeat Classic Stripe Pillow - Peacock
product.description: The pillow that started it all. Repeat Classic Stripe was Dutch industrial designer Hella Jongerius’s first collaboration with Maharam. First introduced in 2002, the textile was the first of many in the pair’s productive partnership. Repeat Classic Stripe features a large scale repetition of archival elements. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Vases Pillow - Pheasant
product.description: Part of Dutch industrial designer Hella Jongerius’s ongoing investigation into traditional craft techniques and modern methods of production, the Vases textile pattern uses the designer’s iconic 1997 Red White Vase as a repeated pattern motif. The Red White Vase itself has served as a source of inspiration for the designer, acting as a sculptural canvas for Jongerius’s continuing color experiments. Pillow contains duck feather fill.

product.name: Frame Bag - Dark Blue
product.description: Designed by Munich-based industrial designer Konstantin Grcic, the Frame Bag marries durable industrial materials with refined aesthetics for a bag that is as functional as it is alluring. Made from ripstop nylon, an intricate lattice webbing provides visual connection between the handles and the sturdy vinyl base. Interior pocket provides additional organization.

product.name: Frame Bag - Orange
product.description: Designed by Munich-based industrial designer Konstantin Grcic, the Frame Bag marries durable industrial materials with refined aesthetics for a bag that is as functional as it is alluring. Made from ripstop nylon, an intricate lattice webbing provides visual connection between the handles and the sturdy vinyl base. Interior pocket provides additional organization.

product.name: Amsterdam Bag - Green/Natural
product.description: Humble but refined, the Amsterdam Bag from Maharam lends casual elegance to modern utility. Made from waxed cotton canvas, the Amsterdam Bag is sturdy and enduring. Interior pocket provides additional storage and organization while smartly-stitched leather handles add a touch of sophistication.

product.name: Amsterdam Bag - Brown/Natural
product.description: Humble but refined, the Amsterdam Bag from Maharam lends casual elegance to modern utility. Made from waxed cotton canvas, the Amsterdam Bag is sturdy and enduring. Interior pocket provides additional storage and organization while smartly-stitched leather handles add a touch of sophistication.

product.name: Tube Bag - Blue
product.description: The Tube Bag––designed by Munich-based industrial designer Konstantin Grcic––is the antidote to drab carryalls. Perfectly suited for the necessities of urban living, the Tube Bag is made from a robust polyurethane shell and padded ripstop nylon interior. An adjustable nylon strap ensures a comfortable fit while two front pockets and a secure zip compartment ensure organization on the go.

product.name: Tube Bag - Olive
product.description: The Tube Bag––designed by Munich-based industrial designer Konstantin Grcic––is the antidote to drab carryalls. Perfectly suited for the necessities of urban living, the Tube Bag is made from a robust polyurethane shell and padded ripstop nylon interior. An adjustable nylon strap ensures a comfortable fit while two front pockets and a secure zip compartment ensure organization on the go.

product.name: Bank in the Form of a Pig - Pale Pink Chrome
product.description: The cast for designer Harry Allen’s iconic piggy bank was made from a real pig who unfortunately died of natural causes. He lives on forever though, in this resin and marble bank which holds up to $10,000 in dollar bills.

product.name: Bank in the Form of a Pig - Pale Blue Chrome
product.description: The cast for designer Harry Allen’s iconic piggy bank was made from a real pig who unfortunately died of natural causes. He lives on forever though, in this resin and marble bank which holds up to $10,000 in dollar bills.

product.name: Cubebot Toy Robot - Micro
product.description: Designer David Weeks reimagines the toy robot—miraculously, without the use of plastic or battery power. Its durable hardwood frame, inspired by Japanese Shinto Kumi-ki puzzles, can endure generations of play. At the same time, its elastic-band muscles and sturdy wood limbs can hold dozens poses while remaining impervious to breakage. When at rest, the robot folds up into a perfect cube. Crafted from unpainted beech wood.

product.name: Architectural Pottery 21-L Bird Shelter
product.description: Produced using 100% recyclable materials, the 21-L Bird Shelter designed by Malcolm Leland is a chic and eco-friendly way to house your feathered friends. A favorite of iconic Los Angeles architects Richard Neutra and Pierre Koenig, the sleek shapes of the Architectural Pottery Collection add contemporary cool indoors and out. Hand crafted from water and clay by VesseL U.S.A.

product.name: Architectural Pottery AP-100 Pineapple Planter
product.description: Designed by David Cressey, the Pineapple Planter from The Architectural Pottery Collection adds a touch of tropicalia to your favorite fern or potted plant. The uniquely textured honeycomb exterior adds richness and depth to any environment. An optional drain hole may be included for outdoor use. Made from fiberglass in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Architectural Pottery G-21 with Metal Stand
product.description: With a deep ceramic basin and a stylish tripod black metal stand, the G-21 planter with MS-G stand adds understated elegance to household plants. Designed by John Follis, the ceramic basin is handcrafted using 100% recyclable materials. A favorite of iconic Los Angeles architects Richard Neutra and Pierre Koenig. Made in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Architectural Pottery IN-1 Vase
product.description: Designed by La Gardo Tackett as part of The Architectural Pottery Collection, the IN-1 Vase creates a sculptural base for arrangements or potted plants. Skillfully produced by hand with 100% recyclable materials. A favorite of iconic Los Angeles architects Richard Neutra and Pierre Koenig. Made in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Home Accents > Vases

product.name: Architectural Pottery IN-2 Vase
product.description: Part of The Architectural Pottery Collection and designed by La Gardo Tackett, the IN-2 Vase gives height and presence to arrangements or potted plants. A favorite of iconic Los Angeles architects Richard Neutra and Pierre Koenig. Skillfully produced by hand with 100% recyclable materials. Made in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Home Accents > Vases

product.name: La Gardo Tackett TH-1 Vessel
product.description: Using proprietary glazing and firing techniques, the TH-1 planter delights in form and function. Designed by La Gardo Tackett, the TH-1 planter is skillfully produced by hand and made from 100% recyclable materials. Part of The Architectural Pottery Collection. Handmade in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: La Gardo Tackett TH-2 Vessel
product.description: Made from materials from the earth, to house materials of the earth. Minimal yet chic, the environmentally-friendly TH-2 planter––designed by La Gardo Tackett––is skillfully produced by hand and made from 100% recyclable materials. Part of The Architectural Pottery Collection. Handmade in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Architectural Pottery Model F-508 Peanut Planter
product.description: Designed by John Follis, the playful form of the ceramic Peanut Planter is supported by an elegant walnut wood stand creating an ideal canvas for evocative arrangements. Made from 100% recyclable materials. Part of The Architectural Pottery Collection. Handmade in the U.S.A. by VesseL.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Cast Iron Menorah
product.description: Simple and sturdy, yet perfectly ceremonial, Josh Owen’s Cast Iron Menorah— included in the permanent collection of The National Museum of American Jewish History— was designed with continual use in mind. It features clever details such as an integrated tray to catch wax drippings and a safe resting place for recently used matches to cool down. Over time, the cast iron will take on a patina, making it more beautiful with each use.

product.name: Barbell Rattle
product.description: For the baby—or new parents—who march to a different tune, Noel Wiggins’s barbell-shaped rattle is a terrific gift indeed. This gleaming creation, rendered in German silver, is hand-tuned and features 16 distinct tones. Packaged in a presentation gift box. Adult supervision required.

product.name: Alphabet Block Set
product.description: Designer Pat Kim turns mahogany and pine into a graphic and highly tactile alphabet. Perfect for stacking or building your own letterscape, this is a gift any typography enthusiast is sure to love. Each block is roughly 2 x 2 x 2 inches.

product.name: Balancing Blocks
product.description: From Brooklyn-based design studio Fort Standard comes this handsomely designed set of Balancing Blocks. Ten faceted, stone-sized shapes combine in myriad ways so you can create your own sculptures. Tumbled in water-based paint and packaged in a cotton drawstring bag.

product.name: Areaware Bottle Opener
product.description: Created by designer Brendan Ravenhill with the ultimate functionality in mind, the Bottle Opener in walnut wood features two magnets: one to adhere the opener to the refrigerator door (or any metallic surface), the other to catch the bottle cap. A design innovation worth a round of cheers.

product.name: Puzzlehead
product.description: A treat for both the stalwart music fan and creatively attuned child alike, Puzzlehead draws its inspiration from legendary musician, filmmaker and artist Richard McGuire. The intricately configured blocks can be put back together as a puzzle, or, stacked on top of one another and used as a construction toy. Used either way, Puzzlehead is sure to inspire.

product.name: Live Wireless Speaker - Slate Grey
product.description: Minimal and stylish, the Live speaker is designed by Kristian Krøyer for Scandinavian-based Libratone. This chic speaker uses a high-resolution wireless sound system with AirPlay and DLNA support to stream your favorite music from your iPod touch, iPhone, iPad, Mac/PC or Android device. The innovative Libratone PlayDirect™ eliminates need for a Wi-Fi access point while the FullRoom acoustic technology provides full, lush 360-degree stereo sound.

product.name: Live Wireless Speaker - Blueberry Black
product.description: Minimal and stylish, the Live speaker is designed by Kristian Krøyer for Scandinavian-based Libratone. product.name: Lounge Wireless Sound System - Slate Grey
product.description: The Lounge speaker, designed by Kristian Krøyer for Scandinavian-based Libratone emulates surround sound with five built-in speakers in one clean design. Built with wireless sound technology AirPlay and PlayDirect™, the Libratone Lounge is ideally suited for streaming both movies and music. The speaker also offers direct streaming capability from iPads, iPhones, iPod touch, Mac, Windows and Android devices via DLNA technology, as well as analog or digital connection to your TV. Wall-mount ready.

product.name: Loop Wireless Speaker - Grey
product.description: From designer Kristian Krøyer, the Libratone Loop offers impeccable stereo sound wrapped in a stylish Italian wool cover. Wall-mountable or free-standing, this chic speaker works wirelessly with Apple’s AirPlay and DLNA support for Android devices to stream all your tunes. The unit is also equipped with PlayDirect which allows a direct connection to iOS devices. Changeable wool covers allow Loop to adapt to any décor.

product.description: From designer Kristian Krøyer, the Libratone Loop offers impeccable stereo sound wrapped in a stylish Italian wool cover. product.name: Zipp Airplay Speaker - Salty Grey
product.description: Music for wherever you are, whenever you want. The Libratone Zipp from designer Kristian Krøyer is a portable speaker that projects 360-degree sound outfitted with AirPlay for iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch, Mac/PC, and Android devices. With a rechargeable battery, Zipp can travel anywhere— around the house, at work or even outdoors— while stylish Italian wool covers allow Zipp to fit in comfortably to any décor.

product.name: Zipp Airplay Speaker - Raspberry Red
product.description: Music for wherever you are, whenever you want. product.name: Costanza Floor Lamp - White
product.description: The Costanza Floor Lamp from Luceplan features a variety of design elements that make it a versatile lighting source. Designed by Paolo Rizzatto, the Costanza has a sensorial dimmer rod instead of a standard switch— a light touch adjusts to four levels of brightness. The lamp can adapt to a variety of spaces, as it utilizes an adjustable, telescopic rod to set the lamp at different heights. Lightweight and washable, the shade diffuses a warm light, making the Costanza a fitting accent to a cozy den or living room space. With its simple yet distinctive aspect, the Costanza is a thoughtfully designed, contemporary take on the traditional floor lamp.

product.description: The Costanza Table Lamp from Luceplan features a variety of design elements that make it a versatile lighting source. product.name: Miranda Floor Lamp - White
product.description: Made of sturdy aluminum and stunning blown glass, the Miranda Floor Lamp is designed around the sophisticated lamp holder. As the technical and conceptual center of the lamp, the holder contains the lamp’s switch, and it supports the bulb, diffuser, and connection to the base. The blown glass diffuser has a vaulted shape, reminiscent of a mushroom cap. This nod to nature, coupled with the clean, modern lines of the lamp, make Miranda a multifaceted piece, that is as much a functional lighting source as a striking visual focus for an interior space. With its adjustable, telescopic rod, the lamp can be set to different heights, enabling it to adapt to a variety of spaces.

product.name: Hope Chandelier - Medium
product.description: Where other chandeliers can be complicated and heavy, the Hope Chandelier from Luceplan provides a more optimistic installation. Crafted from incredibly light materials and easy to assemble, Hope reinterprets traditional chandeliers with a more sophisticated technology and contemporary materials. Although it appears to be made of glass, Hope consists of a series of thin polycarbonate Fresnel lenses, which are created by using imprinted microprisms on film to achieve a glass-like effect, without the limitations of thickness and weight. The effect of the materials is a lovely output of light that appears glittery—shards of light resemble the diamond that inspired the light’s name: Hope. This stunning fixture has earned the Red Dot Design award, Good Design award, the Compasso d’Oro, and the Premio dei Premi in 2011. Hope was designed by Francisco Gomez Paz and Paolo Rizzatto in 2009.

product.name: Hope Chandelier - Large
product.description: Where other chandeliers can be complicated and heavy, the Hope Chandelier from Luceplan provides a more optimistic installation. product.name: Otto Watt Task Lamp - Black
product.description: The Otto Watt Task Lamp from Luceplan is a versatile light source for a desk or side table. Designed by Alberto Meda and Paolo Rizzatto, Otto Watt goes beyond a basic dimming lamp with its temperature dimmer—by rotating the diffuser, you change from warm to cold white light, not simply dim to bright. As a result, Otto Watt is able to supply ideal lighting conditions, whether you are relaxing with a cup of coffee or completing a project that requires meticulous attention. The head swivels 360 degrees, and includes a glare-free filter. Otto Watt’s bendable body allows for up close, or more distant light, making it a versatile desk companion.

product.name: Bunad Blanket
product.description: Since 1918 the Mandal weaving mill has produced some of Norway’s finest textiles from natural fibers. It is here that designer Andreas Engesvik’s ICFF Textile award-winning collection of Bunad Blankets is made. Inspired by Norwegian national costumes and crafted in a variety of colors and patterns, these irresistible woolen blankets are perfect for snuggling up in style.

product.name: Cross Side Chair - Walnut - Dark Grey
product.description: From eco-friendly Juniper, the Cross Side chair takes its inspiration from the symmetry of an hourglass. Two interlocking profiles connect in perfect balance reducing the form to its most essential––and making the Cross Side Chair a perfect fit for stacking. Notes designer David Irwin, "The concept behind the Cross Chair and Edge Table was to pare back the structure to its minimum requirement whilst retaining an elegant form.” 100% latex cushion.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Edge Dining Table - Large - Black Walnut
product.description: Designed by David Irwin for Juniper, the Edge Table’s elegant design seamlessly integrates into any home environment. Each element of the Edge Table is evaluated for its environmental impact––from the sourcing of the wood to the recyclability of the packaging. Notes the manufacturer, “We set out to produce a chair and table that are adaptable, well made, and would reflect our environmental consciousness and commitment to our local communities."

product.name: THIN LED Task Lamp - Red Orange
product.description: Sleek and streamlined, THIN by designer Peter Bristol for Juniper is an innovative task light that generates the maximum amount of light while using a minimal of materials. The result: a powerful lamp that can produce over 500 lumens of warm white light while remaining modest in size. The ultra-thin body can be extended to three feet allowing it to stretch over most work surfaces.

product.name: Peasant Side Table - Bright Blue/Smokey Glass
product.description: The result of a collaboration between Juniper and furniture designer Brad Ascalon, the Peasant Table is made almost entirely from off-the-shelf stock materials. Made of interlocking solid brass tubes, the sleek design and streamlined profile is a welcome addition to any home.

product.name: Rivet Suspension Lamp - Satin Brass
product.description: Designed in collaboration with British designer David Irwin and Juniper, the Rivet Suspension Lamp takes its inspiration from the industrial tools of the 19th century. Mimicking the silhouette of a rivet, the suspended lamp offers a contemporary take on an iconic form. Made from high-quality satin brass. Pairs well with the portable Rivet Lamp, also from Juniper.

product.name: Tina Frey Champagne Bucket - White
product.description: Designed and hand-sculpted by Tina Frey in San Francisco, the Champagne Bucket is crafted from durable, shatterproof resin. Ideal for outdoor entertaining, the Champagne Bucket’s supple leather handles make transportation a breeze. FDA food safety compliant. BPA free.

product.name: Tina Frey Champagne Bucket - Grey
product.description: Designed and hand-sculpted by Tina Frey in San Francisco, the Champagne Bucket is crafted from durable, shatterproof resin. Ideal for outdoor entertaining, the Champagne Bucket’s supple leather handles make transportation a breeze. FDA food safety compliant. BPA free.

product.name: Tina Frey Ice Bucket - Grey
product.description: Modern and playful, the Ice Bucket is designed and hand-sculpted by Tina Frey in San Francisco. Made from shatterproof and food-safe resin, the Ice Bucket’s clean modern lines are complemented by organic and supple leather handles making it easy to carry. BPA free.

product.name: Tina Frey Large Bucket - White
product.description: Modern and playful, the Large Bucket is designed and hand-sculpted by Tina Frey in San Francisco. Made from shatterproof and food-safe resin, the Large Bucket’s clean modern lines are complemented by organic and supple leather handles making it easy to carry. BPA free.

product.name: Tina Frey Wall Hooks - Set of 3 - White
product.description: Bold and playful, San Francisco-based designer Tina Frey’s Wall Hooks are a graphic addition to any room. Made from hand-cast and hand-sculpted resin, these lively dots add spirited whimsy to everyday functionality. Group them together for decorative patterning or alone for humble utility. BPA free.

product.name: Tina Frey Wall Hooks - Set of 3 - Turquoise
product.description: Bold and playful, San Francisco-based designer Tina Frey’s Wall Hooks are a graphic addition to any room. Made from hand-cast and hand-sculpted resin, these lively dots add spirited whimsy to everyday functionality. Group them together for decorative patterning or alone for humble utility. BPA free.

product.name: Umbra Conceal Book Shelf - Small White
product.description: Showcase your books as floating works of art with the Conceal Shelf from designer Miron Lior for Umbra. This innovative design gracefully hides the shelf within the book. When stacked with other books, the entire shelving unit becomes invisible allowing your library to take center stage. Made from powder-coated steel. Mounting hardware included. Maximum weight for Small is 15-pounds, Maximum weight for Large is 20-pounds

product.name: V02 Analog Watch - Brushed Gold
product.description: This iconic watch by Swedish designer David Ericsson features a novel interpretation of the classic speedometer-style dial, showing only half of the traditional circular face. The V02 uses two 'compass needle' hands, the short hand representing the hours and the long indicating the minutes as on a normal watch. Made from stainless steel on casing and featuring a calf leather strap.

product.name: V03B Analog Watch - Green
product.description: The V03B, created by Swedish designer David Ericsson, gets down to the basics. Featuring Japanese quartz movement, luminescent hour and minute hands, and a nylon NATO strap, this timepiece is simple but always stylish.

product.name: V03B Analog Watch - Yellow
product.description: The V03B, created by Swedish designer David Ericsson, gets down to the basics. Featuring Japanese quartz movement, luminescent hour and minute hands, and a nylon NATO strap, this timepiece is simple but always stylish.

product.name: V03B Analog Watch - Grey
product.description: The V03B, created by Swedish designer David Ericsson, gets down to the basics. Featuring Japanese quartz movement, luminescent hour and minute hands, and a nylon NATO strap, this timepiece is simple but always stylish.

product.name: Shapes Dhurrie Rug - 2' x 3'
product.description: Designed by Alyson Fox in collaboration with Hawkins New York, the Shapes Rug is based off of Alyson’s artwork, which is largely inspired by the work of Josef Albers and the paintings of Piet Mondrian. Bold lines and geometric shapes— large rectangles embracing hexagons, pentagons, and triangles— define the piece in a violet, navy, gold, ivory, and grey palette. The heathered colors of the woven rug make the hues appear more muted, which makes the Shapes Rug a versatile floor covering that adapts nicely to an existing décor, and can accent a variety of interior spaces. In collaboration with Hawkins New York, Dwell is one of only three online retailers to feature the Shapes Rug through 2013.

product.name: Shapes Dhurrie Rug - 4' x 6'
product.description: Designed by Alyson Fox in collaboration with Hawkins New York, the Shapes Rug is based off of Alyson’s artwork, which is largely inspired by the work of Josef Albers and the paintings of Piet Mondrian. Bold lines and geometric shapes— large rectangles embracing hexagons, pentagons, and triangles— define the piece in a violet, navy, gold, ivory, and grey palette. product.name: V03D Date Analog Watch - White Face and Band, Brushed Copper Case
product.description: The three-hand date V03D timepiece features 2115 movement from Japanese watchmaker Miyota. Rendered in solid stainless steel, it features a screw-on case back and sports a premium calf leather strap. This watch has all you need, timing down to the second, and a date function at the three o'clock position.

variants.color: white face, brushed IP copper case, white leather band

product.name: Workstead Shaded Pendant
product.description: The strikingly handsome Workstead Shaded Pendant was designed by Brooklyn-based duo Stefanie Brechbuehler and Robert Highsmith. Its linen shade can be adjusted 34–52" below the ceiling, so as to achieve optimum height in a room. The fixture, rendered in cast iron, steel, and brass, is suitable for off-center situations as well, allowing the shade to be positioned over a tabletop and other seating arrangements. Made in Brooklyn, NY.

product.name: Workstead 3 Arm Industrial Chandelier
product.description: When one thinks of a chandelier, often an elaborate, shimmery fixture comes to mind. With its Industrial Chandelier, Workstead pares this idea down to capture the function of a chandelier—an overhead lighting fixture—with the simplicity of clean lines and a flexible design. The three-arm chandelier can be reconfigured into a variety of shapes, making it an adaptable piece for a many interior spaces. Structured as a horizontal fixture, the Industrial Chandelier can hang just three feet from the ceiling, or as a vertical piece, it can hang five feet for a more dramatic effect. Crafted from steel, repurposed industrial joints, and vintage Hubbell sockets, the lighting fixture has a mechanical, vintage aesthetic, while its minimalist design, exposed cords, and unshaded bulbs have an undeniably modern sensibility.

product.name: Workstead Shaded Table Lamp
product.description: From the design studio of Brooklyn-based duo Stefanie Brechbuehler and Robert Highsmith comes the handsome Workstead Shaded Table Lamp. Its linen shade can be adjusted 34–52" above the tabletop, so as to achieve optimum height in a room. Fixture rendered in cast iron, steel, and brass. Made in Brooklyn, NY.

product.name: Workstead Floor Lamp
product.description: Brooklyn-based design duo Stefanie Brechbuehler and Robert Highsmith render cast iron, steel and brass into the handsome Workstead Floor Lamp. Defined by a crane-like profile, it at once reaches out and sits steadily waiting. The adjustable arm can be positioned as a reading lamp or a spotlight. Made in India.

product.name: Workstead Shaded Floor Lamp
product.description: The Workstead Floor Lamp, designed by Brooklyn-based design duo Stefanie Brechbuehler and Robert Highsmith, is a handsome take on a timeless silhouette. Its linen shade can be adjusted between 52–72" above the floor and rests on an adjustable swivel joint. The two perpendicular rods form a dynamic composition. Fixture crafted from iron, steel and brass. Made in Brooklyn, NY.

product.name: Workstead Wall Lamp
product.description: The Wall Lamp is the simplest yet most adjustable of all of the fixtures in the Workstead line by Brooklyn-based design duo Stefanie Brechbuehler and Robert Highsmith. It can be utilized as a wall sconce, reading lamp, ceiling washer or even task light. Complemented by a handsome black shade, the lamp is an elegant and flexible frame for a single bulb. Crafted from iron, steel and brass in India.

product.name: Landscape Dhurrie Rug - 5' x 7' - Limited Edition of 25
product.description: Designed by Alyson Fox in collaboration with Hawkins New York, the Landscape Dhurrie Rug is composed of Alyson’s hand drawn geometric designs. Inspired by aerial views and rural landscapes, the composition utilizes a pastel palette, making the piece adaptable to an existing décor and a versatile accent for a variety of interior spaces. A limited edition of 25, this tufted rug is a blend of art silk and wool, with a cotton backing. The rug is designed to echo the hand drawn nature of Alyson’s original artwork, which makes the Landscape Dhurrie Rug a distinctive area rug or a striking wall hanging.

product.name: PIK Vases - Pink
product.description: Created for Y’A Pas Le Feu Au Lac by FX Ballery, the Pik vase is inspired by stacks of hay. Each vase is comprised of three glass cylinders that end in a beech wood cone base. Each cone ends in a small, austere point creating the illusion that the Pik is floating slightly above the surface.

Its rounded lines make it easy to hold with a stapling action that is both strong and fluid. Designed to be put away horizontally freeing up valuable desk space.

product.name: Grip LED Flashlight - Black
product.description: Alexander Taylor took inspiration from standard rubber BMX bike grips when he designed the Grip LED Flashlight for Praxis. Its rubber exterior makes it pleasingly tactile to hold, while its playful shape makes it a delight to use. A bright LED sits at the center of its wide rounded head. Functions on AA batteries.

product.name: Chimney Humidifier - Light Green
product.description: Takeshi Ishiguro designed the The Chimney Humidifier with both beauty and utility in mind. The Chimney Humidifier’s sculptural form seamlessly integrates into any living environment while its innovative vertical design allows mist to cover the entire room, not just the floor. Its ultra sonic system makes the Chimney Humidifier whisper quiet.

product.name: Chimney Humidifier - Light Pink
product.description: Takeshi Ishiguro designed the The Chimney Humidifier with both beauty and utility in mind. The Chimney Humidifier’s sculptural form seamlessly integrates into any living environment while its innovative vertical design allows mist to cover the entire room, not just the floor. Its ultra sonic system makes the Chimney Humidifier whisper quiet.

product.description: Bank was created for Praxis by Swiss design firm Big Game with elegant utility in mind. Made from elastic rubber, Bank is tactile and playful––a perfect home for your change or other small items you want to keep safe and accessible.

product.name: WOW Bluetooth Speaker - Black
product.description: Created by Antonio Arévalo for KAKKOii, WOW (With Out Wires) speakers empower the user, allowing him or her to connect wirelessly to any compatible Bluetooth device within a 33-foot radius. These compact rubber cones can play audio at a volume of up to 85Db, are USB chargeable and require no batteries. The auto silent/auto play feature pauses music when there is an incoming call and begins playing again when the call ends. USB charger included.

product.description: For Les Perles Candle Holders, FX Balléry drew inspiration from classic wooden beads produced in the Jura Mountains. Its steel base comes with eight interchangeable wooden pieces that can be put together to create unique and changeable candlestick designs. This small version comes in black, natural, and red.

product.name: Sky Planter Ceramic - mini
product.description: Turning growing on its head—literally—the Sky Planter from designer Patrick Morris for Boskke defies gravity in a sleek and modern upside-down planter. An innovative reservoir structure gradually replenishes the plant’s roots, keeping plants luscious and full, both indoors and out. Winner of the Red Dot Award for Product Design in 2011.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Retro Digital Flip Clock - Small - Orange
product.description: Designed by Idea International to digitally emulate the iconic flip clock, the Retro Digital Flip Clock brings contemporary technology into a vintage silhouette. This battery-operated, fully digital clock mimics the analog movement of the original classic while the orange shell and rounded corners remain true to its design heritage.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Retro Digital Flip Clock - Small - White
product.description: Designed by Idea International to digitally emulate the iconic flip clock, the Retro Digital Flip Clock brings contemporary technology into a vintage silhouette. This battery-operated, fully digital clock mimics the analog movement of the original classic while the orange shell and rounded corners remain true to its design heritage.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: FaceMaker Wooden Blocks
product.description: London design firm Miller Goodman created the FaceMaker with both the imaginative child and the environmentally conscious consumer in mind. Made of eco-friendly rubber wood, these twenty-five, hand printed blocks can be put together to make thousands of unique faces.

product.name: ShapeMaker Wooden Blocks
product.description: Let your imagination run wild with ShapeMaker from London design firm Miller Goodman. Created for the inquisitive child (or child at heart), ShapeMaker’s twenty-five, hand printed blocks can be put together to make thousands of unique critters and abstractions. Made of sustainable rubber wood.

product.name: Wooden Bird Alarm Clock
product.description: Created by &design for IDEA International, the Bird Clock will wake you up every morning with a bird song rather than the usual synthetic beep of a traditional alarm clock. Its classic bird silhouette––a calming visual presence––is finished in a wood grain. Batteries included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: DraMaten New York Shopping Trolley - green
product.description: Urbanista created the DraMaten New York Shopping Trolley for the style conscious city dweller who values utility above all else. It features a sleek, foldable frame, water-resistant exterior and generous pockets––large enough to carry groceries, laundry or just about anything else a true “urbanista” might need.

product.name: Blossom Candlestick - Lily, Ocean Green
product.description: Part of the Blossom series, the Lily Candlestick is the baby in this family of blooms, standing at 24.5 cm. This joyous and organic form is crafted from hand turned beech wood— a production process inspired by the mid-century candlesticks which were made from the scraps of wooden furniture. Created by Danish designer Anders Nørgaard, the Lily Candlestick looks lovely as a single bud, but best when paired with others of the Blossom series to form a meadow in full bloom. Made in Sweden.

product.name: Blossom Candlestick - Lily, Mandarin
product.description: Part of the Blossom series, the Lily Candlestick is the baby in this family of blooms, standing at 24.5 cm. This joyous and organic form is crafted from hand turned beech wood— a production process inspired by the mid-century candlesticks which were made from the scraps of wooden furniture. Created by Danish designer Anders Nørgaard, the Lily Candlestick looks lovely as a single bud, but best when paired with others of the Blossom series to form a meadow in full bloom. Made in Sweden.

product.name: Blossom Candlestick - Rose, Olive Green
product.description: The Rose Candlestick— part of the Blossom series— takes its form from nature to resemble a bud just opening. Created by Danish designer Anders Nørgaard and made from hand turned beech wood, the Rose Candlestick looks lovely as a single bud, but best when paired with others of the Blossom series to form a meadow in full bloom. Made in Sweden.

product.name: Blossom Candlestick - Tulip, City Grey
product.description: Organic and modern, the Tulip Candlestick’s sumptuous silhouette is created from hand turned beech wood to resemble a bud just opening. Created by Danish designer Anders Nørgaard, the Tulip Candlestick looks lovely as a single bud, but best when paired with others of the Blossom series to form a meadow in full bloom. Made in Sweden.
