Created by Danish designer Anders Nørgaard, the Tulip Candlestick looks lovely as a single bud, but best when paired with others of the Blossom series to form a meadow in full bloom. Made in Sweden.

product.name: Borneo Poster
product.description: From legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Borneo Poster by designer Aino-Maija Metsola celebrates the wild in vivid, cheerful color. Ideal for both the creatively-minded child and the wonder-filled adult, the Borneo Poster is sure to delight.

product.name: Sumatra Poster
product.description: Designed by Aino-Maija Metsola for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Sumatra Poster is guaranteed to brighten any room. Vividly rendered in cheerful colors, the Sumatra Poster features a tiger hiding in the brush. A perfect addition to any imaginative child’s bedroom––or perhaps any child at heart.

product.name: Kamerun Poster
product.description: Lively and cheerful, the Kamerun Poster designed by Aino-Maija Metsola for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko is a cheeky composition of flora, fruit and fauna––all on a sunny background of golden yellow. A chipper addition to any child’s bedroom.

product.name: Asema Notebook
product.description: The Asema Notebook from celebrated Finnish design house Marimekko gives us all a reason to take a break from the computer and rejoice once again in the hand-written note. Designed by Pentti Rinta, the Asema Notebook contains 160 blank pages and an irresistible 100% cotton covered front. Striped bookmark included.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Siirtolapuutarha Notebook
product.description: Created by celebrated Finnish design house Marimekko, the Siirtolapuutarha Notebook’s lively pattern makes it a joy to carry with you. The interior 96 ruled pages are perfect for jotting down notes and ideas while the small inside pocket is great for stowing extra momentos, keepsakes and photographs. Cover design by Maija Louekari.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Kaivo Aoc Umbrella 22 cm
product.description: The Kaivo AOC Umbrella compliments Marimekko’s bold, graphic patterning with robust functionality and performance. The AOC Umbrella features an auto open/close system, allowing for quick coverage from the rain with just the push of a button. The fabric is made of teon-coated 100% polyester and can withstand rain pressure of up to 350mm. A convenient wrist-strap makes portability a snap. Textile print designed by Maija & Kristina Isola.

product.name: Lumimarja Aoc Lux Umbrella 28 cm
product.description: The Lumimarja AOC LUX Umbrella from Finnish design gurus Marimekko features high-performance technology blended with a bold and graphic sensibility. The a standard AOC auto open/close system is enhanced by an additional ratchet closure safety feature enabling smoother operation. The fabric is made of teon-coated 100% polyester and can withstand rain pressure of up to 350mm. Lightweight and wind-proof aluminum frame. Waterproof carrying case included. Textile print designed by Erja Hirvi.

product.name: Karakola Aoc Max Umbrella 31 cm
product.description: A slightly roomier umbrella opening with a bold and masculine print the Karakola AOC MAX Umbrella from Marimekko is as stylish as it is functional. The a standard AOC auto open/close system is enhanced by an additional ratchet closure safety feature enabling smoother operation. The fabric is made of teon-coated 100% polyester and can withstand rain pressure of up to 350mm. Lightweight and wind-proof aluminum frame. Waterproof carrying case included. Textile print designed by Annika Rimala.

product.name: Pieni Unikko Stick Umbrella 91 cm
product.description: A sophisticated foul-weather staple, the Pieni Unikko Stick Umbrella keeps you stylish and dry. Crafted from the classic Marimekko Unikko poppy pattern print, this chic umbrella has a red wooden handle and manual open and close features for a protective cover when you need it.

product.name: Joonas Stick Umbrella 91 cm
product.description: The bold and graphic pattern of the Joonas Stick Umbrella from Marimekko almost makes you wish for rain. A sophisticated foul-weather staple, the Joonas Stick Umbrella is crafted from the durable water resistant polyester to keep you stylish and dry. A wooden handle and manual open and close feature offers protection when you need it.

product.name: Piccolo Stick Umbrella 91 cm
product.description: A cheerful antidote for dreary weather, Vuokko Nurmesniemi’s bold textile design for the Piccolo Stick Umbrella makes rainy days seem a little brighter. The Piccolo Stick Umbrella is crafted from the durable water resistant polyester to keep water at bay while the wooden handle and manual open and close function gives shelter when you need it most.

product.name: Kompotti Bag
product.description: Made from heavyweight 100% cotton in Marimekko’s signature bold and graphic style, the Kompotti Bag is a flat tote designed to travel where you do. Durable enough to bring to the grocery store but stylish enough to bring to the office, the Kompotti Bag is perfect for that extra bit of storage. Textile print designed by Aino-Maija Metsola.

product.name: Siirtolapuutarha Bag
product.description: The Siirtolapuutarha Tote Bag is a flat tote designed to travel where you do. Durable enough to bring to the grocery store but stylish enough to bring to the office, the Siirtolapuutarha Tote Bag is perfect for that extra bit of storage. Made from heavyweight 100% cotton in Marimekko’s signature bold and graphic style. Textile print designed by Maija Louekari.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Coffee Cup
product.description: Part of the Weather Diary tableware collection, the Sääpäiväkirja coffee cup is inspired by the natural environments of Finland. Designed by Sami Ruotsalainen for Marimekko, the mug’s varying shades of blue evoke the dramatic rainclouds that hover above the archipelago. Made from durable yet delicate glazed porcelain. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Mug
product.description: The Sääpäiväkirja mug is part of Marimekko’s Weather Diary tableware collection— a series inspired by the changing natural landscapes of Finland. With an abstract line drawing, this elegant mug calls to mind the dry grasses of the Finnish archipelago. Made from durable yet delicate glazed porcelain. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Round Plate - Small
product.description: Inspired by the natural landscapes of Finland, the Sääpäiväkirja salad plate is part of Marimekko’s Weather Diary tableware collection. Evocative watercolor patterning calls to mind the mountains and sea of the Finnish archipelago, adding depth and richness to the dinner table. Made from durable yet delicate glazed porcelain. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Plate
product.description: Warm and radiant, the vibrant hues of the Sääpäiväkirja Plate call to mind the rising sun. This small rectangular plate is part of Marimekko’s Weather Diary tableware collection, a series that evokes singular moments from Finland’s natural landscape. Made from durable yet delicate glazed porcelain. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Bowl - Color 192
product.description: Bring the natural beauty of the outdoors to your breakfast or dinner table with the Sääpäiväkirja Bowl. Part of Marimekko’s Weather Diary tableware collection which draws its inspiration from the landscapes and environments of Finland, the Sääpäiväkirja Bowl adds drama and artistry to any table. Made from durable yet delicate glazed porcelain. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Jug
product.description: With expressive watercolor and delicate lines, the Sääpäiväkirja Jug evokes the wonders of nature. Part of Marimekko’s Weather Diary tableware collection which draws its inspiration from the landscapes and environments of Finland, the Sääpäiväkirja Jug blends a simple glazed porcelain form with alluring and eye-catching imagery that will enliven any table. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Salad Platter
product.description: Abstract watercolors are deftly used to evoke the beauty of the Finnish landscape in the Oiva dishware collection designed by Sami Ruotsalainen. Sun, sky, horizon, and sea are softly depicted in this picturesque scene that adds allure to any table. Perfectly sized for salads, desserts, and hors d'oeuvres.

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Teapot
product.description: Designed by Sami Ruotsalainen for Marimekko, the Oiva teapot is warm and modern. With a protective natural wood handle and interior porcelain tea strainer, the Oiva teapot is designed to make the perfect cup of tea. Made from durable yet delicate glazed porcelain. Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.

product.name: Oiva Kompotti Mug 8 cm
product.description: Part of Marimekko designer Sami Ruotsalainen’s Oiva collection, the Oiva Mug’s clean lines telecast modern refinement. Made from durable glazed porcelain, this simple mug is dishwasher, freezer and microwave safe, making it ideal for everyday use.

product.name: Oiva Teapot
product.description: Marimekko designer Sami Ruotsalainen’s classic Oiva teapot form is given a vibrant new look. Bold yet refined, the red teapot is perfect for holiday entertaining, or simply a festive gathering of friends. A natural wood handle protects the hand while the interior porcelain tea strainer is designed to brew the perfect cup of tea. Great for mulled wine, too!

product.name: Weather Diary Collection: Oiva Bowl - Color 190
product.description: Designed by Sami Ruotsalainen for Marimekko, the Sääpäiväkirja Bowl captures the imagination and illuminates any table. Perfectly sized to accommodate salads, pasta or casseroles, this cheerful design will quickly become a household favorite. Made from durable porcelain.

product.name: Konkkaronkka Flatware (Dinner Fork, Dinner Spoon, Dinner Knife, Coffee Spoon)
product.description: Created by Mari Isopahkala for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Konkkaronkka Place Setting’s innovative design includes non-matching utensils. Made from stainless steel, each utensil is marked with its own unique pattern detailing, adding individuality to each piece and intrigue to the table-setting.

product.name: Konkkaronkka Flatware - Fork
product.description: Created by Mari Isopahkala for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Konkkaronkka Place Setting’s innovative design includes non-matching utensils. Made from stainless steel, each utensil is marked with its own unique pattern detailing, adding individuality to each piece and intrigue to the table-setting.

product.name: Konkkaronkka Flatware - Spoon
product.description: Created by Mari Isopahkala for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Konkkaronkka Place Setting’s innovative design includes non-matching utensils. Made from stainless steel, each utensil is marked with its own unique pattern detailing, adding individuality to each piece and intrigue to the table-setting.

product.name: Konkkaronkka Flatware - Knife
product.description: Created by Mari Isopahkala for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Konkkaronkka Place Setting’s innovative design includes non-matching utensils. Made from stainless steel, each utensil is marked with its own unique pattern detailing, adding individuality to each piece and intrigue to the table-setting.

product.name: Konkkaronkka Flatware - Coffee Spoon
product.description: Created by Mari Isopahkala for legendary Finnish design house Marimekko, the Konkkaronkka Place Setting’s innovative design includes non-matching utensils. Made from stainless steel, each utensil is marked with its own unique pattern detailing, adding individuality to each piece and intrigue to the table-setting.

product.name: Sukat Makkaralla Pitcher
product.description: Add playful humor to your table with Marimekko’s Sukat Makkaralla Pitcher. Translated to “socks rolled down” in Finnish, the Sukat Makkaralla collection of glassware is hand-blown and handmade lending a unique and distinctive character to each piece. Designed by Anu Penttinen.

product.name: Sukat Makkaralla Serving Platter
product.description: Part of Anu Penttinen’s Sukat Makkaralla— or “socks rolled down” in Finnish— collection, this lively serving platter is a distinctive interpretation of glassware. Handmade and hand-blown, the Sukat Makkaralla serving platter’s vibrant color and undulating form add charisma to both the family meal and the festive gathering.

product.name: Kippis Rectangular Plywood Tray
product.description: Marimekko designer Maija Louekari’s festive pattern is inspired by the whimsical glasses and goblets featured on her appropriately titled Kippis Plywood Tray— Finnish for “Cheers.” The freehand illustrations are applied to a formal composition grid, lending sophistication to the celebratory pattern. Ideal for special occasions— or for making any occasion special.

product.name: Siirtolapuutarha Round Plywood Tray
product.description: Ideal for parties and large gatherings, Marimekko’s Siirtolapuutarha Round Tray is made for events. The oversized tray can accommodate hors d’oeuvres or main dishes with ease while the cheerful pattern from designer Maija Louekari pays homage to nature with a vibrant blue flower pattern. Because the pattern is taken directly from Marimekko fabric, some wrinkles in the fabric may be present.

product.name: Juhannustaika Round Plywood Tray
product.description: Perfect for entertaining or simply admiring, the Juhannustaika Round Plywood Tray from Marimekko is as spacious as it is enticing. Richly hued watercolor patterns reveal organic forms from designer Aino-Maija Metsola. The pattern has been taken directly from original Marimekko fabric so wrinkles in the fabric may be present.

product.name: Tilkkutakki Waist Apron
product.description: The Tilkkutäkki Waist Apron is inspired by patchwork handicraft traditions. From designer Maija Louekari, the apron’s pattern highlights Marimekko’s signature bold and graphic style, while the lively color palette makes kitchen prep work a joy. Made from 100% cotton.

product.name: Tilkkutakki Oven Mitten
product.description: From Marimekko designer Maija Louekari comes a graphic pattern inspired by patchwork handicraft traditions. Made from 100% cotton interior with polyester filling, the Tilkkutäkki Oven Mitten offers protection from cooking heat as it brightens the kitchen environment. Hanging metal ring included for easy storage.

product.name: Paaryna Tea Towels
product.description: The Päärynä Tea Towel from legendary Finnish design house Marimekko brightens any kitchen with its bold pattern. Designed by Maija Isola, the Päärynä Tea Towel features a vivid orange pear. Perfect for everyday kitchen use, this tea towel is equally delightful when hung, bringing vibrant color to the home. Made from a linen and cotton blend.

product.name: Hauki Dish Cloths
product.description: Marimekko’s Hauki Dish Cloths feature designer Sanna Annukka's graphic interpretation of mountains and fish. Made from cellulose material, these cheerful dish cloths are supremely durable and absorbent, making them highly efficient at cleaning household surfaces, dishes and countertops. When soiled, these resilient cloths can be cleaned in the washing machine and sanitized in the microwave for repeated use. Compostable and biodegradable.

product.name: Loistava Candle Holder - Purple
product.description: From designer Harri Kokinen, the Loistava Candle Holder for Marimekko features a unique interaction of two overlapping glass sections. When combined, a new color is formed. And, when illuminated, a magical interplay of color and light occurs. Part of Marimekko’s “In Good Company” collection. Mouth-blown glass.

product.name: Loistava Candle Holder - Teal
product.description: From designer Harri Kokinen, the Loistava Candle Holder for Marimekko features a unique interaction of two overlapping glass sections. When combined, a new color is formed. And, when illuminated, a magical interplay of color and light occurs. Part of Marimekko’s “In Good Company” collection. Mouth-blown glass.

product.name: Loistava Candle Holder - Brown
product.description: From designer Harri Kokinen, the Loistava Candle Holder for Marimekko features a unique interaction of two overlapping glass sections. When combined, a new color is formed. And, when illuminated, a magical interplay of color and light occurs. Part of Marimekko’s “In Good Company” collection. Mouth-blown glass.

product.name: Jurmo Shower Curtain
product.description: Named after the Finnish island Jurmo, this distinctive shower curtain from Marimekko adds charisma and personality to the bathroom. Designer Aino-Maija Metsola’s evocative pattern of white dots and blue swaths of color are reminiscent of the pristine island’s coastline and crashing waves. Made from 100% polyester. Machine washable.

product.name: Kaiku Shower Curtain
product.description: A landscape for indoor use, the Kaiku Shower Curtain from notorious Finnish design house Marimekko blends functionality with natural beauty. Designer Maija Louekari’s graphic birch trees and mountain range imbue the bathroom with scenic tranquility while the sturdy, water-resistent 100% polyester fabric makes it so no additional liner is needed.

product.name: Chilewich Bamboo Placemats (set of 4) - Lawn Green
product.description: Visually engaging, the Bamboo Placemats from designer Sandy Chilewich combine modern utility with sophisticated aesthetics. Subtle patterning adds richness to any table while the placemat’s durable structure and easy care make it perfect for life’s daily demands. Suitable for indoor or outdoor use. Made in the USA.

product.name: Chilewich Bamboo Placemats (set of 4) - Mandarin Orange
product.description: Visually engaging, the Bamboo Placemats from designer Sandy Chilewich combine modern utility with sophisticated aesthetics. Subtle patterning adds richness to any table while the placemat’s durable structure and easy care make it perfect for life’s daily demands. Suitable for indoor or outdoor use. Made in the USA.

product.description: Visually engaging, the Bamboo Placemats from designer Sandy Chilewich combine modern utility with sophisticated aesthetics. Subtle patterning adds richness to any table while the placemat’s durable structure and easy care make it perfect for life’s daily demands. Suitable for indoor or outdoor use. Made in the USA.

product.name: Purl Stripe Utility Mat - 18x28
product.description: From designer Sandy Chilewich, the Purl Stripe Utility Mat offers an innovative take on the traditional stripe. Each stripe is deliberately spaced from dark to light so the edges become slightly blurred, lending a painterly effect to the pattern. Made from durable vinyl yarn, the Purl Stripe Utility Mat is perfect for high-traffic areas such as bathrooms, entryways or outdoor spaces. Mold and mildew resistant. Made in the USA.

product.description: From designer Sandy Chilewich, the Purl Stripe Utility Mat offers an innovative take on the traditional stripe. Each stripe is deliberately spaced from dark to light so the edges become slightly blurred, lending a painterly effect to the pattern. Made from durable vinyl yarn, the Purl Stripe Utility Mat is perfect for high-traffic areas such as bathrooms, entryways or outdoor spaces. Mold and mildew resistant. Made in the USA.

product.description: From designer Sandy Chilewich, the Skinny Stripe Utility Mat blends slim bands of color for a visually alluring pattern. Made from extruded yarns, the utility mat’s tufted texture appears as though it is looped. A strong vinyl backing makes this piece perfect for high-traffic areas such as bathrooms, entryways or outdoor spaces. Mold and mildew resistant. Made in the USA.

product.name: Skinny Stripe Utility Mat - Orange - 18X28
product.description: From designer Sandy Chilewich, the Skinny Stripe Utility Mat blends slim bands of color for a visually alluring pattern. Made from extruded yarns, the utility mat’s tufted texture appears as though it is looped. A strong vinyl backing makes this piece perfect for high-traffic areas such as bathrooms, entryways or outdoor spaces. Mold and mildew resistant. Made in the USA.

product.name: Mini Basketweave Woven Floor Mat - Clementine - 23 x 36
product.description: From designer Sandy Chilewich, the Mini Basketweave utilizes two yarns over two, instead of the traditional four over four found in the signature Basketweave. The result is a subtler, quieter texture and pleasingly uniform surface. Made from durable woven textile and flexible commercial-grade backing, the Mini Basketweave Woven Floormat is perfect for everyday use in the home or outdoors. Made in the USA.

MatterMade Windsor Chair - Black
product.description: Designed for MatterMade, the Windsor Chair is designer Christopher Specce’s minimalist take on an American classic. The Windsor’s colonial lineage has been pared down to its most essential qualities, giving way to a clean and modern look. It’s rugged hard maple exterior and bold lines suggest a utility and simple elegance that is distinctly American.

product.name: Bec Brittain A-Shades Pendant Light - A1 - Black Leather Rope
product.description: Brooklyn-based designer Bec Brittain created her A-Shade pendant lights for MatterMade with an eye towards graceful structure and elemental warmth. The cylindrical fixture of the A1 is constructed from a polished, reflective copper that feels at once earthy and regal. The A1 hangs from a hand-spun leather rope for added visual intrigue.

product.name: F/K/A Table Lamp - Green/White
product.description: Tokyo-born Jonah Takagi combines innovative style and steadfast utility in his design of the MatterMade F/K/A Table Lamp. Initially inspired by a saucepan, the shade is made from powder-coated steel. Three legs extend at its base allowing it to stay remain stable––even when placed on uneven ground. A sandblasted diffuser results in a sumptuous incandescence giving any room a warm, inviting glow.

product.name: Grass Rider Floor Mat - 23x36
product.description: The Grass Rider mat enlivens any space with its bold and graphic geometric print. Inspired by their tactile sensibility, Trish Andersen and Maureen Walsh created Domestic Construction Grounded Floor Mats. Advanced digital technology is used to print alluring mixed media collages onto polyester textiles. The textile is then backed with a skid resistant rubber mat to ensure stability. Made in the USA.

product.name: Line Up Floor Mat - 23x36
product.description: Contrasting stripes of gray and bold, graphic shades of turquoise, teal and lavender combine to create the Line Up Grounded Floor Mat. Each mat is digitally dyed onto polyester textiles with a hand cut paper design created by Trish Andersen and Maureen Walsh of Domestic Construction. The textile is then backed with a skid resistant rubber mat to ensure stability. Machine washable. Made in the USA.

product.name: Eames Hang-It-All Coat Rack - Multi-Color
product.description: From design legends Charles and Ray Eames, the Hang-It-All coat rack transforms the everyday object into a design classic. Playful multicolored hooks create a bright visual staccato of color lending vibrancy to any room, while the solid white or black versions lend a mod sensibility. First created in 1953, Hang-It-All remains as lively and dynamic today as it was when it was first introduced over sixty years ago.

variants.color: white powder coat with multi-colored knobs

product.name: Frame Coffee Table - Black
product.description: From design team Jamie Iacoli & Brian McAllister, the Frame Coffee Table is minimal and modern. Created from a plated steel base and natural oiled ash frame, this simply constructed coffee table is available in either bronze or brass, lending contemporary warmth to any room. Tempered glass tabletop. Made in the USA.

product.name: Onkel Sofa - 2 Seater - Light Grey
product.description: Created by designer Simon Legald for Normann Copenhagen, the Onkel (Danish for “uncle”) Sofa combines the ornate and curvaceous upholstered sofas of the 1950s with the refinement of contemporary Nordic design. To signal the marriage of these two sources of inspiration, the back cushion is seamlessly integrated into the sofa’s frame lending cohesive elegance and refinement to this thoughtful design.

product.name: PIXO Desk Lamp - Silver
product.description: Designed with the sustainability in mind, Pixo was created with a minimal environmental footprint by Pablo and Fernando Pardo. The adjustable LED task lamp head lets you to focus light where you need it most while an integrated USB port at the base allows you to charge your electronic devices with minimal wiring and clutter.

product.name: Public C7 2013 Bike Size S/M - Cream
product.description: Designed with the city-dweller in mind, the PUBLIC C7 bike is lightweight and easy-shifting through its seven speeds. With a durable steel step-through frame, the C7 is often referred to as the “Dutch” bike, paying homage to its retro-European roots. A fashion-friendly design, the step-through frame also makes this bike ideal for those who wear suits or skirts as the garment can lay flat versus bikes with a traditional crossbar frame. Upright handlebars make this bike supremely comfortable and ergonomic for smooth riding throughout your daily commute.

product.name: Public V7 2013 Bike Size S/M - Black
product.description: Designed to conquer all forms of terrain— city, town or country— the PUBLIC V7 Bike is inspired by vintage European bicycles. The lightweight steel-frame and upright handlebars provide ergonomic comfort while sturdy fenders keep your clothes clean, whether trekking to the office or out for a scenic ride. Seven speed options allow the rider to customize his or her trip, accommodating those in a rush and those who are out for a leisurely jaunt. Retro styling details make this a stylish addition to your daily commute.

product.name: Public R16 Bike Size S - Black
product.description: The PUBLIC R16 road bike adds modern conveniences to classic vintage design sensibilities. This gorgeous bicycle places emphasis on aesthetics with chic leather toe straps, stately brown tires, matching rims and fenders, a retro saddle with brass rivets and real gum rubber dia-compe break lever hoods inspired by classic designs. The PUBLIC R16 meets these stunning styling details with high performance functionality: sixteen speeds for any terrain, drop handlebars for ergonomic support, road bike geometry for increased agility and a lightweight frame for ease of transport. Ride in style.

product.name: 9.2.2 Box: Walnut Knife Rack XL
product.description: Clean and quiet, the 9.2.2 Box Knife Rack XL from Canadian-based designer Geoffrey Lilge offers an elegant solution to a common household quandary. Made from solid and lustrous walnut wood, this wall-mounted knife rack appears to suspend blades in thin air, thanks to minimal supports. The wood surface has been finished with a beeswax and natural oil varnish; periodic reapplication of mineral oil may be necessary to maintain luster.

product.name: 1.3.2 Chisel: Walnut Cutting Board
product.description: Made from solid and durable walnut wood, the 1.3.2 Chisel is a dynamic, multi-purpose kitchen tool perfectly suited for cutting, serving and charcuterie and cheese. Its unique form lends a contemporary feel while venerable craftsmanship provide an artisanal quality. Made in Canada and designed by Geoffrey Lilge. The wood surface has been finished with a beeswax and natural oil varnish; periodic reapplication of mineral oil may be necessary to maintain luster.

product.name: 6.1.2 Hole Slab: Long Serving Board
product.description: Canadian designer Geoffrey Lilge created this best-selling cutting board and serving platter for On Our Table. Elegant and refined, the Hole Slab Long is made from solid walnut wood. Its oblong carved structure makes a sculptural staging area for cheese, charcuterie and other hors d’oeuvres. The wood surface has been finished with a beeswax and natural oil varnish; periodic reapplication of mineral oil may be necessary to maintain luster.

product.name: 3.3.2 Table Deck Platter
product.description: An essential for any kitchen, the 3.3.2 Table Deck Platter is a multi-function surface that can be used as both a platter and a cutting board. Made from solid walnut wood, the Table Deck Platter is lovely as a serving vessel, providing a rich texture for plating design and hors d’oeuvres. Made in Canada and designed by Geoffrey Lilge. The wood surface has been finished with a beeswax and natural oil varnish; periodic reapplication of mineral oil may be necessary to maintain luster.

product.name: 2097 - 30 Chandelier - Chrome
product.description: Designed by Gino Sarfatti for FLOS, the Mod 2097 Chandelier suspends 30 individual lamps along spindly brass arms for a sculptural and graceful effect. A center steel structure adds stability while the included 8-feet of cuttable cable allows for customizable drama. Steel ceiling fitting ensures a secure hold. Made in Italy.

product.name: 2097 - 30 Chandelier - Brass
product.description: Designed by Gino Sarfatti for FLOS, the Mod 2097 Chandelier suspends 30 individual lamps along spindly brass arms for a sculptural and graceful effect. A center steel structure adds stability while the included 8-feet of cuttable cable allows for customizable drama. Steel ceiling fitting ensures a secure hold. Made in Italy.

product.name: Aim LED Pendant Light - Black
product.description: Designed by vanguards Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec for FLOS, the Aim LED light reinvigorates the pendant light. Opting to highlight the cable cord instead of hiding it, the substantial cable becomes a central design element. This interesting feature allows the cable to be looped, gathered, crossed or draped adding sculptural intrigue to an innovative design.

product.name: Aim LED Pendant Light - Polished Aluminum
product.description: Designed by vanguards Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec for FLOS, the Aim LED light reinvigorates the pendant light. product.name: Arco Floor Lamp - Incandescent
product.description: A legendary icon, the Arco lamp designed by Achille and Pier Giacomo Castiglioni for FLOS was first released in 1962. A heavy marble base balances and suspends the swooping stem and polished Aluminum dome. To coincide with FLOS and Arco’s fiftieth anniversary, this masterpiece was updated with LED technology, adding high performance to an already impeccable design.

product.name: Arco Floor Lamp - LED
product.description: A legendary icon, the Arco lamp designed by Achille and Pier Giacomo Castiglioni for FLOS was first released in 1962. A heavy marble base balances and suspends the swooping stem and polished Aluminum dome. To coincide with FLOS and Arco’s fiftieth anniversary, this masterpiece was updated with LED technology, adding high performance to an already impeccable design.

product.name: Piani Table Lamp - White
product.description: Designed by innovators Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec for FLOS, the Piani Table Lamp offers stylish and modern asymmetry for the home or work environment. Made of injection printed ABS, this unique lamp provides both direct and ambient light with energy-efficient LED technology. Power switch is conveniently located on the 63-inch power cable.

product.name: Skygarden Pendant Light S1 - Black
product.description: Simple at first glance, the Skygarden Pendant Lamp by designer Marcel Wanders for FLOS reveals itself to be intricate and surprising when viewed from directly underneath. The outside of Skygarden is a minimal half-sphere, but inside a white plaster photo-etched floral frieze is hiding––a modern interpretation of luxurious chateau ceilings. The pendant’s soft light is diffused by an inner glass sphere with aluminum filigree detail.

product.description: From acclaimed designer Sebastian Wrong for FLOS, the Spun Floor Light provides diffused light through its spun metal frame and diffuser. product.name: Toio Floor Light - Black
product.description: Designed by legendary brothers Achille Castiglioni and Pier Giacomo Castiglioni in 1962, the Toio Lamp for FLOS was part of the designers’ ready-made object series. The Toio Lamp takes its inspiration (and physical structure) from a 300-watt car headlamp. This unique bulb is affixed to deconstructed parts of a fishing rod which contains the lamp’s power cord. A convenient cleat at the lamp’s base provides storage for the cord when not in use. Included in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art. Made in Italy.

product.name: Toio Floor Light - Red
product.description: Designed by legendary brothers Achille Castiglioni and Pier Giacomo Castiglioni in 1962, the Toio Lamp for FLOS was part of the designers’ ready-made object series. The Toio Lamp takes its inspiration (and physical structure) from a 300-watt car headlamp. This unique bulb is affixed to deconstructed parts of a fishing rod which contains the lamp’s power cord. A convenient cleat at the lamp’s base provides storage for the cord when not in use. Included in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art. Made in Italy.

product.name: Kelvin LED Green Mode I Task Lamp
product.description: Designed by Antonio Citterio with Toan Nguyen for FLOS, the Kelvin LED Task Lamp is smartly equipped with 30 LED bulbs offering soft, warm light for the home or office environment. Sleek and stylish, this efficient lamp features a double pantograph arm and adjustable swiveling head so you can place light where you need it most. An electronic optically operated on/off switch includes a dimming option for 70-percent illumination, as well as the full illumination.

product.name: Snoopy Table Lamp
product.description: A classic 1967 design recreated for today’s design aficionado. Designed by Achille Castiglioni and Pier Giacomo Castiglioni, this playful yet sleek table lamp takes its inspiration from the famed Charles M. Schulz character. The thick black lamp head with its suggestive form rests atop a white marble base. Includes dimmer switch on the marble base.

product.name: Hub Coffee Table - Reclaimed Oak
product.description: New York design firm Roman and William have joined construction and artistry in the Hub Coffee Table created for MatterMade. The striking walnut endgrain butchers block top of the table is constructed from many singular pieces of wood that are combined to create seamless beauty. The Hub Coffee Table sits low to the ground, suggesting a casual gathering around its generous four-foot diameter.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Range Life II Pallet Coffee Table - Black
product.description: From Tokyo-born designer Jonah Takagi, the Range Life collection draws inspiration from an unlikely pairing: the modernist Mies van der Rohe and the seminal 90s band Pavement. In this unorthodox combination, a unique coffee table design is produced, joining several smaller tables into one. Each of the four pieces can be used on its own, or can be combined to create a sculptural form certain to enliven any space.

product.name: Reader Chair - Oak
product.description: New York design firm Roman and William has updated a classic sling chair for a contemporary audience. The folding legs and base are made of thick, smoky walnut giving it a reassuringly sturdy look and feel while custom brass detailing adds to its regal air. The Reader’s supple leather cushioning, and purposeful angles make this the ideal seat for long hours of contemplation in your office or study.

product.name: Simple Machines Stool - Natural, 12 Inch
product.description: From Tokyo-born designer Jonah Takagi, the Simple Machines collection is a seamless fusion of component and fastener. With clean, deliberate lines, the legs for each piece appear to screw into the top, creating one unified and considered object. The stool, reminiscent of a farmer’s milking stool, serves as inspiration for the collection that includes a bench, a square table and a round table.

product.name: Woodrum Wall Lamp - Teak
product.description: The breathtaking Woodrum lighting collection for MatterMade by New York design firm Roman and Williams was created with materiality in mind. Each piece features stunning wooden shades that are evocative of mid-century designs but updated for a contemporary audience— all inspired by 1950’s American restaurant lighting concepts. The Woodrum Wall Light is a cylinder constructed from solid teak that appears to float out from the wall with an inviting warmth. A delicate, custom brass cord dangles from the center as a counterpoint to the rich wooden fixture.

product.name: MatterMade Farm Table
product.description: The Farm Table was created for MatterMade with a nod to its classic American origins. By highlighting only the most essential elements of the iconic farm table, designer Christopher Specce has brought this unequivocally American archetype into the present. The Farm Table’s stained maple bass and rounded legs give it an inviting utility while the smooth and sumptuous marble top lends a pleasing contemporary refinement.

product.name: Orchard Decorative Ladder No. 1
product.description: Taking inspiration from the apple picking ladders found in 19th century orchards, Paul Loebach created the Orchard Ladder for MatterMade. Made from hard maple, the ladder’s construction firmly rooted in tradition. While this ladder is not weight-bearing, it can function as a unique place to display blankets, linens or any other textile— or as a sculptural element to enrich any space.

product.name: Orchard Decorative Ladder No. 2
product.description: Taking inspiration from the apple picking ladders found in 19th century orchards, Paul Loebach created the Orchard Ladder for MatterMade. Made from hard maple, the ladder’s construction firmly rooted in tradition. While this ladder is not weight-bearing, it can function as a unique place to display blankets, linens or any other textile— or as a sculptural element to enrich any space.

product.name: ADA Quilt
product.description: The ADA Quit is an expression of Oklahoma-raised designer Meg Callahan’s love of traditional craft, updated for the modern era. Bold graphic patterning is digitally printed on an organic cotton base with machine stitch overlay. The result is a seamless blend of the digital and handmade to create a fresh take on an age-old textile. The ADA works as a wall hanging as well as a functional blanket.

product.name: Spine Quilt
product.description: Oklahoma-raised designer Meg Callahan fuses tradition and technology in the Spine Quilt. Using digitally printed graphics on an organic cotton base, Callahan adds intricate texture using a machine stitched overlay. Engaging and highly functional, the Spine Quilt is equally at home as a wall hanging or cozy blanket.

product.name: Mother Ann Chair
product.description: The Mother Ann Chair, designed for MatterMade, is Paul Loebach’s tribute to the hard-working Shakers’ aesthetic of humble beauty and utility. Named after sect leader Ann Lee, the Mother Ann stays close to its 19th century origins through its simple design and integrity of construction. A curved seat and back bring fresh design elements to the chair’s humble, secular beginnings.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Mother Ann Table
product.description: The Mother Ann Table, designed for MatterMade, is Paul Loebach’s tribute to the Shaker design philosophy of simple forms, humble beauty and utility. The classic table form is modernized by simple wood turnings and a visually light solid wood top. An ebonized ash finish brings a fresh design element to this table’s secular beginnings.

product.name: Nick and the Candlestick - Set of 9
product.description: Drawing its inspiration from antique weights and a Sylvia Plath poem of the same name, the Nick And The Candlestick candle holder is romantic and evocative. Designed by Lindsey Adelman, nine ethereal brass cylinders stand on a walnut tray, each one a different height. Candles appear almost as if they are growing out of them, and when lit the flames appear to dance in the high gloss brass finish. These look gorgeous sitting together on their tray or scattered throughout a room.

product.name: MatterMade Shaker Chair
product.description: The Shaker Chair— designed for MatterMade— is a tribute to the craftsmanship and unadorned aesthetic of the wooden furniture created by the hardworking Shakers in the 19th century. The sturdy base and legs are made of a hardy ebonized ash recalling the religious sect’s focus on material and function. The woven cotton diagonal detail of the seat and back adds a contemporary refinement to this durable classic.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Primo Shelving System - 2/5 in Ash - Stainless Steel Supports
product.description: Designed by Casey Lurie, the Primo Shelving System uses a unique combination of notched wooden planks and poles to create a stable structure. Accents of brass or stainless steel add both support and warmth to the design. Created for optimal usability, the interlocking shelves can be combined together for infinite custom configurations and are assembled easily without the use of additional tools. Available in Ash, White Oak, or Walnut. Made in the USA.

product.name: Ball Ceiling Fan - Brushed Aluminum
product.description: Minimal and quiet, the Ball Fan from Ron Rezek for The Modern Fan Company is an elegant ceiling fan designed for both style and function. Made from die-cast aluminum with plywood laminate blades, the Ball Fan offers visual simplicity and superlative functionality––keeping you cool in style. The thoughtfully-designed fan also meets the EPA’s Energy Star guidelines for air movement efficiency.

product.name: DC Slim Ceiling Fan - Brushed Aluminum
product.description: The DC Slim Fan is a versatile fan that can be used in both high- or low-ceiling rooms, due to its included hugger adapter. The fan features a bullet-like body, giving it a distinctive look that will work well in contemporary spaces. The sleek design also includes an energy efficient lamp and glass diffuser, so the DC not only enhances airflow, but also provides ambient overhead lighting. The fan features three blades that are installed at a slight angle, which helps to circulate airflow, without using more energy. The simply designed fan is characterized by its uniform finish, which enables it to blend into existing interior spaces without being distracting. The sleek DC can also be an attractive focal point in a minimally designed space.

Sleek and simple, the Altus blends in with interior spaces without being distracting, but it can also be an attractive focal point in a minimally designed space. product.name: Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock - BNC-10 - Grey with AC Adaptor
product.description: Designed in 2012 by Markus Orthey, the Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock maintains the integrity of Braun's legendary design ethic while incorporating the latest digital technologies. Sleek rounded corners and a blue LED back light lend a contemporary aesthetic while functions like a six-station AM/FM preset, both search and manual tuning options and snooze feature add convenience. AC/DC power adapter for use with the Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock (model BNC010).
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock - BNC-10 - White with AC Adaptor
product.description: Designed in 2012 by Markus Orthey, the Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock maintains the integrity of Braun's legendary design ethic while incorporating the latest digital technologies. Sleek rounded corners and a blue LED back light lend a contemporary aesthetic while functions like a six-station AM/FM preset, both search and manual tuning options and snooze feature add convenience. AC/DC power adapter for use with the Braun Digital AM/FM Radio Alarm Clock (model BNC010).
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Elevate Knives Carousel Set
product.description: Keep kitchen mess to a minimum with the Elevate Knives Carousel Set designed by Derek Roberts. These innovative knives are designed with a weighted base so the blade will never touch the countertop when set down, keeping your kitchen safe and hygienic. This set of six knives comes complete with a rotating knife block with a secure non-slip base. Universal slots accommodate any size knife, regardless of blade length.

product.name: Milly Salt & Pepper Shaker Set
product.description: Though their silhouettes may resemble a traditional salt and pepper shakers, the Milly Salt and Pepper Mills are anything but. When turned upside down, these delightful shakers grind fresh cracked peppercorns and rock salt for an extra fresh taste. A smartly designed cap contains any extra seasonings, preserving your table from errant mess.

product.name: Nest 9 Plus Mixing and Measuring Set
product.description: An elegant solution to all your food preparation needs in one compact design. Nest 9 Plus by Joseph Joseph is a nesting set comprised of one large and one small mixing bowls, a colander, a stainless steel mesh sieve and five measuring cups that range from 1 teaspoon (5 ml) to 1 cup (250 ml). The wide handles of each piece are designed for easy carrying. When not use, the handles securely snap together for space-saving storage. Included in the permanent collection of the Brooklyn Museum of Art.

product.name: Kaktus Stool
product.description: This sturdy stool is inspired by the delicate filigree of the Staghorn Cholla cactus. Designed by the architect and co-founder of Artecnica Enrico Bressan, the Kaktus stool is a contradiction in form: lightweight aluminum gives the appearance of airiness and fragility but is entirely weight-bearing. Made from 100% recycled aluminum.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Themis Mobile
product.description: For the Themis Mobile, designer Clara von Zweigbergk drew her inspiration from the polyedra. This graphic yet delicate mobile features five suspended orbs, each one faceted to revel a vibrant color pattern. When installed, the hanging ornaments gently sway. As the designer describes: “I think of them as planets and like to see the colors change while gently turning.”

product.name: Themis Mobile Mono
product.description: From designer Clara von Zweigbergk for Artecnica, the Mono is the fourth edition of the Themis mobile. This bright and playful dodecahedron is composed of twelve sides, all featuring a different vibrant hue––pastels, fluorescents and primaries. Hypnotizing and alluring, this unique mobile is sure to inspire wonder in both the child and the child at heart. Spot printed ink on wood-free paper.

product.name: Two Hole Vase
product.description: Part of Artecnica’s Design With Conscience project, the Two Hole Vase is designed with both environmental and social responsibility in mind. Each vessel is made from a recycled post-consumer wine bottle which has been crafted by artisans in Guatemala with the help of a collaboration with Aid to Artisans. Designed by Emma Woffenden and Tord Boontje, the tranSglass® Two Hole Vase is included in the permanent collection of MoMA New York.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Home Accents > Vases

product.name: Beak Vase
product.description: Designed by Emma Woffenden and Tord Boontje as part of Artecnica’s Design With Conscience project, each tranSglass® Beak Glass is crafted from a recycled post-consumer wine bottle by skilled artisans in Guatemala. This unique collaboration between Artecnica and Aid to Artisans represents the company’s efforts to create products that are both environmentally and socially sustainable. Included in the permanent collection of MoMA New York.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Home Accents > Vases

product.name: Half Moon Shower Curtain
product.description: From Denmark’s Ferm Living, designer Trine Andersen has created the bold, graphic patterning for the Half Moon Shower Curtain. Made from 100 percent cotton with a waterproof acrylic coating, the Half Moon provides style and visual intrigue while safely protecting your bathroom from water damage. Includes stainless steel hanging rings.

product.name: Half Moon Laundry Basket
product.description: Crafted from Danish designer Trine Andersen’s bold and playful Half Moon pattern, this ultra-durable laundry basket pulls double duty as toy storage, a home for extra linens, a kitchen waste bin, or anything else you can imagine. Added bonus: convenient leather handles make it easy to transport. Made of 100 percent cotton.

product.name: Molecule Building Set
product.description: Let your scientific imagination roam free with Danish designer Trine Andersen’s Molecule Building Set. Made from carved beech and maple wood, this set contains 24 atoms in a variety of colors and wooden connecting sticks, all housed in an easy-to-store box. Perfect for the budding chemist or anyone with a passion for the elements.

product.name: Spear Shower Curtain
product.description: Add vibrancy to your daily shower routine with the Spear Shower Curtain from designer Trine Andersen for Denmark’s Ferm Living. Made from 100 percent cotton with a waterproof acrylic coating, the Spear Shower Curtain lends bold, graphic allure while safely protecting your bathroom from water damage. Includes stainless steel hanging rings.

The Pleat collection of linens from designer Anki Spets for Area Home lets the details shine––soft and supple 100 percent organic cotton and a sharply tailored pleated edge. Sometimes nothing can be better than crisp, white linens. Machine washable.

product.name: Jack Neutral F/Queen Blanket
product.description: The Jack collection of blankets offers unparalleled velvety softness in a striped pattern that telecasts understated chic. Warmer than wool and more durable than cashmere, these blankets are made from the finest alpaca fibers in rich natural colors. Each piece is finished by hand with a fringed border, lending an artisanal feel to these cozy blankets.

product.name: Lloyd Ash King Blanket
product.description: Made from soft and supple 100 percent cotton, the Lloyd collection of blankets from designer Anki Spets for Area Home offers the versatility of a heathered palette with the durability of cotton. Silky to the touch, the Lloyd blankets provide warmth and style for any home.

product.name: Lloyd Camel King Blanket
product.description: Made from soft and supple 100 percent cotton, the Lloyd collection of blankets from designer Anki Spets for Area Home offers the versatility of a heathered palette with the durability of cotton. Silky to the touch, the Lloyd blankets provide warmth and style for any home.

product.name: Flicker Felt Rug - 6' x 8' - Charcoal with Cream and Grey
product.description: San Francisco-based husband and wife team Melina and Dodd Raissnia have both tradition and progress in mind with Peace Industry felt rugs. Using ancient Turkish felt making techniques, designer Melina imbues her textiles with contemporary designs and earth-friendly, chemical-free materials. Each fair-trade rug is made in the Peace Industry workshop in Turkey.

product.description: San Francisco-based husband and wife team Melina and Dodd Raissnia have both tradition and progress in mind with Peace Industry felt rugs. product.name: Senz Smart Umbrella - Black Out
product.description: A more economical version of the Senz original, the Senz Smart protects you against all weather conditions using the laws of aerodynamics. Its unique asymmetrical shape and myriad color options ensure that next time it rains you’ll stay dry and stylish too.

product.name: Senz Smart Umbrella - Sunset Red
product.description: A more economical version of the Senz original, the Senz Smart protects you against all weather conditions using the laws of aerodynamics. Its unique asymmetrical shape and myriad color options ensure that next time it rains you’ll stay dry and stylish too.

product.name: Bowling Bowl - Set of 3
product.description: Impeccable workmanship meets understated beauty in the Bowling Bowl Set by Skogstad, Homstvedt and Anderssen & Voll. The art of turning wood is taken to the extreme here, as the wall of each solid ash bowl is stripped to its bare minimum and topped with a soft, easy-to-grip rim. Stained in soft, soothing hues, the set is then waxed and polished for deep glowing finish.

product.name: Teepee Felt Rug - 7' x 7' - Cerulean on Black
product.description: San Francisco-based husband and wife team Melina and Dodd Raissnia have both tradition and progress in mind with Peace Industry felt rugs. Using ancient Turkish felt making techniques, designer Melina imbues her textiles with contemporary designs and earth-friendly, chemical-free materials. Using ancient Turkish felt making techniques, designer Melina imbues her textiles with contemporary designs and earth-friendly, chemical-free materials. Each fair-trade rug is made in the Peace Industry workshop in Turkey.

product.name: Senz Mini Umbrella - Pure Black
product.description: The Senz Mini Umbrella is the foldable version of the award-winning Senz storm umbrella. Using the laws of aerodynamics, its innovative shape protects you from all the elements and resists wind up to 50 mph. Pops easily into any bag so you arrive dry.

product.name: Floating Duck Bath Toy - Teal
product.description: Specially designed with small hands in mind, the Floating Duck from Kid O is a bright and lively bath toy certain to please even the most discerning youngster. A floating friend for bath time, this lovely pal with bob and bounce—in bubbles or without. And with the help of an imaginative child, it may even quack. For ages one and older.

product.name: Floating Duck Bath Toy - Purple
product.description: Specially designed with small hands in mind, the Floating Duck from Kid O is a bright and lively bath toy certain to please even the most discerning youngster. A floating friend for bath time, this lovely pal with bob and bounce—in bubbles or without. And with the help of an imaginative child, it may even quack. For ages one and older.

product.name: Floating Duck Bath Toy - Yellow
product.description: Specially designed with small hands in mind, the Floating Duck from Kid O is a bright and lively bath toy certain to please even the most discerning youngster. A floating friend for bath time, this lovely pal with bob and bounce—in bubbles or without. And with the help of an imaginative child, it may even quack. For ages one and older.

product.name: Stack and Nest Cups Tub Toy - Cool Colors
product.description: The Stack and Nest Cups from Kid O charm your child with the thrill of discovery. Five brightly colored cups perfectly fit together to form a star pattern when nested together. When in use, these cups are perfectly suited for indoor or outdoor building, beach or bath toys or storage. For children six months or older.

product.name: Stack and Nest Cups Tub Toy - Warm Colors
product.description: The Stack and Nest Cups from Kid O charm your child with the thrill of discovery. Five brightly colored cups perfectly fit together to form a star pattern when nested together. When in use, these cups are perfectly suited for indoor or outdoor building, beach or bath toys or storage. For children six months or older.

product.name: A-Z Flashcards and Blocks Set
product.description: Created for the child’s active imagination, the A-Z Flash Cards and Wooden Blocks by Hungry Little Minds combines 26 design and architecture inspired alphabet cards with 36 European beech wood building blocks. This unique combination of materials allows the child’s mind to associate form and language as new ideas emerge. The durable cards stack easily with the sustainable hardwood building blocks, allowing them to function doubly as a building material.

product.name: Bilibo Rocking Toy
product.description: With the award-winning Bilibo, the question isn’t what is it, but what is it not? Designed by Alex Hochstrasser, this dynamic shape could be a rocking char, a sled, a spinning top, a cradle, or anything your child can dream of. Made from 100 percent recyclable high-density polyethylene. Best suited for kids aged two to eight.

product.name: Plui Bath Toy
product.description: Designed by Alex Hochstrasser, Pluï makes any water activity a joyous one. When filled, this innovative toy rains gentle droplets of water, controlled by sealing the opening on the top of the toy. Ideally suited for the bath or the beach, Pluï is fun and engaging— all while teaching kids about the laws of physics. But you don’t have to tell them that. For ages two or older.

product.name: Free Play Magnatab Magnetic Drawing Tablet
product.description: Magic to the eye, the Free Play Magnatab uses a magnetic stylus to attract small silver beads to the bright red tablet’s surface, creating a drawn line. When you’re ready for a new drawing, simply erase your image with the swipe of a finger and start all over again. For ages three and older.

product.name: Scoppi Toy Shovel and Sifter
product.description: Bright and playful, Scoppi encourages kids to dig in. Designed so children can use both their hands and feet to engage the shovel, Scoppi is perfect for any outdoor playtime activity— be it building a snow fort or a sand castle. A detachable sifter helps to sort through all the treasures they’re sure to find.

product.name: Ballo Toy Water Bucket
product.description: Ballo Green is a smartly designed beach toy created for the seashore-loving child. Soft to the touch and with an easy grip handle, Ballo is perfect for tiny hands. The spherical shape helps to keep Ballo stable during runs from the ocean to any sandcastles that might be in need of a moat. For ages three and older.

product.name: Triplet Toy Shovel and Rake
product.description: Durable versatility for endless fun. The Triplet is a unique, multifunctional toy that is part shovel, sifter, and rake. It helps kids dig holes, build foundations, carve out moats, removes shells, and other sediment for smooth, shape-able sand, and creates smart, unique designs. The hollow handle can also be used as a water funnel to finish off the coolest sandcastles with sand art.

product.name: Aalto Finlandia Vase - Small - Clear
product.description: Drawing inspiration from the beauty of the natural world, the undulating shape of each Aalto piece alludes to the untamed shorlines of Finland's thousands of lakes. The fluid aesthetic reaffirms the deep connection between man and nature while making a statement against the failure of industrial production to meet universal human needs. His complete collection includes his legendary vases, coordinating bowls, platters and more, all infused with a range of iconic colors.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Home Accents > Vases

product.name: Aarne Champagne Glass - Set of 2
product.description: Fluid and elegant, bold and functional, Göran Hongell's Aarne barware collection epitomizes timeless style that trancends the trends of the moment. Aarne barware quickly became the standard for essential barware in the 1950s, and it remains just as essential today.

product.name: Citterio 98 Flatware Place Setting
product.description: Generously designed to fit every hand comfortably, Citterio utensils have quickly become revered as contemporary classics. The matte-brushed, stainless-steel design of every fork, knife, and spoon adds an impressive tactile quality to any meal and feels equally natural in formal and casual dinner settings.

product.name: Citterio 98 Flatware Serving Set
product.description: Generously designed to fit every hand comfortably, Citterio utensils have quickly become revered as contemporary classics. The matte-brushed, stainless-steel design of every fork, knife, and spoon adds an impressive tactile quality to any meal and feels equally natural in formal and casual dinner settings.

product.name: Essence Champagne Glass - Set of 2
product.description: The Essence family of glassware was designed by Zurich-based designer Alfredo Häberli for Iittala. With personal experience in the restaurant industry guiding the designer’s decisions, a perfect blend of form and function emerged. Each glass is formed to suit the scientific needs of the liquid it contains, but with the utmost attention to aesthetics. Notes the designer, “The idea for the glass range was to create a balance between tradition and modernity, between celebration and daily use, a balance with one and different uses.”

product.name: Essence Red Wine Glass - Set of 2
product.description: The Essence family of glassware was designed by Zurich-based designer Alfredo Häberli for Iittala. With personal experience in the restaurant industry guiding the designer’s decisions, a perfect blend of form and function emerged. Each glass is formed to suit the scientific needs of the liquid it contains, but with the utmost attention to aesthetics. Notes the designer, “The idea for the glass range was to create a balance between tradition and modernity, between celebration and daily use, a balance with one and different uses.”

product.description: The Essence family of glassware was designed by Zurich-based designer Alfredo Häberli for Iittala. product.name: Kartio Carafe - Apple Green
product.description: Kaj Franck's Kartio glassware sheds all things unnecessary and superfluous. The result is a timeless aesthetic that stuns with pure geometric shapes embellished only by gentle colors— as Franck put it, "the only decoration needed." Each perfectly balanced piece is simple, yet durable enough for everyday use, infused with the feeling that it could not have been designed any other way.

product.name: Kastehelmi Bowl - Apple Green
product.description: Professor Oiva Toikka's Kastehelmi, Finnish for "dewdrop," evolved from a technical challenge when Toikka started using glass droplets to cover joint marks left on the surface of pressed glass pieces. The result was a popular range of glassware decorated with beads of glass that glisten like dewdrops in the morning sun.

product.name: Piano Flatware Place Setting
product.description: Created by one of the most influential designers of the 20th century, Renzo Piano, the Piano collection of cutlery and serveware is ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in the hand. Each piece is crafted from stainless in smooth lines and sensuous curves that are as much a joy to the eye as they are to use. An elegant companion to your tabletop.

product.name: Iittala Tools Casserole - 2.5 Quart
product.description: Developed with the insight of professional chefs and the material mastery of designer Björn Dahlström, this range of highly designed cookware was created for people with a large appetite for life. The generously sized pieces are perfect for even the most demanding occasions, adding ease and control to every aspect of cooking and serving.

product.name: Iittala Decanter
product.description: The perfectly formed, mouth-blown shape of Citterio and Nguyen's Decanter was thoughtfully designed to enhance the qualities of its contents. The neck opens slightly, allowing wine to breathe and releasing the flavors and bouquet that have been locked inside it. The clean, clear design lets in light to ignite the brilliant color of wine. While it fits naturally with virtually any glassware, it's at its best when matched with Iittala's range of wine glasses.

product.name: Kastehelmi Cake Stand
product.description: Professor Oiva Toikka's Kastehelmi, Finnish for "dewdrop," evolved from a technical challenge when Toikka started using glass droplets to cover joint marks left on the surface of pressed glass pieces. The result was a popular range of glassware decorated with beads of glass that glisten like dewdrops in the morning sun.

product.name: Lempi Glass - Set of 2
product.description: Truly universal in its design, Matti Klenell's Lempi glass is at home on your breakfast table, your desk at work, a formal dinner party or just about anywhere. The soft shape fits the hand just as the clarity of form pleases the eye, and a stackable design helps save valuable space in your cupboard.

product.name: Sarpaneva Cast Iron Casserole
product.description: Drawing his inspiration from his blacksmith grandfather, Timo Sarpaneva created a timeless and ingenious design that is as functional in the kitchen as it is appealing on the dining room table. With a wooden handle and a cast-iron body. Sarpaneva's cast-iron pot expresses an aesthetic so classic it was once celebrated on a Finnish postage stamp.
product.category: Home > Tabletop & Kitchen > Kitchen Accessories > Cookware

product.name: Toikka Barn Owl Statue
product.description: Professor Oiva Toikka's Birds embody Iittala's commitment to craftsmanship and imagination, deviating from the streamlined aesthetic of Scandinavian design in imaginative, rich, and bold ways. Each design incorporates new color combinations and techniques for one-of-a-kind beauty that is collected by people of refined taste worldwide.

product.name: Teema Bread & Butter Plate - Black
product.description: Adaptable to any style or use, the Teema Tableware collection designed by Kaj Franck for Iittala is based on the fundamental shapes of circle, square, triangle, and rectangle. From these enduring forms, the designer created a range of functional dishes for the home that can be used in myriad ways: from preparing the meal, heating and serving, to storing and freezing. These timeless and sophisticated pieces provide an essential form to allow the food, family, friends, and conversation to shine.

product.name: The Bellini Chair - White
product.description: The Bellini Chair from Heller® combines style and comfort in one lightweight, versatile design. Created by celebrated Italian architect Mario Bellini in 1998, this enduring design is made from injection-molded, fiberglass-reinforced plastic for a sleek look that complements any interior space. A slight flex in the backrest creates a luxurious feel while the smart design makes these chairs sturdy and stackable. Recipient of the Compasso d’Oro. Made in the USA.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: ErgoErgo Stool - Black
product.description: With ErgoErgo, designer Alan Heller has given the clunky exercise ball a modern twist. This unique form replaces a chair and acts as ergonomic support while simultaneously engaging the body to improve posture and circulation. Lightweight and portable, ErgoErgo can travel where you do— perfect for impromptu seating in the home or office, indoors or out. Made of recyclable technopolymer.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: ErgoErgo Stool - Warm Red
product.description: With ErgoErgo, designer Alan Heller has given the clunky exercise ball a modern twist. Lightweight and portable, ErgoErgo can travel where you do— perfect for impromptu seating in the home or office, indoors or out. Made of recyclable technopolymer.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Comback Chair - Wood Legs - Orange Red, Oak - Set of 2
product.description: Kartell has once again revisited a great classic and given a new look to the Windsor chair. A return to the glorious Anglo-Saxon past of England in the XVIIIth century for a “Comb Back” version with a matte frame featuring a backrest consisting of seven “teeth” which spread out towards the lumbar region where they meet a reinforced hexagonal rim with slim shafts radiating down to join the seat. A goodly size, this single mold chair embodies functionality and ergonomics well-freighted with sentiment and memories. The use of plastic and the pale shades available give a touch of lightness and the contemporary to the Comback chair. Comback chair features a matt finish thermoplastic body in your choice of colors and available with various base options.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.description: Kartell has once again revisited a great classic and given a new look to the Windsor chair. product.name: Comback Chair - Swivel Base - Grey Blue, Black Base
product.description: Spanish designer Patricia Urquiola revisits the classic Windsor comb-back chair, drawing upon designs from 18th century England and bringing it into a modern context. The molded plastic frame of the Comback Chair features a backrest consisting of seven "teeth" which spread out towards the lumbar region where they meet a reinforced hexagonal rim. Slim shafts radiate downwards to join the saddle-shaped seat. Kartell's Comback is a single mold chair made from batch-dyed thermoplastic technopolymer that embodies functionality and ergonomics. The Swivel Base version features a four leg epoxy-painted steel base.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Masters Chair - Black - Set of 2
product.description: Standing on four slim legs, the Masters Chair is roomy and comfortable. The back of the chair is characterized by fullness and empty spaces created by curvaceous crisscrossing lines of three different backs which descend and merge into the edge of the seat. The Masters Chair pays homage to three contemporary design icons through a fusion of styles. Referencing the silhouettes of Arne Jacobsen's Series 7, Eero Saarinen's Tulip Armchair and Charles Eames' Eiffel Chair, the Masters Chair is an engaging and sinuous hybrid. Suitable for indoor/outdoor use and stackable 4 units high.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Masters Chair - White - Set of 2
product.description: Standing on four slim legs, the Masters Chair is roomy and comfortable. The back of the chair is characterized by fullness and empty spaces created by curvaceous crisscrossing lines of three different backs which descend and merge into the edge of the seat. The Masters Chair pays homage to three contemporary design icons through a fusion of styles. Referencing the silhouettes of Arne Jacobsen's Series 7, Eero Saarinen's Tulip Armchair and Charles Eames' Eiffel Chair, the Masters Chair is an engaging and sinuous hybrid. Suitable for indoor/outdoor use and stackable 4 units high.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Audrey Side Chair - Set of 2 - Black
product.description: Audrey is not just a simple chair. It belongs to an eclectic, multifunctional "contaminating" family that can go everywhere: indoor and outdoor, office, home and the places in between. Audrey is a versatile contemporary chair with clean and simple lines thanks to its frame's lightness and resistance. Truly one of a kind, Audrey's wholly die-cast aluminum frame is offered in different finishes and is the first time that a single piece has been thus cast. Pair with Audrey's seat and back made of modified batch-dyed polypropylene available in a variety of colors for a total of 22 frame and seat combinations. Suitable for indoor/outdoor seating, and stackable to 5 high. Sold as a Set of 2 chairs.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Audrey Side Chair - Set of 2 - White

product.name: La Marie Chair - Crystal - Set of 2
product.description: La Marie Chair is the world's first completely transparent chair, formed in a single polycarbonate mold. La Marie combines an essential design with an exceptionally robust and light structure to generate an intangible quality. Although it looks as fragile as glass, its strength comes from its inherent flexibility. An ingenious combination of lightness and strength, the result of a painstaking and meticulous research into its polycarbonate material, this item is scratch and shock resistant. Suitable for indoor/outdoor use.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Peg Chair - Black
product.description: The Peg Chair from British designer Tom Dixon draws its inspiration from the clean, understated lines of Japanese architecture. This simple and modern form is crafted from natural, solid birch wood––lightweight enough to easy carry yet sturdy enough to be supportive. Perfect for dining rooms of any décor.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Peg Chair - Stained Brown Oak
product.description: The Peg Chair from British designer Tom Dixon draws its inspiration from the clean, understated lines of Japanese architecture. This simple and modern form is crafted from natural, solid birch wood––lightweight enough to easy carry yet sturdy enough to be supportive. Perfect for dining rooms of any décor.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Comback Chair - Sled Base - Yellow
product.description: Spanish designer Patricia Urquiola revisits the classic Windsor comb-back chair, drawing upon designs from 18th century England and bringing it into a modern context. The molded plastic frame of the Comback Chair features a backrest consisting of seven "teeth" which spread out towards the lumbar region where they meet a reinforced hexagonal rim. Slim shafts radiate downwards to join the saddle-shaped seat. Kartell's Comback is a single mold chair made from batch-dyed thermoplastic technopolymer that embodies functionality and ergonomics. The Sled Base version features two slim tubular steel epoxy-painted side legs.

product.name: Louis Ghost Chair - Set of 2
product.description: Philippe Starck has reinvented the classic Louis XV for Kartell. A comfortable armchair in transparent and colored polycarbonate, it is the quintessence of baroque revisited to dazzle, excite and captivate. Louis Ghost is the most daring example of the world of injected polycarbonate in a single mold. Despite its evanescent and crystalline appearance, Louis Ghost is stable and durable, shock and weather resistant. Suitable for indoor/outdoor use. Stackable to six high.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Victoria Ghost Chair - Set of 2
product.description: A chair designed following the classic lines of the Louis Ghost chair. Victoria Ghost Chair is born of classic lines whose rounded backrest recalls the shape of antique medallions, while the seat is linear and geometric. It features a construction of transparent, colored polycarbonate and is formed from a single injection mold. Comfortable, robust and weather resistant. Suitable for indoor/outdoor use.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Peg Barstool - Stained Brown Oak
product.description: A reverential nod to traditional pub furniture from British designer Tom Dixon, the Peg Bar Stool is finished in deep, rich brown oak stain to evoke the seductive masculinity of an English tavern while the low backrest creates a contemporary play on proportions. The bar stool is complemented by the Peg Chair, also available from Tom Dixon.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Peg Lounge Chair - Stained Brown Oak
product.description: The Peg Lounge Chair is part of British designer Tom Dixon’s Peg family of seating solutions. Finished in stained rich brown oak, the Peg Lounge Chair evokes the convivial ambiance of an English pub, lending easy warmth to your home’s décor. A deep seat base provides support while a slightly reclined backrest offers elegant comfort.

product.name: Kiki Bench - 2 seater - Ivory Hallingdal
product.description: The Kiki collection of furniture was created by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960. For the Kiki Bench, Tapiovaara envisioned a clean, modern, multipurpose seating option that could fit seamlessly into any environment. Crafted of lacquered oval steel tubing with a plush polyurethane foam cushion, this bench comfortably seats two.

product.name: Kiki Bench - 2 seater - Balder Black Leather
product.description: The Kiki collection of furniture was created by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960. For the Kiki Bench, Tapiovaara envisioned a clean, modern, multipurpose seating option that could fit seamlessly into any environment. product.name: Kiki Chair - Gray Hallingdal
product.description: The Kiki collection of furniture was created by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960 who wanted to bring clean, modern design to a mass audience. The Kiki Chair was originally envisioned as a seating solution for large groups or auditoriums though it is equally at home today in both home and office environments. Made from lacquered oval steel tubing, the Kiki Chair is stackable and lightweight— perfect for the dinner table or the board room.

product.description: Minimal yet plush, the Kiki Lounge Chair was designed by Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960. With the Kiki collection, the legendary Finnish designer wanted to bring clean, modern design to a wider audience. This cozy chair offers luxurious comfort in a versatile design that lends contemporary elegance to existing décor.
