product.name: Kiki Bench - 3 seater - Black Hallingdal
product.description: The Kiki collection of furniture was created by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960. For the Kiki Bench, Tapiovaara envisioned a clean, modern, multipurpose seating option that could fit seamlessly into any environment. Crafted of lacquered oval steel tubing with a plush polyurethane foam cushion, this bench comfortably seats three.

product.name: Kiki Coffee Table - Black Laminate
product.description: The Kiki collection of furniture was created in 1960 by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara, who wanted to bring clean, modern design to a mass audience. The Kiki Side Table has a lacquered black steel frame that is a unifying element with the other pieces in the Kiki collection. The table lends clean, modern simplicity to interior spaces, and can be used as a standalone piece in a living room or den. The table can also be easily coordinated with other pieces in the Kiki collection.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Kiki Table - Black Laminate
product.description: Part of Finnish legend Ilmari Tapiovaara’s Kiki family of designs, the Kiki Table was created in 1960. Made from lacquered oval steel tubing, the Kiki Table lends clean, modern simplicity to interior spaces and blends perfect with the other pieces in the Kiki collection.

product.name: Kiki Stool - Orange Hallingdal
product.description: The Kiki collection of furniture was created in 1960 by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara, who wanted to bring clean, modern design to a mass audience. The Kiki Stool has a lacquered black steel frame that is a unifying element with the other pieces in the Kiki collection. The seat is formed with pressed birch plywood and upholstered for comfort. The Kiki Stool works well as a standalone accent piece, as well as with other Kiki Stools—they are easily stacked when not in use. The Kiki Stool can be used as seating with the Kiki Table, or as an accent piece in a living room or den.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Dining & Kitchen > Chairs & Barstools

product.name: Kiki Sofa - 2 seater - Sand Hallingdal
product.description: Elegant and timeless, the Kiki collection of furniture was created by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960. For the Kiki Sofa, Tapiovaara envisioned a clean, minimal sofa that could be integrated into any existing environment. Plush yet refined, the Kiki Sofa is crafted with lacquered steel tubing and features a fabric upholstered soft foam cushion. The Kiki Sofa comfortably seats two people, and can be easily coordinated with other pieces in the Kiki collection.

product.name: Kiki Sofa - 3 seater - Black Hallingdal
product.description: Elegant and timeless, the Kiki collection of furniture was created by legendary Finnish designer Ilmari Tapiovaara in 1960. For the Kiki Sofa, Tapiovaara envisioned a clean, minimal sofa that could be integrated into any existing environment. Plush yet refined, the Kiki Sofa is crafted with lacquered steel tubing and features an upholstered soft polyurethane foam cushion. The Kiki Sofa comfortably seats three people, and can be easily coordinated with other pieces in the Kiki collection.

product.name: Artek Siena Placemat - Red/White
product.description: Inspired by the lively family meals in Siena, Italy, the namesake place mat was created by designer and architect Alvar Aalto for Artek. Made from 100 percent cotton, the Siena Place Mat is sturdy enough to withstand everyday use and elegant enough to be used in formal tabletop décor.

product.name: Artek Siena Placemat - White/Yellow
product.description: Inspired by the lively family meals in Siena, Italy, the namesake place mat was created by designer and architect Alvar Aalto for Artek. Made from 100 percent cotton, the Siena Place Mat is sturdy enough to withstand everyday use and elegant enough to be used in formal tabletop décor.

product.name: Artek Stool 60 - Anniversary Edition - Black
product.description: Created by Alvar Aalto in 1933, Stool 60 has become a design archetype, and the definition of functionalist furniture design. Simple and elegant, the birch legs of Stool 60 are curved into a perfectly circular round seat, creating a comfortable and eye-catching silhouette. Nothing short of an enduring classic.

product.name: Artek Stool 60 - Mike Meire Edition - Birch, Black, Black/White
product.description: Designed by Alvar Aalto in 1933 for Artek, Stool 60 is an icon of modernist design. This classic silhouette has been updated by German artist Mike Meiré with each leg painted a different color to evoke the feeling of motion. Colorful and comfortable, this dynamic special edition takes on a new feeling when placed at different angles, revealing new color combinations and enlivening an iconic design.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Special Edition Artek Stool 60 - Pure Anniversary Edition
product.description: A design classic in its most elemental form, the Stool 60 Pure is a special edition of designer and architect Alvar Aalto’s iconic 1933 design for Artek. The Stool 60 Pure is made from sculpted natural birch wood. The soft, unfinished surface will take on the markings of everyday life, creating trace lines of a life well lived.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Special Edition Artek Stool 60 - Tom Dixon Anniversary Edition
product.description: The Stool 60 Tom Dixon special edition is a vibrant rendition of Alvar Aalto’s iconic 1933 design for Artek. The classic stool with its sculpted birch legs and round seat is given a bright, bold fluorescent orange color, calling attention to this important piece of modernist design— as was Dixon’s intention. A contemporary twist on a design legend.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Special Edition Artek Stool 60 - Monocle Anniversary Edition
product.description: A modern classic revamped for a global contemporary audience. The Stool 60 Monocle special edition presents the design magazine’s rugged interpretation of Alvar Aalto’s iconic 1933 design for Artek. The round seat has been covered by Finnish moose leather and adhered by black iron nails and brass screws which will age cohesively over time.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Special Edition Artek Stool 60 - Rei Kawakubo Anniversary Edition
product.description: A mod interpretation of Alvar Aalto’s iconic 1933 stool design for Artek. The Stool 60 special edition by Japanese fashion designer Rei Kawakubo adds playful black polka dots to the white sculpted legs and seat of Aalto’s original classic, lending a contemporary flair to a classic modernist design.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Artek A110 Pendant Lamp - Black, Brass
product.description: Furniture designer Alvar Aalto lends his considerable architectural experience to the A110 Ceiling Lamp. Designed in 1952, the A110’s strong silhouette and bold lines evoke the modern era while the black lacquered aluminum base speaks of its timelessness. A sliver of polished brass completes the alluring structure.

product.name: Artek 901 Tea Trolley - White
product.description: Designed by Alvar Aalto in 1936, the Tea Tray 901 is a surprisingly contemporary take on the bar tray. The sculpted, natural lacquered birch frame is paired with two shelves and white lacquered MDF wheels with black rubber rings. Mobile and captivating, the Tea Tray is perfect for taking your tea— or other beverage of choice––on the go.

product.name: Artek A808 Floor Lamp - White/Black
product.description: Designed by furniture designer and architect Alvar Aalto, the A808 Floor Lamp is reminiscent of the architectural lines of modern buildings. The top shade is made from matte white painted steel and rests atop a black leather covered stand. A hint of polished brass completes the piece with consummate style.

product.description: Designed by furniture designer and architect Alvar Aalto, the A808 Floor Lamp is reminiscent of the architectural lines of modern buildings. product.name: Artek A808 Floor Lamp - White/White
product.description: Designed by furniture designer and architect Alvar Aalto, the A808 Floor Lamp is reminiscent of the architectural lines of modern buildings. The top shade is made from matte white painted steel and rests atop a black leather covered stand. A hint of polished brass completes the piece with consummate style.

product.name: Artek A810 Floor Lamp - Brass
product.description: An architectural presence to any interior space, the A810 Floor Lamp by Alvar Aalto consists of two matte white painted steel shades facing in opposite directions. The stand is wrapped in leather giving texture and dimension to the intriguing design. When illuminated, light is dispersed above and below the lamp, creating a uniform glow. Pull cord power.

product.name: Artek A810 Floor Lamp - Nickel
product.description: An architectural presence to any interior space, the A810 Floor Lamp by Alvar Aalto consists of two matte white painted steel shades facing in opposite directions. The stand is wrapped in leather giving texture and dimension to the intriguing design. When illuminated, light is dispersed above and below the lamp, creating a uniform glow. Pull cord power.

product.description: An architectural presence to any interior space, the A810 Floor Lamp by Alvar Aalto consists of two matte white painted steel shades facing in opposite directions. The stand is wrapped in leather giving texture and dimension to the intriguing design. When illuminated, light is dispersed above and below the lamp, creating a uniform glow. Pull cord power.

product.name: Artek H55 Placemat
product.description: The Place Mat H55 takes its distinctive patterning from textiles inspired by Alvar Aalto for Artek. The graphic grey and white pattern adds a dynamic visual element to the tabletop while the 100 percent cotton construction means that these place mats are machine washable and suitable for everyday use.

product.name: Artek Siena Apron
product.description: The Siena Apron draws from the iconic textile pattern designed by Alvar Aalto for Artek in 1954. The bold and graphic red and white patterning adds playful charm to the kitchen of both the modern and traditional chef. Made from 100 percent cotton with wrap around strap closure.

product.name: Artek Siena Throw Blanket
product.description: With the warmth of 100 percent merino wool and the boldness of contemporary design the Siena Blanket from Artek is certain to become a favorite household textile for years to come. A playful black and white graphic pattern will add visual allure to the bedroom or living room, while the cozy knit provides comfort for evenings in.

product.name: Artek H55 Apron
product.description: The H55 Apron is cut from the timeless textile pattern designed by Alvar Aalto for Artek. Bold and graphic, this dense gray and white patterned apron adds visual allure to the kitchen— while carefully obscuring any errant drips and drops. Made from 100 percent cotton with wrap around strap closure.

product.name: Artek 115 Umbrella Stand
product.description: Modernist designer Alvar Aalto interprets his iconic sculpted birch form into a utilitarian and elegant umbrella stand. Made from shaped, naturally lacquered wood with a brass tray base to catch extra moisture, the Umbrella Stand 115 is a stylish resting place for rainy day necessities.

product.name: Artek 80A Table
product.description: Using designer and architect Alvar Aalto’s trademark curved wooden legs as the support structure, Table 80A is clean and sleek. Natural birch legs are paired with wood the easy to clean laminate top for a cohesive look. Though designed in 1935, this classic silhouette feels as fresh and exciting as when it was first created almost eighty years ago today.

product.name: Artek 81B Table
product.description: A classic form by an iconic modernist designer. The Table 81B by Alvar Aalto was created for Artek using the designer’s patented curved L-leg technology. The birch wood legs lend warmth while the black linoleum top adds a contemporary finish. Sleek and streamlined, the Table 81B will feel at home in both home and office environments.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Lukki 5AR Chair
product.description: Created by Finnish designer and interior architect Ilmari Tapiovaara, the Lukki family of seating (Finnish for “daddy”) was originally designed as the winning competition entry for student furniture at the Helsinki University of Technology. With comfortable arm rests and an alluring silhouette, the Lukki 5AR Chair is made from a black steel tubing frame with a pressed birch plywood seat, back and arm rests.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Lukki 5 Chair
product.description: Created by Finnish designer and interior architect Ilmari Tapiovaara, the Lukki family of seating (Finnish for “daddy”) was originally designed as the winning competition entry for student furniture at the Helsinki University of Technology. The stackable and alluring Lukki 5 Chair is made from a black steel tubing frame with a pressed birch plywood seat and back.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Lukki Chair
product.description: Created by Finnish designer and interior architect Ilmari Tapiovaara, the Lukki family of seating (Finnish for “daddy”) was originally designed as the winning competition entry for student furniture at the Helsinki University of Technology. The lightweight Lukki Chair is made from durable black steel tubing with form pressed birch plywood seat, back and armrests.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Lukki Stool
product.description: Created by Finnish designer and interior architect Ilmari Tapiovaara, the Lukki family of seating (Finnish for “daddy”) was originally designed as the winning competition entry for student furniture at the Helsinki University of Technology. Comfortable and stackable, the Lukki Stool is formed of lightweight shaped metal tubing with a sculpted plywood seat.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Nesso Table Lamp - Orange
product.description: The Artemide Nesso Table Lamp, designed by Giancarlo Mattioli, is a table luminaire providing direct or indirect and diffused incandescent lighting. It is one of the most famous lamps of the 60s and 70s. It is a true classic and is included in the Design Collection of the Museum Of Modern Art. The body and diffuser are injection molded ABS thermoplastic. The lamp is available in white or orange. It has an on/off switch on cord.

product.name: Nesso Table Lamp - White
product.description: The Artemide Nesso Table Lamp, designed by Giancarlo Mattioli, is a table luminaire providing direct or indirect and diffused incandescent lighting. It is one of the most famous lamps of the 60s and 70s. It is a true classic and is included in the Design Collection of the Museum Of Modern Art. The body and diffuser are injection molded ABS thermoplastic. The lamp is available in white or orange. It has an on/off switch on cord.

product.name: Melampo Table Lamp - Bronze
product.description: Diffuser: 9.75" dia.

product.name: Eclisse Table Lamp - Polished White
product.description: The Artemide Eclisse Table Lamp, designed by Vico Magistretti, is a bedside table or wall mounted luminaire providing direct and diffused incandescent lighting. The body is lacquered steel, available in white, orange, and silver. It features an incorporated rotating shield in white lacquered steel that allows for the eclipsing of the light source and the regulation of its light emission.

product.name: Eclisse Table Lamp - Polished Orange
product.description: The Artemide Eclisse Table Lamp, designed by Vico Magistretti, is a bedside table or wall mounted luminaire providing direct and diffused incandescent lighting. The body is lacquered steel, available in white, orange, and silver. It features an incorporated rotating shield in white lacquered steel that allows for the eclipsing of the light source and the regulation of its light emission.

product.name: Eclisse Table Lamp - Silver Grey
product.description: The Artemide Eclisse Table Lamp, designed by Vico Magistretti, is a bedside table or wall mounted luminaire providing direct and diffused incandescent lighting. The body is lacquered steel, available in white, orange, and silver. It features an incorporated rotating shield in white lacquered steel that allows for the eclipsing of the light source and the regulation of its light emission.

product.name: Tizio Classic Table Lamp - LED
product.description: The Artemide Tizio Classic Table Lamp, designed by Richard Sapper, is a table luminaire providing direct adjustable task LED lighting. The body is injection molded thermoplastic with a matte white powder coated finish, incorporating an energy efficient LED light source. The body rotates 360 degrees on the horizontal plane and can be adjusted in height by sliding it along its stem. The stem is polished chromed steel and the table base model is white painted steel. The light has a dimmer switch on body. It uses either one 50W halogen bulb or one 8-watt LED bulb and is U.L. listed.

product.name: Tizio Classic Table Lamp - Halogen
product.description: The Artemide Tizio Classic Table Lamp, designed by Richard Sapper, is a table luminaire providing direct adjustable task LED lighting. The body is injection molded thermoplastic with a matte white powder coated finish, incorporating an energy efficient LED light source. The body rotates 360 degrees on the horizontal plane and can be adjusted in height by sliding it along its stem. The stem is polished chromed steel and the table base model is white painted steel. The light has a dimmer switch on body. It uses either one 50W halogen bulb or one 8-watt LED bulb and is U.L. listed.

product.name: Alcatraz LED Floor Lamp
product.description: Alcatraz floor lamp with plastic metal frame and legs. Inspired by the Fortuny lamp of 1907, this lamp goes beyond the here and now, with silver rays in a kinetic ÛÒ futuristic rhythmic sequence, a clear sign of a dynamic launch towards the future. Floor lamp, rotates and has an adjustable height mechanism, the structure is finished with an Epoxy Powder Coat in black.

product.name: Miconos Table Lamp
product.description: The Artemide Miconos Table Lamp, designed by Ernesto Gismondi, is a table luminaire providing diffused incandescent lighting. The diffuser is transparent hand-blown glass and the handle and lamp holder assembly are chrome plated steel. The base and stem are also chrome plated steel, and the lamp features a dimmer on the cord.

product.name: Tolomeo Classic LED Table Lamp
product.description: Designed by Michele De Lucchi and Giancarlo Fassina, the Tolomeo family of table and task lamps adds brilliant light to your desk or reading area. A fully adjustable body means you can place the Tolomeo lamp at the height where you need it while the tiltable rotating head focuses the light at the perfect angle to meet your workspace needs.

product.description: Designed by Michele De Lucchi and Giancarlo Fassina, the Tolomeo family of table and task lamps adds brilliant light to your desk or reading area. product.name: Ipparco LED Table Lamp
product.description: Designed by Neil Poulton, the Ipparco LED Table Lamp gives you full range of motion thanks to a seamless design innovation. A magnet placed along the diffuser enables you to position the light ring anywhere along the chrome stem for fully adjustable, 360-degree capable light dispersion. A built-in dimmer on the cord lets you further tailor the light to meet your exacting specifications.

product.name: Demetra LED Table Lamp
product.description: Designed by lauded Japanese product designer Naoto Fukasawa, the Demetra Table Lamp offers focused, customizable light for your workspace. An adjustable arm allows you to position the light where you need it most, while the sleek painted aluminum exterior lends style to your desktop. Made for Artemide in Italy.

product.name: Melete Wall Light
product.description: The Melete Wall Sconce from Artemide is a simple, modern fixture that is crafted in a sleek white-finished aluminum. Designed in a rectangular box shape, the Melete sconce has sharp corners and crisp lines that give it a bold, geometric feel. The light is designed to focus most of the light output upward, as well as across the wall. The result is an aura-like effect above the fixture. The oval-shaped opening on the underside of the sconce creates a gentle downlight, which appears as a reflection or shadow of the more pronounced light from above.

product.name: Side Box Side Table - Walnut
product.description: The Side Box Side Table brings simple order to any environment. This distinctive side table is crafted in solid walnut or maple wood in California. Built to last generations the Side Box is a versatile solution for creating a table surface with storage. The table can be used two ways to create either a low surface 11.75" or a taller one at 16".
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: RS #3 Wood Foosball Table - Black
product.description: A football table for everyone. It’s all-terrain: the same model for indoor and outdoor. It’s made in high-quality materials, such as the weather resistant steel with cataphoresis coating process. For the first time ever, RS is using wood in their football tables. And for that they have chosen iroko, a strong and durable wood for outdoor use. Made in Spain.

product.name: RS #3 Wood Foosball Table - White
product.description: A football table for everyone. It’s all-terrain: the same model for indoor and outdoor. And for that they have chosen iroko, a strong and durable wood for outdoor use. Made in Spain.

product.name: Barcelona Throw - Red & Black
product.description: The Barcelona Throw is part of the Bitmap collection, a series inspired by the Catalan capital and featuring products that are designed from highly compressed images of cityscapes— bitmaps. This pixel-print blanket is knitted with a jacquard technique, using three colors in the base and one final color for the stitching. Knitted from almost two kilograms of superfine Italian merino wool, this cozy throw brings the vibrancy of urban Spain into your living room.

product.description: The Barcelona Throw is part of the Bitmap collection, a series inspired by the Catalan capital and featuring products that are designed from highly compressed images of cityscapes— bitmaps. Knitted from almost two kilograms of superfine Italian merino wool, this cozy throw brings the vibrancy of urban Spain into your living room.

product.name: Joint Venture Shelving System - Low - 4 Column
product.description: One tube plus one shelf = infinite possibilities. The Joint Venture Shelving System can be as simple or complex as you wish. The shelves, which can be placed in four different positions, are joined to the tubes to create patterns and borders which can be repeated or combined along the entire bookshelf. The shelves are so slim they disappears. So the objects and books seem to float in thin air an create irregular, almost impossible, shapes. Building walls and partitions of blended textures and colors. Putting it together is as easy as it comes. Not a single screw. The shelves are pressure fixed to the tubes with a system of flaps and slits.

product.name: Joint Venture Shelving System - Tall - 4 Column
product.description: One tube plus one shelf = infinite possibilities. The Joint Venture Shelving System can be as simple or complex as you wish. product.name: Quaternio Throw - Green Plaid
product.description: Quaternio is part of Integrate: Time and Space. This collection was launched in 2012 with Teixidors, a company expert in the art of hand-weaving, based in the Catalan city of Terrassa, once the hub of the Spanish textile industry. Quaternio Red was part of the original collection awarded 1st prize Textiles in the ICFF Awards 2012 in New York. Integrate: Time and Space is a collection inspired by alchemy: a process which for us at Zuzunaga, is inherently about transformation. Integrate: Time and Space reflects alchemy not only through its original design process, but also through the transformative effect that results from making products by hand - moving from analogue to digital and back again. This luxury wool blanket is handwoven using 100 percent ecological French merino wool. Made in Spain.

Building walls and partitions of blended textures and colors. Putting it together is as easy as it comes. Not a single screw. product.name: Mix Boxes Shelving
product.description: The Mix Boxes return a lo-fi interactivity to a world made busy by complex devices and objects. The set includes six well-crafted 5/8" thick solid maple boxes of varying size that allow you to create compositions based on your unique design and storage needs. Life is fluid: When circumstances change, The Mix Boxes change with them. Sideboard, bookcase, bedside tables or media storage - the uses are endless. This is not a static piece of furniture. The set encourages interaction and lets you bring your own personality to the product. Made in California

product.name: Light + Ladder Hanging Planter
product.description: Bring the energy and freshness of nature into your home with designer Farrah Sit’s Hanging Planter. The possibilities with this versatile piece are vast: curate your own organic installation, grow an herb garden in your kitchen wall, store small inspirations above your desk. Each handmade porcelain planter is fastened to an amber leather strap that dangles delicately from a solid brass hook, echoing the marriage of the substantial and the delicate in the natural world.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Arbor Jewelry Stand
product.description: Created by Quebeçois designer Zoë Mowat, the Arbor Jewelry Stand takes its inspiration from bowerbirds, a unique bird species that displays an array of brightly colored objects in and around its nest. Similarly, the Arbor provides a colorful refuge for valued treasures. The sculptural perch incorporates an integrated and removable mirror, brushed brass details, and colored platforms that display items while keeping them safe. A detachable solid wood dowel acts as the main support for hanging necklaces, bracelets, and whatever else you hold dear.

product.name: Ole Jensen Juicer
product.description: A juicer and a jug in one design. You juice right into the jug and then pour right out of your juicer.

product.name: Ole Jensen Colander
product.description: A reintroduction of the colander Ole Jensen designed for Room Copenhagen in 1995, this colander is used to both drain and serve. Pour vegetables or pasta over the perforated side, and shake to strain water. A simple turn of the wrist transfers the food to the other side so it can easily be poured into a bowl for serving. The rounded colander is cleverly shaped like an orange peel and is crafted in a smooth yellow melamine. Ole Jensen’s cookware line for Room Copenhagen was voted the #1 product line at Maison & Objet October 2013 by Wallpaper magazine.

product.name: Tom Dixon Screw Table - Small
product.description: Designed by Tom Dixon, the Screw Table is inspired by the tools and aesthetics of the Industrial Revolution. This sculptural, witty table is made from a sleek marble top screwed into a cast iron tripod base. The unique construction allows for multiple heights with just a turn of the screw.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Tom Dixon Screw Table - Large
product.description: Designed by Tom Dixon, the Screw Table is inspired by the tools and aesthetics of the Industrial Revolution. This sculptural, witty table is made from a sleek marble top screwed into a cast iron tripod base. The unique construction allows for multiple heights with just a turn of the screw.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Tom Dixon Peg Table - Square
product.description: Inspired by the minimal and understated aesthetic of Japanese architecture, the Peg Table by Tom Dixon is quiet yet refined. Made from solid blanched birch, the rounded corners and sculpted legs of Peg lend a softness to the otherwise sturdy construction.

product.name: Beat Stout Pendant Light
product.description: A series of lights inspired by the sculptural simplicity of brass cooking pots and traditional water vessels on the subcontinent. The Beat Lights are spun and hand-beaten by renowned skilled craftsmen of Moradabad in Northern India.

product.name: Beat Wide Pendant Light
product.description: A series of lights inspired by the sculptural simplicity of brass cooking pots and traditional water vessels on the subcontinent. The Beat Lights are spun and hand-beaten by renowned skilled craftsmen of Moradabad in Northern India.

product.name: Beat Fat Pendant Light
product.description: A series of lights inspired by the sculptural simplicity of brass cooking pots and traditional water vessels on the subcontinent. The Beat Lights are spun and hand-beaten by renowned skilled craftsmen of Moradabad in Northern India.

product.name: Beat Tall Pendant Light
product.description: A series of lights inspired by the sculptural simplicity of brass cooking pots and traditional water vessels on the subcontinent. The Beat Lights are spun and hand-beaten by renowned skilled craftsmen of Moradabad in Northern India.

product.name: Cell Short Pendant Light
product.description: A light that mimics cellular growth which can be used in multiple, geometric configurations. Each Cell Pendant Light is made from layers of finely etched, polished brass filtering light rays to throw a satisfyingly dappled glow casting intricate shadows on walls, floors and ceilings.

product.name: Base Copper Floor Lamp
product.description: With its industrial aesthetic cast iron base, minimal metallic shade and classical proportions, the Base Lamp remains an interior design staple. Traditional matt textured cast iron makes up the robust body with a spun-copper shade - highly polished to create a super-reflective and alluring shine.

product.name: Base Copper Wall Light
product.description: With its industrial aesthetic cast iron base, minimal metallic shade and classical proportions, the Base Lamp remains an interior design staple. Traditional matt textured cast iron makes up the robust body with a spun-copper shade - highly polished to create a super-reflective and alluring shine.

product.name: Tool the Mathematician Drafting Set
product.description: Art and science become one in this stunningly sculptural, endlessly practical piece from Tom Dixon. Informed by the unique British aesthetic, this kit of parts is comprised of sleek sheet brass cut into functional tools— a ruler, protractor, set square, and paper clips— etched with the most precise of measurements. Perfect for the mathematics aficionado or precision draughtsman, it brings beauty to any workshop or study.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Tom Dixon Block Watch
product.description: Minimalism is perfected in this statement watch from Tunisan-born British designer Tom Dixon. Nothing superfluous obscures the gorgeous simplicity of the square case, stamped from a block of brass and bearing a deep dial etched precisely with numerals. A thin crystal lens protects the dial, which attached seamlessly to a brown leather band. Each watch is laser etched with its own unique number. Swiss movement.

product.name: Tower Pepper Grinder
product.description: Unite levity and utility with this sculptural, energetic pepper grinder from British design outfit Tom Dixon. A wooden grinder made from the simplest of shapes and painted in hyper-vibrant black, white, and fluorescent orange, the interior is fitted with a highly designed Danish ceramic mechanism. It’s an exclamation point for the kitchen!

product.name: Tower Salt Grinder
product.description: Unite levity and utility with this sculptural, energetic salt grinder from British design outfit Tom Dixon. A wooden grinder made from the simplest of shapes and painted in hyper-vibrant black, white, and fluorescent orange, the interior is fitted with a highly designed Danish ceramic mechanism. It’s an exclamation point for the kitchen!

product.name: Stone Cake Stand
product.description: Elevate your next dessert to the level of art by placing it atop this masterpiece from Tom Dixon. A substantial white Morwad marble base supports a ribbed brass plate that is finished with a warm gold wash and adorned with a neat circumferential lip to enhance the perfect presentation. Store-bought or homemade, no cake should be served on anything but this proud pedestal.

product.name: Stone Chopping Board
product.description: From the British design outfit Tom Dixon, this Stone Chopping Board adapts to your culinary needs, elegantly accompanying you as you work and serve. A slab of carved white Morwad marble provides the perfect base for chopping, cutting, and rolling, while the delicate, hand-formed brass saucer can be used to collect crumbs, hold dips, or whatever else you may need it for. Brass etched logo on the base.

product.name: Delfonics Wood Ball Pen Black Ink - Yellow
product.description: A local standard in Japan for over 20 years, Delfonics produces innovative, colorful stationery, and desk items. The wood ball pen is available in an array of colors and features a simple, clean design that is eye-catching without being distracting. Both practical and beautiful, this instrument takes jotting down notes to brilliant, artful heights.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Delfonics Wood Ball Pen Black Ink - Natural
product.description: A local standard in Japan for over 20 years, Delfonics produces innovative, colorful stationery, and desk items. product.name: Duroplast Single Pencil Sharpener - Red
product.description: These pencil sharpeners are made by DUX, the oldest German brand for high quality pencil sharpeners, established in 1908 and continuing production in Geretsried, Bavaria. Made from blocks of Duroplast (Bakelite). Duroplast was the material used to produce the body of the Trabant peoples car, manufactured in East Germany until the fall of the Berlin Wall.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Duroplast Single Pencil Sharpener - Green
product.description: These pencil sharpeners are made by DUX, the oldest German brand for high quality pencil sharpeners, established in 1908 and continuing production in Geretsried, Bavaria. Made from blocks of Duroplast (Bakelite). Duroplast was the material used to produce the body of the Trabant peoples car, manufactured in East Germany until the fall of the Berlin Wall.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Siwa Paper - Long Wallet - Brown
product.description: A long and thin wallet, holding credit cards, bank notes, as well as coins in its zipped pocket. Washi paper-maker ONAO and designer Naoto Fukasawa have teamed up to create SIWA Paper Accessories, a line of elegant and functional products in hard-to-tear Hi-Tec paper. Soft Naoron is a paper developed by Onao from wood pulp and polyolefin utilizing the washi-suki paper manufacturing method. It is soft and flexible, highly water-resistant and does not tear easily. Soft Naoron does not emit noxious fumes when burned.

product.name: Siwa Paper - Short Wallet - Black
product.description: With six slits for credit card and plenty of room for banknotes, this folding wallet closes with an elastic and fits in any jacket inside pocket. Washi paper-maker ONAO and designer Naoto Fukasawa have teamed up to create SIWA Paper Accessories, a line of elegant and functional products in hard-to-tear Hi-Tec paper. Soft Naoron is a paper developed by Onao from wood pulp and polyolefin utilizing the washi-suki paper manufacturing method. It is soft and flexible, highly water-resistant and does not tear easily. Soft Naoron does not emit noxious fumes when burned.

product.name: Siwa Paper - Short Wallet - Dark Green
product.description: With six slits for credit card and plenty of room for banknotes, this folding wallet closes with an elastic and fits in any jacket inside pocket. Washi paper-maker ONAO and designer Naoto Fukasawa have teamed up to create SIWA Paper Accessories, a line of elegant and functional products in hard-to-tear Hi-Tec paper. Soft Naoron is a paper developed by Onao from wood pulp and polyolefin utilizing the washi-suki paper manufacturing method. It is soft and flexible, highly water-resistant and does not tear easily. Soft Naoron does not emit noxious fumes when burned.

product.name: Siwa Paper - Briefcase - Grey
product.description: As light as discreetly elegant, carry up to 10 kilos of computer, books and documents in this briefcase. Handles are made of fabric to allow maximum carry comfort. Washi paper-maker ONAO and designer Naoto Fukasawa have teamed up to create SIWA Paper Accessories, a line of elegant and functional products in hard-to-tear Hi-Tec paper. Soft Naoron is a paper developed by Onao from wood pulp and polyolefin utilizing the washi-suki paper manufacturing method. It is soft and flexible, highly water-resistant and does not tear easily. Soft Naoron does not emit noxious fumes when burned.

product.name: Pencil Display Organizer
product.description: This innovate design lets the aspiring artist or the discerning adult view all of his or her drawing materials at once. When positioned vertically, the Pencil Display Organizer holds up to 100 writing implements and can be wall-mounted. When positioned horizontally, it elegantly shows all your tools at once.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Anamorphosis Mirror
product.description: A true piece of art made from an oval stainless steel sheet, folded and polished by hand, the Anamorphosis Mirror creates a silver disc in an angle of the room, like an eyelet opening onto a new moving space. Up close, Anamorphosis is an ideal mirror for make-up, because it shows the three dimensions of the face: the front and both sides. As you move away from it and wander around it, the oval is distorted and displays moving and fluid images of its environment, until visible from only one place in the room, the the mirror itself becomes a perfect disc. Includes hanging ring for wall-mounting.

product.name: Posters Scale Poster Hanger
product.description: An example of perfect balance and economical materials, the Posters Scale Poster Hanger is made with 10 rods of connected walnut and two resistant threads. It creates a framework which can simultaneously support two posters of A2 format (50cm x 65cm), three drawings of A4 format, and three pictures or postcards. The Posters Scale Poster Hanger is designed to mount against the wall or on the ceiling to close a space (like a trellis) using only two nails. Art and photography is easily interchangeable.

product.name: Magnetic Tape Cutter
product.description: Sleek and minimal, this Magnetic Tape Cutter from designer Kamoi Kakoshi for MT Masking Tape adds beauty to functional office objects. A two-tone camel and cream coloring lends sophistication while the magnetized side adds unique functionality.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Buro Paper Clip Dispenser
product.description: Includes 30 paper clips (assorted colors)
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: L'ATELIER d' exercise Photo Display
product.description: Front, back, horizontal or vertical, the L'ATELIER Photo Display showcases drawings, portraits, letters and postcards according to the mood of the day. Five transparent frames with acrylic sheets, bound together by a screw system made from steel and solid beech wood. Holds up to 10 documents— which are easily changed out.

product.name: Kaweco Special Mechanical Pencil
product.description: There’s a time and a place for a Number 2 pencil, and it’s called the SATs. Make Kaweco’s mechanical pencil your new standard. The pencil has an octagonal barrel— a throwback to the old Number 2— that is crafted in sleek aluminum with a matte black finish. The Kaweco emblem is featured on the top button of the pencil, which reveals an eraser when removed. A product of a 120-year-old German company, this writing instrument maintains a classic feel, while fitting seamlessly into your daily, modern routine.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: MT Masking Tape - Solid Dark Colors - Set of 10
product.description: Founded ninety years ago in Okayama, Japan, Kamoi Kakoshi invented “washi” rice paper masking tape. Now branded as MT Masking Tape, the tape is easy to tear and can be easily repositioned without affecting the surface it is placed on. The tape is semi-transparent, which provides a nice effect when different tapes are layered on each other. This set of ten tapes is perfect for adding color, whether it’s on personal accessories like laptops and tablets, or to dress up a letter or notecard. The tape’s unsticky surface is writeable, so you can create your own original designs and patterns.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Nagelburste "Nail" Brush
product.description: Perfect for gardeners and the hard-at-work scrubber, the Nagelburste "Nail" Brush is just that— a solid brush on a bent nail. Handmade by fifteen blind artisans in the former Home for the Blind in Berlin using traditional craft techniques that the Institute for the Blind has developed over the last 120 years.

product.name: Siwa Paper - String & Button Envelope
product.description: Made from a unique durable paper, this innovative sleeve is soft and flexible, but still strong and water resistant. This button and string envelope is perfect for storing precious documents or using in place of a briefcase. It also makes an ideal case for an ipad or tablet. Washi paper-maker ONAO and designer Naoto Fukasawa have teamed up to create SIWA Paper Accessories, a line of elegant and functional products in hard-to-tear Hi-Tec paper. Soft Naoron is a paper developed by Onao from wood pulp and polyolefin utilizing the washi-suki paper manufacturing method. It is soft and flexible, highly water-resistant and does not tear easily. Soft Naoron does not emit noxious fumes when burned.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Mirrored Stainless Steel Champagne Bucket
product.description: This champagne bucket marries industrial style with elegance. In this barware Cinderella-story, the humble, seven-liter paint pail is recast in mirror stainless steel, ultimately becoming a sophisticated belle of the ball. Fortunately, the spell does not end at midnight, and this bucket can be the star of many future parties to come. With room for several bottles of bubbly or wine, the chic champagne bucket calls for counter or table display. True to its design, the bucket features interior grooves that one would find on a paint pail, reminding onlookers of its modest, but classic, beginnings.

product.name: 2097 - 50 Chandelier - Chrome
product.description: Designed by Gino Sarfatti for FLOS, the Mod 2097 Chandelier suspends 50 individual lamps along spindly brass arms for a sculptural and graceful effect. A center steel structure adds stability while the included 8-feet of cuttable cable allows for customizable drama. Steel ceiling fitting ensures a secure hold. Made in Italy.

product.name: 2097 - 50 Chandelier - Brass
product.description: Designed by Gino Sarfatti for FLOS, the Mod 2097 Chandelier suspends 50 individual lamps along spindly brass arms for a sculptural and graceful effect. A center steel structure adds stability while the included 8-feet of cuttable cable allows for customizable drama. Steel ceiling fitting ensures a secure hold. Made in Italy.

product.name: Glo-Ball F Floor Lamp - Small
product.description: From the Glo-Ball series by Jasper Morrison for FLOS. Floor lamp with blown white glass diffuser supported by a silver stem and base. Dimmer located on the cord.

product.name: Glo-Ball F Floor Lamp - Medium
product.description: From the Glo-Ball series by Jasper Morrison for FLOS. Floor lamp with blown white glass diffuser supported by a silver stem and base. Dimmer located on the cord.

product.name: Glo-Ball F Floor Lamp - Large
product.description: From the Glo-Ball series by Jasper Morrison for FLOS. Floor lamp with blown white glass diffuser supported by a silver stem and base. Dimmer located on the cord.

product.name: Glo-Ball T Table Lamp - Small
product.description: The Glo-Ball T table/desk lamp provides diffused light from its diffuser consisting of an externally acid-etched, hand blown, flashed opaline glass. Die-cast aluminum threaded ring nut with anodized finish. Grey painted high-thickness steel base and stem and die-cast aluminum diffuser support. On/Off switch (fluorescent) or dimmer (halogen) located on the cord. Select halogen or fluorescent lamping.

product.name: Glo-Ball T Table Lamp - Large
product.description: The Glo-Ball T table/desk lamp provides diffused light from its diffuser consisting of an externally acid-etched, hand blown, flashed opaline glass. Die-cast aluminum threaded ring nut with anodized finish. Grey painted high-thickness steel base and stem and die-cast aluminum diffuser support. On/Off switch (fluorescent) or dimmer (halogen) located on the cord. Select halogen or fluorescent lamping.

product.name: Goldman Table Lamp - Green
product.description: A modern take on an old classic, the Goldman Table Lamp is a high-powered desk lamp with a minimal footprint. The lamp is available with a gold base and transparent diffuser, reminiscent of traditional banker’s lamps, or in a more refined black and grey design. The Goldman Lamp features a high gloss shine, so while its slight frame allows it to blend into existing office décor, its shine makes it a standout piece. The lamp is illuminated by an optical switch on its base and uses soft touch dimming technology so it’s easy to adjust between decorative accent light and pronounced workspace lighting.

product.name: Goldman Table Lamp - Black
product.description: A modern take on an old classic, the Goldman Table Lamp is a high-powered desk lamp with a minimal footprint. The lamp is available with a gold base and transparent diffuser, reminiscent of traditional banker’s lamps, or in a more refined black and grey design. The Goldman Lamp features a high gloss shine, so while its slight frame allows it to blend into existing office décor, its shine makes it a standout piece. The lamp is illuminated by an optical switch on its base and uses soft touch dimming technology so it’s easy to adjust between decorative accent light and pronounced workspace lighting.

product.name: Tab LED Table Lamp - White
product.description: Beautifully simple, the Tab table lamp provides directional task lighting. Tab has a painted die-cast aluminum structure and a porcelain reflector. Adjust the pivoting head to provide directional light. Offered with energy-efficient LED lamping. On/Off switch located on the cord.

product.name: Tab LED Table Lamp - Black
product.description: Beautifully simple, the Tab table lamp provides directional task lighting. Tab has a painted die-cast aluminum structure and a porcelain reflector. Adjust the pivoting head to provide directional light. Offered with energy-efficient LED lamping. On/Off switch located on the cord.

product.name: Taccia LED Table Lamp - Anodized Aluminum
product.description: Table/floor lamp providing indirect and reflected light. Metal reflector with gloss white finish inside and white powder-coated outside. Adjustable hand-blown clear glass diffuser. Matte black or anodized silver extruded aluminum body. Nickel-plated and zapon-varnished polished steel base. Select from two finishes.

product.name: Taccia LED Table Lamp - Black
product.description: Table/floor lamp providing indirect and reflected light. Metal reflector with gloss white finish inside and white powder-coated outside. Adjustable hand-blown clear glass diffuser. Matte black or anodized silver extruded aluminum body. Nickel-plated and zapon-varnished polished steel base. Select from two finishes.

product.name: Tatou Floor Light - White
product.description: The Tatou Floor Lamp is composed of a steel painted body and an external polycarbonate diffuser with an injected printed opal polycarbonate internal diffuser. Available in black, white or bronze finishes. Ships with 66.93" of cord.

product.name: Tatou Floor Light - Black
product.description: The Tatou Floor Lamp is composed of a steel painted body and an external polycarbonate diffuser with an injected printed opal polycarbonate internal diffuser. Available in black, white or bronze finishes. Ships with 66.93" of cord.

product.name: Tatou Floor Light - Bronze
product.description: The Tatou Floor Lamp is composed of a steel painted body and an external polycarbonate diffuser with an injected printed opal polycarbonate internal diffuser. Available in black, white or bronze finishes. Ships with 66.93" of cord.

product.name: Tatou Table Lamp - White
product.description: The Tatou Table Lamp features a painted steel body with an exterior diffuser in polycarbonate and an injected printed opal polycarbonate internal diffuser. Ships with 59.06" of cord.

product.name: Tatou Table Lamp - Black
product.description: The Tatou Table Lamp features a painted steel body with an exterior diffuser in polycarbonate and an injected printed opal polycarbonate internal diffuser. Ships with 59.06" of cord.

product.name: Tatou Table Lamp - Bronze
product.description: The Tatou Table Lamp features a painted steel body with an exterior diffuser in polycarbonate and an injected printed opal polycarbonate internal diffuser. Ships with 59.06" of cord.

product.name: Ktribe F2 Floor Light - Transparent
product.description: The Ktribe F2 Floor Lamp employs a classic shape with contemporary attention. Designed by Phillipe Starck, the Ktribe F2 features an inner and outer diffuser, enabling light to filter in both downward and upward directions. When lit, the lamp’s flared outer shade falls away, exposing the illuminated inner diffuser— a simple tulip shape. When the lamp is off, the outer shade appears more opaque, which allows the lamp to have two distinctive appearances. The Ktribe F2 is dimmable, allowing you to play up the contrast between translucent and bright, smoky and subtle. At once dramatic and simple, the Ktribe F2 provides balance for contemporary living spaces.

product.name: Ktribe F2 Floor Light - Fumee
product.description: The Ktribe F2 Floor Lamp employs a classic shape with contemporary attention. Designed by Phillipe Starck, the Ktribe F2 features an inner and outer diffuser, enabling light to filter in both downward and upward directions. When lit, the lamp’s flared outer shade falls away, exposing the illuminated inner diffuser— a simple tulip shape. When the lamp is off, the outer shade appears more opaque, which allows the lamp to have two distinctive appearances. The Ktribe F2 is dimmable, allowing you to play up the contrast between translucent and bright, smoky and subtle. At once dramatic and simple, the Ktribe F2 provides balance for contemporary living spaces.

product.name: Ktribe F2 Floor Light - Bronze
product.description: The Ktribe F2 Floor Lamp employs a classic shape with contemporary attention. Designed by Phillipe Starck, the Ktribe F2 features an inner and outer diffuser, enabling light to filter in both downward and upward directions. When lit, the lamp’s flared outer shade falls away, exposing the illuminated inner diffuser— a simple tulip shape. When the lamp is off, the outer shade appears more opaque, which allows the lamp to have two distinctive appearances. The Ktribe F2 is dimmable, allowing you to play up the contrast between translucent and bright, smoky and subtle. At once dramatic and simple, the Ktribe F2 provides balance for contemporary living spaces.

product.name: Smithfield S Pendant Light - Black
product.description: With its clean lines and sleek finish, the Smithfield S Pendant Light is a simple yet striking lighting element. Providing direct light, this ceiling light will elegantly illuminate a dining room table or kitchen counter. Designed by Jasper Morrison, the pendant features a gloss-finished aluminum body in a lustrous black. The interior of the body is cast with an injection-molded opalescent polycarbonate diffuser, which creates an almost absorbent, soft quality to the lamp’s interior. For stability, the Smithfield S utilizes a steel ceiling attachment and is suspended from a steel cable.

product.name: Smithfield S Pendant Light - White
product.description: With its clean lines and sleek finish, the Smithfield S Pendant Light is a simple yet striking lighting element. Providing direct light, this ceiling light will elegantly illuminate a dining room table or kitchen counter. Designed by Jasper Morrison, the pendant features a gloss-finished aluminum body in a brilliant white. The interior of the body is cast with an injection-molded opalescent polycarbonate diffuser, which creates an almost absorbent, soft quality to the lamp’s interior. For stability, the Smithfield S utilizes a steel ceiling attachment, and is suspended from a steel cable.

product.name: Glo-Ball Basic Light - Small
product.description: Glo-Ball Basic provides diffused lighting. The diffuser consists of an externally acid-etched, hand blown, flashed opaline glass and a die-cast aluminum threaded ring nut with anodized finish. 30% fiberglass reinforced injection-molded polyamide base. Gray painted, die-cast aluminum diffuser support. Switch located on cord with On/Off for fluorescent or 0-100% dimmer for halogen version. Select from two sizes and halogen or fluorescent lamping options.

product.name: Glo-Ball Basic Light - Large
product.description: Glo-Ball Basic Zero table lamp with blown white acid-etched glass diffuser. 30% fiberglass reinforced injection-molded polyamide (UL-94 V2) base. Gray painted, die-cast aluminum diffuser support. On/off switch on black polarized power cord.

product.name: Taraxacum 88 S1 Pendant Light
product.description: Taraxacum 88 is a suspension fixture providing direct and reflected lighting. The structure is formed by 20 pressed, polished aluminum triangles. 60 clear Globolux lamps housed around the structure. Steel ceiling fitting and canopy. Steel suspension cable. Ships with eight feet of cord.

product.name: Mini Glo-Ball Table Light
product.description: Designed by Jasper Morrison for Flos Lighting in 2003, the Mini Glo-Ball Table Light is a petite addition to Morrison’s Glo-Ball series. The Mini Glo-Ball yields diffused light, adding accent lighting to smaller spaces like bookshelves or crowded desktops. The lamp’s globe is made of acid etched, hand blown, flashed opal glass and rests on an understated white plastic base. Although it is certainly an effective table light, the Mini Glo-Ball is also a beautiful accent piece, whether it is illuminated or not. Use one lamp as a singular light, or create an artistic installation with several, thoughtfully grouped Mini Glo-Balls.

product.name: D'E-Light Task Lamp
product.description: Designed by Phillipe Starck, the D’E Light Table Lamp provides a spare, yet sophisticated take on the classic table lamp. Featuring a charging doc for iPhone and iPad, the D’E Light is a sleek multi-tasker that allows you to do more, while taking up less space. Designed with Starck’s idea to shrink everything down while producing great impact, the D’E Light is both strikingly minimal and highly functional. The delicate stem of the lamp plays a soft, subtle contrast to the angular nature of the lamp’s base, head, and docking station. The result is a seamless blend of shapes and lines, making this lamp an intriguing addition to a nightstand or side table.

product.name: Boskke Cube Clear Plant Pot - Small
product.description: Contemporary gardening company Boskke creates products with urban spaces in mind. The Boskke Cube is an innovative, self-watering planter that only needs to be watered once a month. In addition to this practical feature, the Cube also exhibits a distinctive design— the classic pot is deconstructed and recast as a transparent planter, revealing the plant’s water, soil, and roots. Featuring space for one large plant, this Cube includes a large water reservoir and a Slo-Flo watering system that keeps the plant nourished during extended watering periods. A clean and original design, the Boskke Cube will make a refreshing addition to a kitchen table or desk.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Boskke Cube 3 Small Clear Plant Pot
product.description: Contemporary gardening company Boskke creates products with urban spaces in mind. In addition to this practical feature, the Cube also exhibits a distinctive design— the classic pot is deconstructed and recast as a transparent planter, revealing the plants’ water, soil, and roots. Featuring space for three small plants, this Cube would make an excellent addition to a cook’s kitchen counter— with basil, oregano, and mint on hand— or a charming floral trio for an indoor Green Thumb— primroses, amaryllises, and African violets would provide cheery pops of color to a windowsill or desk. With a large water reservoir and a Slo-Flo watering system, herbs and flowers alike will remain nourished during extended watering periods. A clean and original design, the Boskke Cube will make a refreshing addition to an indoor space.
product.category: Home > Outdoor > Outdoor Decor > Planters & Accessories

product.name: Perimeter Tray - Oak
product.description: The Perimeter Tray from Ladies & Gentlemen Studio is a simple piece with a complex play of materials— the tray mixes an oak surface with a Carrera marble insert and powder-coated aluminum handles and perimeter. The marble insert can serve as a plate or cheeseboard, and can be repositioned within the tray to be used as a decorative divider. The marble can also be removed, presenting a beautiful and uninterrupted hardwood surface. The Perimeter Tray is easy to transport, whether you’re setting down hors d’oeuvres at a holiday party or delivering a lucky someone breakfast in bed.

product.name: Perimeter Tray - Walnut
product.description: The Perimeter Tray from Ladies & Gentlemen Studio is a simple piece with a complex play of materials— the tray mixes a walnut surface with a Carrera marble insert, brass handles, and a powder-coated aluminum perimeter. The marble insert can serve as a plate or cheeseboard, and can be repositioned within the tray to be used as a decorative divider. The marble can also be removed, presenting a beautiful and uninterrupted hardwood surface. The Perimeter Tray is easy to transport, whether you’re setting down hors d’oeuvres at a holiday party or delivering a lucky someone breakfast in bed.

product.name: The Frank Gehry Right Twist Cube - Silver
product.description: Celebrated architect Frank Gehry designed an innovative furniture collection for Heller in 2004. The collection, which features several cubes, a bench, table, chair, and sofa, is characterized by its striking resemblance to sculpture. Although the pieces are suited for daily use, they also look quite lovely on their own—the sleek surfaces, coupled with the gentle curves and flowing lines, allow the collection to be admired for its beauty, as much as it is utilized for function. Crafted from molded polymer, the furniture is comfortable as well as versatile—it can be used indoors and out. This cube is a multipurpose piece, as it can be used as a side table or a stool for sitting. Designed with a graceful twist, the cube works well as a singular accent, or as a complement to other pieces in the Frank Gehry collection.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Pure Black Utility Knife
product.description: Designed for cooks who appreciate quality tools and beautiful, daring design, Stelton’s Pure Black Knives are cutting edge kitchen tools. Each knife is forged from a single piece of stainless steel, so the handles morph into the blades without the interruption of a different material and color. The result is a clean, sleek silhouette that is pure, while also striking. The design of the knives makes them easy to clean, and the matte black coating provides a secure grip whether you need to chop, slice, or dice. When not in use, the knives would provide an elegant, edgy accent when stored on a magnetic knife holder on the wall. The Pure Black Knives collection includes a large chef’s knife, small chef’s knife, bread knife, santuko knife, and utility knife.

product.name: Mario Bellini MB2 Sofa - Dark Grey
product.description: Designed for Heller by Mario Bellini, the MB Collection is a versatile furniture series that features a self-cushioning polymer that makes the furniture comfortable, while also maintaining its firmness and stability. The award-winning, versatile pieces of the MB Collection can be used in both indoor and outdoor settings, as the molded polymer surface is resistant to moisture. Each piece in the collection is defined by its angular lines and bold shape, giving a substantial, weighty effect to the pieces. The MB 2—the sofa of the collection—is a roomy piece that works well as a standalone piece on a patio or in a sitting room, or as a complement to the other pieces in the MB Collection.

product.name: Mario Bellini MB1 Lounge Arm Chair - Dark Grey
product.description: Designed for Heller by Mario Bellini, the MB Collection is a versatile furniture series that features a self-cushioning polymer that makes the furniture comfortable, while also maintaining its firmness and stability. The award-winning, versatile pieces of the MB Collection can be used in both indoor and outdoor settings, as the molded polymer surface is resistant to moisture. Each piece in the collection is defined by its angular lines and bold shape, giving a substantial, weighty effect to the pieces. The MB 1— the armchair of the collection— is a bold piece that works well as a standalone accent piece, or as a complement to the other pieces in the MB Collection.

product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Vignelli Bench - Light Grey
product.description: Husband and wife Lella and Massimo Vignelli needed casual furniture for their new Sorrento home, and designed the Vignelli series. Each piece in series—bench, table, and cube—is constructed of a single piece of roto molded polymer. The versatile Vignelli pieces are suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, as the surface material is water resistant. Each piece in the collection is defined by straight lines and crisp angles. The Vignelli Bench is suitable for use as a place to sit or a narrow table, and works as a standalone piece or as a complement to the other pieces in the Vignelli Collection.

product.name: Vignelli Table - Light Grey
product.description: Husband and wife Lella and Massimo Vignelli needed casual furniture for their new Sorrento home, and designed the Vignelli series. Each piece in series— bench, table, and cube— is constructed of a single piece of roto molded polymer. The versatile Vignelli pieces are suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, as the surface material is water resistant. Each piece in the collection is defined by straight lines and crisp angles. The Vignelli table is suitable for use as a low table, but the polymer is also comfortable enough to sit on. The table works as a standalone piece in a living room or den, or as a complement to the other pieces in the Vignelli Collection

product.name: Hasami Porcelain Plate - 3 1/3"
product.description: Hasami Porcelain is characterized by simple, clean lines and an aesthetic that is both highly modern and deeply seeded in Japanese pottery tradition. The company creates products on a fixed module, meaning that diameters are shared across the line, making them easy to be stacked and transported. The result of the stacking and interchangeability of the products is not only highly functional, but is also aesthetically pleasing— the even stacks provide a sense of calm and serenity to a cupboard of counter space. Crafted from Hasami’s custom blend of porcelain and clay, this plate is softer to the touch than traditional porcelain, ensuring a positive tactile experience when passing a companion her plate, or serving a dish. With a lovely matte finish, this plate is beautiful enough to serve to a distinguished guest, and simple enough to use every day.

product.name: Hasami Porcelain Mug 11 oz.
product.description: Hasami Porcelain is characterized by simple, clean lines and an aesthetic that is both highly modern and deeply seeded in Japanese pottery tradition. The company creates products on a fixed module, meaning that diameters are shared across the line, making them easy to be stacked and transported. The result of the stacking and interchangeability of the products is not only highly functional, but is also aesthetically pleasing— the even stacks provide a sense of calm and serenity to a cupboard of counter space. Crafted from Hasami’s custom blend of porcelain and clay, this mug is softer to the touch than traditional porcelain, ensuring a positive tactile experience when delivering a mug of coffee, or enjoying a cup of tea. With a lovely matte finish, this mug is beautiful enough to serve to a distinguished guest, and simple enough to use every day.

product.name: Nambu Tekki Castiron Tool Bottle Opener - Hammer
product.description: Designed to look like a real hammer, this bottle opener from Saikai is hand-forged in the traditional Nambu Tekki cast iron method. First made in the mid 17th century in Japan, nambu tekki is a celebrated Japanese craft, still popular today. The black color of the bottle opener is derived from a lacquer glaze called urushi, which craftsmen use to prevent rusting on the iron pieces. This bottle opener resembles a real hammer, both in look and feel, making this piece a conversation starter that is both entertaining and functional. A durable piece, the hammer bottle opener is an excellent kitchen accessory for a person who can’t get enough of their tools— or beautiful handicrafts.

product.name: Nambu Tekki Castiron Tool Bottle Opener - Pliers
product.description: Designed to look like a real set of pliers, this bottle opener from Saikai is hand-forged in the traditional Nambu Tekki cast iron method. First made in the mid 17th century in Japan, nambu tekki is a celebrated Japanese craft, still popular today. The black color of the bottle opener is derived from a lacquer glaze called urushi, which craftsmen use to prevent rusting on the iron pieces. This bottle opener resembles real pliers, both in look and feel, making this piece a conversation starter that is both entertaining and functional. A durable piece, the plier bottle opener is an excellent kitchen accessory for a person who can’t get enough of their tools— or beautiful handicrafts.

product.name: Saito Wood Waste Basket - Ash
product.description: Trash receptacles are not typically synonymous with beauty, but this wastebasket from Saito begs to differ. Crafted in lightweight wood and polished to a gloss finish, this necessary accessory becomes an accent worthy of attention. The wastebasket features a simple flip top cover, so while it might attract some adoring gazes, the basket’s contents will be discreetly hidden inside. Suitable for use in a bathroom, home office, or bedroom, the Saito Wood Wastebasket is an attractive way to beautify a typically humble home accessory.

product.name: Hario Drip Kettle
product.description: With the Hario Drip Kettle, it’s easy to take the simple task of brewing morning coffee from stale to sophisticated. Used as a pour over brewer, the stainless steel kettle has an ergonomic design and features a long, slender spout that’s ideal for steady, continued pouring over coffee grounds. Pouring in this way ensures an even saturation of grounds, as well as sustained extraction. Aside from the flavorful cups of coffee the kettle yields, it’s also stunning to look at with its subtle, undulating curves and delicate spout. It’s a kettle that deserves to be displayed after use. The Hario Drip Kettle works excellently when paired with a manual coffee maker, like the Hario Drip Pot.

product.name: Hario Coffee Drip Pot
product.description: The Hario Drip Pot is a manual coffee maker, made for brewing coffee in small servings. Using a reusable cloth filter, the Drip Pot is an ideal vessel when paired with a pour over kettle like the Hario Drip Kettle. The filter rests easily within the top of the pot, which has a narrow, tulip shape to aid in the brewing process. The base of the pot is more bulbous, which enables the coffee to expand and grow its flavor once it works its way through the filter. After the coffee has brewed and the filter is removed—an easy task with the filter’s wood handle— coffee can be poured directly from the pot. The wood collar on the drip pot stays cool to the touch, ensuring painless pours, every time.

product.name: Kiya Nail Clipper
product.description: Elevate your grooming accessories with these nail clippers from Kiya. A Japanese company known for its elite knives, Kiya has brought its expert craftsmanship to this personal item. The clippers are made of steel, and feature a shatterproof cover. Sharper—and more attractive—than standard drugstore clippers, this piece has a distinctive feature—the plastic case catches clippings, preventing them from scattering. The clippers also include a built-in file, making this a one-stop accessory for quick nail maintenance.

product.name: Yanagi Stainless Cutlery - 4 Piece Place Setting
product.description: When it come to something that you use every day, it might as well be beautiful. This four-piece set of cutlery, designed in 2002 by Sori Yanagi, includes a dinner fork, dinner spoon, knife, and dessert spoon. Characterized by clean lines and a simple design, Yanagi’s cutlery is both functional and durable—each piece is made of stainless steel, and is dishwasher safe. While designed to be used as an everyday set of cutlery, these designs are far from mundane. This minimal and sophisticated flatware will also make an attractive place setting for a special occasion.

product.name: Sunao - 5 Piece Flatware Place Setting
product.description: The Sunao flatware setting from Saikai is designed with nature and function in mind. The delicate curves soften the straightness of each piece, recalling a soft breeze or a ripple of water. Each slim and stretched form was designed to link the characteristics of forks and chopsticks, creating a symmetry between the different types of utensils. The set includes a dinner fork, dinner spoon, dinner knife, teaspoon, and dessert fork. Each component features a rounded handle base, which not only has a pleasant tactile function— it provides a comfortable grip—but also echoes the curvature of the set.

product.name: Toyo Sasaki Glass Mini
product.description: The HS Stackable Glasses from Toyo Sasaki have been a best-selling product for over 40 years. Featuring the Hard Strong (HS) glass-strengthening technology developed by Toyo Sasaki Glass in 1967, this small glass is more durable than standard glassware. The HS is applied to the top portion of the glass, which toughens the glass so that it is resistant to chipping, especially when stacked with other Toyo Sasaki stackable glasses. Renowned for their durability, these glasses are the industry standard for the foodservice and hospitality sectors in Japan. The HS series from Toyo Sasaki has been awarded the Good Design Award and the Good Design-Long Life Design Award.

product.name: Toyo Sasaki Glass
product.description: The HS Stackable Glasses from Toyo Sasaki have been a best-selling product for over 40 years. Featuring the Hard Strong (HS) glass-strengthening technology developed by Toyo Sasaki Glass in 1967, this glass is more durable than standard glassware. The HS is applied to the top portion of the glass, which toughens the glass so that it is resistant to chipping, especially when stacked with other Toyo Sasaki stackable glasses. Renowned for their durability, these glasses are the industry standard for the foodservice and hospitality sectors in Japan. The HS series from Toyo Sasaki has been awarded the Good Design Award and the Good Design-Long Life Design Award.

product.name: Viva Brass Bicycle Bell
product.description: Trained architect Oji Masanori founded Oji & Design in 2004, where his focus shifted to designing products for everyday life. His Brass Bicycle Bell is inspired by vintage designs, adopting the familiar silhouette of a traditional bike bell. Made of 100 percent brass, this bike bell features the familiar metallic trill of retro bicycle bells, and is a great way for cyclists to let people know they’re coming. This shiny bell is easily attached to bicycles with an adjustable screw fastening that hinges to accommodate varied thicknesses of handlebars. Ding!

product.name: Quart Table Lamp - Walnut/Black
product.description: Rich Brilliant Willing’s Quart Table Lamp is comprised of simple cylindrical volumes. Like a structure of stacked building blocks, the stone base, wood stem, and powder-coated aluminum shade evolve from each other to create a spare, functional fixture with a minimal footprint. The organic nature of the materials—stone, wood, and metal—coupled with minimalist, modern shapes, make Quart an ideal blend of natural and refined design. It is pure, while also thoughtfully restrained. With a pivoting shade that makes directing and redirecting light simple, Quart is an ideal desk or bedside companion.

product.name: Quart Table Lamp - Walnut/White
product.description: Rich Brilliant Willing’s Quart Table Lamp is comprised of simple cylindrical volumes. product.name: Branch Sconce - Small
product.description: A part of Rich Brilliant Willing’s Branch series, this sconce is an industrial take on nature. Constructed as a simple length like a tree branch, the sconce is composed of a perforated metal shell that sits atop a diffuser lens. The branch gives off a warm light, and is well-suited for an entryway or hallway, or as an accent in an office or den. The sconce can be hung by itself as a minimal fixture, or can be grouped with other sconces in the series to create a distinctive and illuminated artistic installation.

product.name: Branch Sconce - Medium
product.description: A part of Rich Brilliant Willing’s Branch series, this sconce is an industrial take on nature. Constructed as a simple length like a tree branch, the sconce is composed of a perforated metal shell that sits atop a diffuser lens. The branch gives off a warm light, and is well-suited for an entryway or hallway, or as an accent in an office or den. The sconce can be hung by itself as a minimal fixture, or can be grouped with other sconces in the series to create a distinctive and illuminated artistic installation.

product.name: Branch Sconce - Large
product.description: A part of Rich Brilliant Willing’s Branch series, this sconce is an industrial take on nature. The branch gives off a warm light, and is well-suited for an entryway or hallway, or as an accent in an office or den. The sconce can be hung by itself as a minimal fixture, or can be grouped with other sconces in the series to create a distinctive and illuminated artistic installation.

product.name: Delta Floor Lamp
product.description: Rich Brilliant Willing’s Delta Floor Lamp is a flawless marrying of traditional and modern design. Utilizing the established box pleat technique, Delta is comprised of folded fabric in a unique silhouette that creates a more contemporary look of the familiar lampshade. Inspired by a rocket engine—notice the octagonal, rounded shape of the shade—the lamp was named after an astrodynamic number (Delta-v). Although designed with space in mind, Delta is much better suited for brightening earthly interiors. The black shade features an opaque gold liner, which creates a beautiful, luminous glow when the lamp is illuminated.

product.name: Branch Double Floor Lamp
product.description: The Branch Double Floor Lamp is a lighting source inspired by nature. Designed like a tree, the lamp’s base is elevated in a tripod design, resembling exposed roots. The column—or trunk—of the lamp yields two branches, comprised of perforated metal shells atop diffuser lenses. The varied finishes and exposed hardware of the fixture provide an industrial take on the lamp’s natural inspiration. The Branch Double Floor lamp works best when placed in an office or den, to give an elevated light source that is both modern and organic in construction.

product.name: Flow Radio - Grey
product.description: The Flow Radio is an FM radio with minimalistic style and maximum intentions. Designed by Philip Wong, the Flow is meant to pare the radio down to its most basic elements and enable the user to discover the industrial design involved in the product. The radio combines a transparent outer case with monochrome interior elements, and can be used as an MP3 amplifier in addition to its FM radio capabilities. When not in use, the stylishly designed radio will provide a cool, modern accent to bookshelves or a side table.

product.name: Flow Radio - Red
product.description: The Flow Radio is an FM radio with minimalistic style and maximum intentions. Designed by Philip Wong, the Flow is meant to pare the radio down to its most basic elements and enable the user to discover the industrial design involved in the product.
