product.name: Plywood S Wall Clock
product.description: Constructed from solid plywood, the Plywood wall clock from Lemnos is a quiet and elegant timepiece. The clean design and crisp typeface is indicative of Japanese design values like purity and simplicity. Neutral in tone and uncomplicated in style, the Plywood S Wall Clock will communicate nicely with existing décor, and will not distract attention. The use of natural materials gives the plywood clock an organic quality that will pair nicely with other décor elements like metal accents or porcelain tiling. The subtly designed piece uses silent Seiko sweep movement for quiet, uninterrupted time telling.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Snow S Wall Clock
product.description: The Snow Wall Clock is a clean, simply designed clock that is a suitable accent for contemporary spaces. Crafted from solid plywood, the clock has a thin frame that blends subtly into the face of the clock. For a distinctive effect, the numbers—in a bold white font—are imprinted on the glass of the clock, which creates a light, airy quality within the piece. The numbers create subtle shadows on the plywood face, which gives the Snow wall clock an added dimension. This wall clock will provide a pop of interest on a dark wall, or will blend nicely into a neutral and white palette.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Muku Wooden Desk Clock
product.description: The simple Muku desk clock from Lemnos is handcrafted in Toyama, Japan. Muku means “solid wood” in Japanese, and this desk clock lives up to its name. Crafted from solid alder, the Muku desk clock features a rounded shape that is slightly tilted—it appears to balance in place. The clock utilizes silent movement, so ticking will not interfere with sleep if it is used on a dresser or nightstand. The natural wood grain of the clock provides an organic quality to the piece, and its neutral tones enable it to blend nicely into existing interior spaces.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Riki Wooden Alarm Clock
product.description: The Riki Alarm Clock from Lemnos displays a harmony between modern design and traditional style. The round shape recalls the original style of metal alarm clocks, but the lack of feet and wood construction gives the clock a more contemporary feel. Another modern advance—the snooze button—is incorporated into the top of the clock. The natural wood grain of the clock’s frame provides an organic quality to the piece, and its neutral tones enable it to blend nicely into existing interior spaces. The large, bold numbers on the clock’s face are decidedly contemporary, but the use of a serif font recalls traditional text. Combined, the elements of the Riki clock make it a beautiful addition to a bedside table.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Campagne Clock
product.description: The Campagne Clock from Lemnos is designed with simple lines and a clean palette. The white face features numbers in a thin font, and slender hands that, at their meeting place, become a thicker X shape. French for “countryside,” Campagne has a simple, wholesome quality with its large face and wood frame. The slight slant to the frame is a subtle departure from the classic silhouette from which the clock is inspired. The clock uses silent Seiko sweep movement for quiet, uninterrupted time telling.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: SoSo Wall Clock
product.description: The newly released SoSo Clock from Lemnos marries simple, clean design and bold, striking features. Its saturated marigold face is a lively pop of color to white or grey walls, but would also pair nicely with navy and maroon. Where most clocks feature numbers at the border of the clock, the SoSo brings them in tight to the middle, leaving a wide space between the numbers and the slight frame. The hour hand provides a nice interruption to the black and yellow of the clock—it is featured in a brilliant white. Despite its bold color and contrast, the SoSo maintains a clean, pure aesthetic that is suitable to a variety of contemporary interiors.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: 15% Collection Aluminum Ice Cream Scoop
product.description: “I scream, you scream, we all scream” when ice cream is difficult to scoop. The 15% line from Lemnos is made with high-grade aluminum—a metal with high thermal conductivity—that conducts the hand’s temperature when in use. This makes the ice cream softer, so it is easier to scoop and serve. Each ice cream scoop is hand-polished by a Japanese metal craftsman, ensuring that the quality instrument has a brilliant shine. Designed by Japanese designer Nakoi Terada, the all aluminum body features smooth curves and is crafted to fit into the whole palm when it is held.

product.name: 15% Collection Aluminum Ice Cream Spoon
product.description: “I scream, you scream, we all scream” when ice cream is too hard to eat. The 15% line from Lemnos is made with high-grade aluminum—a metal with high thermal conductivity—that conducts the hand’s temperature when in use. This makes the ice cream softer, so it is easier to spoon and eat. Each ice cream spoon is hand-polished by a Japanese metal craftsman, ensuring that the quality utensil has a brilliant shine. Designed by Japanese designer Nakoi Terada, the all aluminum body features smooth curves and is crafted to fit into the whole palm when it is held.

product.name: Beside Alarm Clock
product.description: The Beside Alarm Clock from Lexon is a minimalist timepiece that features a bold, monochromatic palette. Designed by Ludovic Roth and Alexandre Dubreull, the Beside clock is an analog clock that flirts with retro qualities—the size and shape are reminiscent of traditional alarm clocks—while maintaining a decidedly modern sensibility. Crafted in rubber, the Beside features a snooze button that, when pressed, briefly turns on a small LED light so you can easily discern the time at night. The device is simple enough that it can fit in with a variety of interiors, but is bold enough that it is sure to be noticed.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: LED Bag Light
product.description: It’s easy to misplace a set of keys in a purse or backpack, especially when it’s dark and difficult to see inside the bag. The thoughtfully designed Bag Light from Lexon is a solution to the dreaded and inevitable disappearance of small items. Made of silicone rubber, the Bag Light features a loop on one end that has a magnetic closure—it’s perfect for wrapping around the handle of a purse, tote, or backpack—and a small but powerful LED light that illuminates when pressed. This simple light makes searching for those pesky keys a much easier endeavor.

product.name: Mezzo Radio
product.description: Designed by Ionna Vautrin for Lexon, the Mezzo Radio is a throwback to vintage styles. With modern upgrades like a durable silicone rubber case and an output for MP3 players, the Mezzo is a versatile audio device. The battery-powered radio is extremely portable, so it’s perfect for listening to a baseball game while working in the garage, or for listening to a playlist from your iPhone at the beach. The speaker grille is reminiscent of older radio models, and includes a knob for tuning and volume. When not in use, the stylishly designed radio will provide a cool retro accent to bookshelves or a side table.

product.name: Tykho Radio
product.description: Designed by Marc Berthier for Lexon in 1997, the Tykho radio is an audio box that, despite the invention of iPods, still holds up. Crafted from rubber, the radio is waterproof, so if you need a soundtrack to your showers, it is a perfect choice. The largely monochrome piece includes a black antenna for contrast, and an easy to push on/off button on the top of the device. The AM/FM and volume buttons on the front of the radio are reminiscent of retro video game controllers—although when the Tykho was originally designed, they weren’t quite so retro.

product.name: Tykho Umbrella
product.description: Designed with the urbanite in mind, the Tykho City Umbrella features a classic design with a stylish pop of color at the handle. The polyester umbrella canopy uses an eight-panel design and has a forty-eight inch radius when opened. A sturdy alternative to the cheap sidewalk-sold umbrella, the Tykho is structured on a durable aluminum shaft and includes a network of aluminum ribs for stability during heavy downpours. The umbrella is designed to be easy to open—ideal for popping open when emerging from the subway—and the silicone handle makes the umbrella easy to carry.

product.name: Hook City Umbrella
product.description: There isn’t a scene much more bleak than a person fighting with a flipped, inside-out umbrella in a torrential downpour. With the Hook Umbrella from Lexon, that person will not be you. The durable umbrella is designed to withstand strong gusts of wind and shield even the heaviest of downpours. The rubber handle provides a comfortable tactile experience and its closed loop style makes it convenient to hang on a hook or coat rack—and easy to swing back and forth on your finger when the rain has subsided. The hook umbrella is such an effective umbrella, you might find yourself carrying it around all the time, just in case.

product.name: Century Hotel Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of The Century Hotel, Chisel & Mouse captures the iconic South Beach, Miami hotel’s art deco design, complete with its beach front façade that features a combination of straight lines and geometric shapes. Chisel & Mouse enhanced its sculpture by incorporating metal accents that mimic the hotel’s windows and doors, as well as its recognizable signage.

product.name: Bong Round Coffee Table - Faux Marble White Carrara
product.description: Designed by Giulio Cappellini, the Bong is a round coffee or side table that is made of a matte-finished fiberglass. The beautiful piece is almost a perfect sphere—the bottom is slightly truncated so that it rests flat on the floor, and the top is cut to create a flat surface for a stack of magazines, a cocktail, or—in a pinch—a place to sit. Available in a variety of colors, the Bong is an occasional table that mimics sculpture; it looks just as purposeful as an accent as it does when in use as a functional table.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Bong Round Coffee Table - White
product.description: Designed by Giulio Cappellini, the Bong is a round coffee or side table that is made of a matte-finished fiberglass. product.name: Cross Medicine Cabinet - Red
product.description: Designed by Thomas Ericksson for Cappellini, the Cross Medicine Cabinet takes on a universally recognized symbol—the medical cross—with this cabinet. Available in a lacquer-finished iconic red, white, and green, this cabinet is a playful, allusive way to store medicine and other pharmacy items. Although this piece is a functional container for toiletries, it can also be used outside of the bathroom as a storage accent for other small items. Both decorative and functional, the Cross Medicine Cabinet can be used on its own as a striking accent, or lined up with several others to create a bold, artistic installation.

product.name: Cross Medicine Cabinet - White
product.description: Designed by Thomas Ericksson for Cappellini, the Cross Medicine Cabinet takes on a universally recognized symbol—the medical cross—with this cabinet. Available in a lacquer-finished iconic red, white, and green, this cabinet is a playful, allusive way to store medicine and other pharmacy items. product.name: Bambi Table - Blue
product.description: Designed by Nendo for Cappellini in 2008, the Bambi Table is a versatile piece that can be used as a desk, kitchen table, or even as a dining table for an outside space. The Bambi is crafted from thin metal, which creates sharp edges and captivating lines. When set in a space with a softer aesthetic—like a cozy den—the Bambi creates a visual contrast without distracting from the existing environment. It’s thin laser cut metal tabletop and aluminum legs give the table a sense of lightness, which counters its industrial feel, creating a well-balanced and multipurpose furnishing.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Stitch Chair
product.description: Designed by Adam Goodrum for Cappellini in 2008, the Stitch Chair is a colorful statement piece that includes swatches of red, black, yellow, blue, and grey. Completely manufactured with aluminum plate, the chair is lacquered with a glossy finish for added shine. Although Stitch is a visually stimulating piece, it is a highly functional one—not only does it serve as a traditional chair, but it also features hinges that enable the chair to be folded to minimal dimensions. This makes the chair easy to transport and store when not in use. But with looks so striking, this might be one piece that you want to keep on display.

product.name: Hula Table
product.description: The Hula is an innovative piece of furniture that is crafted from natural hardwood teak that is dry joined together. The functional accent piece can be used as a table with the wide side facing upward, or as a stool or pouf with the wide side facing downward. Shaped like a soft pentagon—the edges are softened and the surfaces feature gentle slopes—the Hula has a sense of infinitude; it is not clear where the Hula begins and ends. The lack of sharp edges and the recesses between the teak pieces communicate a lightness and airiness to Hula.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Carta Bench
product.description: The elegant Carta Bench was designed by Shigeru Ban for Cappellini in 1999. Defined by its use of unconventional materials—the seating area of the bench is composed of recycled cardboard tubes—the bench presents characteristic Japanese design elements. The play of straight and curved lines is reminiscent of inverted eaves, and the cardboard tubes resemble the visual rhythm of Japanese tiled roofs. The overall effect of the bench is decidedly sculptural, but it maintains plenty of functional seating space. The combination of its sophisticated, refined design and the practicality of the materials make the Carta Bench a versatile accent piece that is at home in a formal living room or a modest hallway.

product.name: Fionia Folding Stool - Teak
product.description: Danish design company Skagerak designs indoor and outdoor furniture with a nautical inspiration. Crafted from wood, the Fionia stool is a practical accent piece that can be used as a side table or, in a pinch, an extra place to sit. The stool is constructed with hinges so it is easy to fold and transport to a new location, or put away for storage when not in use. When unfolded, Fionia is a three-dimensional X-shape that is defined by the airy recesses between the teak strips. The result is an angular piece that is sturdy, while maintaining a sense of lightness. The clean design and simplicity of the stool allow the Fionia to blend in to a variety of spaces.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: Fionia Folding Stool - Black
product.description: Danish design company Skagerak designs indoor and outdoor furniture with a nautical inspiration. Crafted from wood, the Fionia stool is a practical accent piece that can be used as a side table or, in a pinch, an extra place to sit. product.category: Home > Furniture > Home Office > Office Furniture

product.name: EM77 Vacuum Jug - Copper
product.description: Designed by Eric Magnussen for Stelton, the Vaccum Jug is used for keeping coffee hot after it’s been brewed. Keeping in Stelton’s design aesthetic, the jug has a high shine and utilizes a simple cylindrical shape. Designed with simplicity and elegance in mind, the jug is suitable for a formal occasion as well as everyday breakfasts. The innovative jug has a rocker stopper—when tipped into pouring motion, the stopper automatically opens to accommodate the flow of the coffee. When upright, the stopper closes, limiting the amount of air that enters the jug. This helps to prevent the contents from prematurely cooling, ensuring that even the longest of breakfasts will still have piping hot coffee throughout. The vacuum jug can also be used to keep beverages cold, making it a versatile kitchen accessory.

product.name: Ekke Small Tumblers - Set of 2 - Clear
product.description: If you take your drinks neat, these Ekke tumblers are designed with you in mind. The clean, simple glasses are handmade—the crystal is mouth blown at an over two-hundred-year-old glassworks factory in the Czech Republic—and hand-polished. The polishing compound is typically reserved for optical lenses, ensuring that each tumbler shines brilliantly. Although they may appear delicate, the resilient Ekke tumblers are designed to be used and are dishwasher safe. Whether whisky, gin, vodka, or seltzer is your drink of choice, this set of Ekke tumblers is a beautiful pair to set at your bar.

product.name: Ekke Small Tumblers - Set of 2 - Charcoal Grey
product.description: If you take your drinks neat, these Ekke tumblers are designed with you in mind. The clean, simple glasses are handmade—the crystal is mouth blown at an over two-hundred-year-old glassworks factory in the Czech Republic—and hand-polished. The polishing co

product.name: Director's Chair - Teak and Canvas
product.description: With its Directors Chair, Skagerak reimagines the traditional director’s chair with exquisite construction. The chair’s frame is updated from the traditional straight lines of a classic director’s chair with rounded arms that have a gentle curve to accommodate the sitter’s arms when seated. The canvas chair back and seat have enough slack that the chair flexes for comfort, but also remains sturdy and encourages good posture. With its revised form, this modern director’s chair is an attractive choice for bringing extra seating into a space. If more open space is needed, the chair effortlessly folds up for easy storage.

product.name: Riviera Teak Sunbed
product.description: The versatile Riviera is an outdoor furniture piece that can be used as a chaise lounge, bench, or low table. Adding several small cushions makes it an inviting seating place at a summer gathering, or one long cushion makes it a welcome, relaxing retreat for a sunbather. Crafted in teak, and featuring a classic fence design, the Riviera has a light, airy quality that will look beautiful on a patio or in a garden. The Riviera can expand and contract to different lengths, making it an innovative piece that can adapt to a variety of settings and scenarios.

product.name: Akiko Pentaque Bocce Game Set
product.description: A beautifully designed version of the classic lawn game, bocce, the Akiko Petanque set includes a set of six chrome bocce balls and a teak box for storing and carrying the game. The box has a hinged cover with a rectangular cut out, so the teak handle can be used when the box is closed. A collaboration between Danish designer Hans Thyge and Japanese designer Akiko Kuwahata, this set can be used to play, or can be set on a bookcase or table as a distinctive display piece.

product.name: Teak Bathroom Mat
product.description: This teak bathroom mat from Skagerak is a simple way to add warmth to a bathroom space. The gold hues and organic nature of the wood communicate nicely with existing tiling and metal fixtures. Constructed with a series of teak slats, the bathroom mat is a nice focal point for a bathroom floor. As teak is naturally highly water resistant, the mat is a better bathmat option than traditional fabric options. Although smooth, teak would has a slight natural texturing that prevents slipping when wet.

product.name: AJ Set of 6 Coasters
product.description: There is something undeniably refined about a stainless steel bar set. Whether it’s the subtle shine or the coolness of the metal, Stelton’s Cylinda-Line, designed by Arne Jacobsen, presents the essential elements for a modern bar. The series uses simple cylindrical shapes to provide a minimalist, clean continuity between the pieces. The AJ Coaster Set includes six stainless steel coasters and a holder to keep the coasters together when not in use. As a standalone item, the coaster set enhances a cocktail party or adds elegance to a coffee table. Grouped with other pieces from the Cylinda-Line? That’s a comprehensive, sophisticated modern bar.

product.name: AJ Martini Mixer with Spoon
product.description: There is something undeniably refined about a stainless steel bar set. Whether it’s the subtle shine or the coolness of the metal, Stelton’s Cylinda-Line, designed by Arne Jacobsen, presents the essential elements for a modern bar. The series uses simple cylindrical shapes to provide a minimalist, clean continuity between the pieces. The AJ Martini Mixer with Spoon is the ideal accessory to create the ultimate stirred martini. The sleek stainless steel piece includes a mixer spoon—also in stainless steel—and features a sturdy tab handle and pour spout to assist with a perfect pour. The result? Precisely mixed and poured martinis, every time. As a standalone piece, the martini mixer enhances a cocktail party. Grouped with other pieces from the Cylinda-Line? That’s a comprehensive, sophisticated modern bar.

product.name: AJ Ice Bucket
product.description: There is something undeniably refined about a stainless steel bar set. Whether it’s the subtle shine or the coolness of the metal, Stelton’s Cylinda-Line, designed by Arne Jacobsen, presents the essential elements for a modern bar. The series uses simple cylindrical shapes to provide a minimalist, clean continuity between the pieces. The AJ Ice Bucket pairs a simple, timeless aesthetic with functionality. The handles, also in stainless steel, mirror the bold circumference of the bucket, making the piece feel balanced and solid. As a standalone piece, the ice bucket enhances a cocktail or dinner party. Grouped with other pieces from the Cylinda-Line? That’s a comprehensive, sophisticated modern bar.

product.name: EM Water Filter Jug - Smoke
product.description: The EM Water Filter Jug from Stelton was designed by Eric Magnussen in 2012, and recalls the shape of his earlier vacuum jug—a jug used for keeping hot beverages hot, and cold beverages cold. This updated model is designed to produce filtered water. The jug contains a filter at its top, and an open pitcher below. When tap water is poured into the jug, the filter separates impurities from the water, and only the cleanest water makes it into the vessel below. A more environmentally friendly option than plastic water bottles, the EM Water Filter Jug is an attractive way to get clean, delicious water each day.

product.name: AJ Serving Tray
product.description: There is something undeniably refined about a stainless steel bar set. Whether it’s the subtle shine or the coolness of the metal, Stelton’s Cylinda-Line, designed by Arne Jacobsen, presents the essential elements for a modern bar. The series uses simple cylindrical shapes to provide a minimalist, clean continuity between the pieces. The AJ Serving Tray features two side handles for easy carrying, and is an attractive way to serve cocktails to guests, or to place hors d’oeuvres on a coffee table. As a standalone item, the tray adds elegance to a cocktail party. Grouped with other pieces from the Cylinda-Line? That’s a comprehensive, sophisticated modern bar.

product.name: Whisky Stones - Whisky Lover Set
product.description: Designed for those who battle the fight between the need for a chilled drink and the watery inevitability of ice, Whisky Stones are designed to soothe your spirits, without watering down your favorite flavor. The Whisky Lover Set from Teroforma includes two beautiful, mouth blown crystal Avva tumblers and six whisky stones, stored in a muslin bag. Crafted from soapstone, Whisky Stones are ideal temperature regulators—they keep your liquor chilled without altering its flavor or purity. Instead of having your whisky neat, you can have it on the (literal) rocks.

product.name: Ekke Sake Set - Carafe + 4 Cups
product.description: With the Ekke Sake set, sushi night is taken to a sophisticated, sculptural new level. Made of handcrafted soapstone in India, the set includes a carafe and four cups, all polished to a sleek finish. Soapstone, as a natural temperature regulator, is an ideal material for serving sake, whether you prefer yours chilled or served warm. The smooth finish of the set is met with hand-etched lines that provide a lovely visual distinction, while also creating a gripping surface to prevent slipping—ideal for later rounds of sake servings.

product.name: Slate Cheese Board - Single Plating
product.description: This cheeseboard from Brooklyn Slate is a one-of-a-kind serving platter that is locally sourced from co-founder Kristy Hadeka’s family quarry in upstate New York. Each slate is hand-selected before being carefully sized and shaped by Hadeka and co-founder Sean Tice. In order to be sized and shaped, each slate is chipped by hand, ensuring that no two cheeseboards are exactly the same. Each board also includes a piece of soapstone chalk so you can write which kind of cheeses, smoked meats, or other kinds of hors d’oeuvres are being served. This smooth slate cheeseboard presents a balance between elegant and natural, and makes an excellent host or hostess gift.

product.name: Ichiro Iwasaki Cup Table - Amber
product.description: Designed by Ichiro Iwasaki for Discipline, the Cup Table is made of mouth blown glass and has a subtle, flared shape that is reminiscent of a drinking glass. The small tabletop is the perfect place for a stack of books or magazines, or as a place to set a decorative tray. When not in use, the Cup Table provides a pop of color to a living room or den, and the glass can also provide a nice disruption from more expected materials, like fabrics and wood. The versatile table can also be flipped and set on its tabletop, which reveals an open body that can be used as a vase or as a vessel for pillows, blankets, or other household items.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Ichiro Iwasaki Cup Table - Lilac
product.description: Designed by Ichiro Iwasaki for Discipline, the Cup Table is made of mouth blown glass and has a subtle, flared shape that is reminiscent of a drinking glass. The small tabletop is the perfect place for a stack of books or magazines, or as a place to set a decorative tray. When not in use, the Cup Table provides a pop of color to a living room or den, and the glass can also provide a nice disruption from more expected materials, like fabrics and wood. The versatile table can also be flipped and set on its tabletop, which reveals an open body that can be used as a vase or as a vessel for pillows, blankets, or other household items.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Roule Tray - Copper
product.description: Designed by Pauline Deltour for Discipline, the Roulé tray is inspired by classic copper pots used in jam making. Carrying through with this inspiration, the tray features an exaggeratedly large rolled edge that is not only an aesthetic choice, but also a practical one—the edge facilitates handling and stacking with other Roulé trays. Made from copper or brass, this tray has a distinctive shine that has a mirror-like effect on the objects it holds. The classic shape of the Roulé tray recalls traditional and simple serving trays, but the luxe materials give the tray a refined elegance that will add sophistication to a cocktail party or dress up a side table arrangement.

product.name: Roule Tray - Brass
product.description: Designed by Pauline Deltour for Discipline, the Roulé tray is inspired by classic copper pots used in jam making. Carrying through with this inspiration, the tray features an exaggeratedly large rolled edge that is not only an aesthetic choice, but also a practical one—the edge facilitates handling and stacking with other Roulé trays. Made from copper or brass, this tray has a distinctive shine that has a mirror-like effect on the objects it holds. The classic shape of the Roulé tray recalls traditional and simple serving trays, but the luxe materials give the tray a refined elegance that will add sophistication to a cocktail party or dress up a side table arrangement.

product.name: Re-Turned Kiwi Wood Figurine
product.description: Instead of simply discarding leftover wood scraps, Lars Beller decided to “re-turn” the scraps into new, repurposed items with his series of birds. Each re-turned bird is handmade and 100 percent recycled. Composed of rounded shapes, the birds feature natural wood finishes—the wood grain gives texture and depth to the sculptures, while maintaining its smooth surface. Also available in owl and penguin, each bird works as a standalone accent on a bookshelf, desk, or even a nursery shelf. Grouped together, the re-turned birds provide a more pronounced statement that has a decidedly natural feel.

product.name: Re-Turned Owl Wood Figurine
product.description: Instead of simply discarding leftover wood scraps, Lars Beller decided to “re-turn” the scraps into new, repurposed items with his series of birds. product.name: 4 Slat Adirondack Chair - Grey
product.description: Loll Designs creates versatile furniture “for the modern lollygagger.” Each piece is designed to be used outdoors and is weather resistant, so there’s no need to crowd the garage in case of rain or snow. Simply and thoughtfully designed, each piece can also be used in an indoor space, making Loll’s collection adaptable to a variety of settings, from patio to dining room. The chair that started it all—this 4 Slat Adirondack—is a comfortable seat, even without a cushion. The contoured back and base are welcoming to bodies that need to rest and relax. Made of a durable, washable, and recycled material, this chair is perfect for a yard or patio, or even an indoor sunroom. The chair includes a built-in bottle opener under the right arm, so it’s advisable to pull a cooler up beside you, and, if you don’t want to, never get up.

product.name: Adirondack Rocker - Grey
product.description: Loll Designs creates versatile furniture “for the modern lollygagger.” Each piece is designed to be used outdoors and is weather resistant, so there’s no need to crowd the garage in case of rain or snow. Simply and thoughtfully designed, each piece can also be used in an indoor space, making Loll’s collection adaptable to a variety of settings, from patio to dining room. Renowned for its four-slat Adirondack chair, Loll developed this Adirondack Rocker in a similar style—that rocks. Made of a durable, washable, and recycled material, this chair is perfect for a front porch, or even a cozy reading nook indoors. The rocker includes a built-in bottle opener under the right arm, so it’s advisable to pull a cooler up beside you, and, if you don’t want to, never get up.

The rocker includes a built-in bottle opener under the right arm, so it’s advisable to pull a cooler up beside you, and, if you don’t want to, never get up.

product.name: Ombre Throw - Orange Sunset
product.description: The Avoca Mohair Ombre throw is a more than just a throw blanket. Steeped in the tradition of the nearly 300-year-old Irish company, this throw is an iconic design that is both lightweight and warm. The throw is perfect to wrap yourself in with a cup of tea or a good book and is so cozy, it might be difficult to resist snuggling at all times. The lovely ombre moves from vibrant to deeply saturated color, and provides a bold, but light and airy accent when draped on the back of a sofa or armchair.

product.name: Ombre Throw - Purple Heather
product.description: The Avoca Mohair Ombre throw is a more than just a throw blanket. Steeped in the tradition of the nearly 300-year-old Irish company, this throw is an iconic design that is both lightweight and warm. The throw is perfect to wrap yourself in with a cup of tea or a good book and is so cozy, it might be difficult to resist snuggling at all times. product.name: Cincinnati Union Terminal Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of the Cincinnati Union Terminal, Chisel & Mouse captures the art deco railroad station, complete with its semi-dome and use of straight lines and geometric shapes. Chisel & Mouse enhanced its sculpture by including etched brass accents for the windowpanes and clock on the terminal’s façade.

product.name: Columbia Heights Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. Inspired by the row of Italianate brownstones in Columbia Heights, Brooklyn, New York, this sculpture captures the classic brownstone aesthetic, complete with the prominent door and its façade moldings and details. The plaster sculpture is enhanced with window frames and a door made of etched brass.

product.name: Empire State Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In this sculpture, Chisel & Mouse captures the Fifth Avenue entrance of the Empire State Building. The façade is representative of the building’s art deco style, which is pronounced in the geometric triptych of windows in the middle of the sculpture. The plaster sculpture is enhanced with window frames made of etched nickel silver.

product.name: Flatiron Building Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of the Flatiron Building in New York City, Chisel & Mouse captures the entire building, so it can be viewed from each of its angles. The building, which was completed in 1902 at the intersection of Broadway and Fifth Avenue, was said to resemble a ship sailing up the avenue. Its distinctive shape make the building instantly recognizable.

product.name: Greyhound Terminal Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of the Greyhound Bus Terminal in Washington, D.C., Chisel & Mouse captures the perfect symmetry of the building’s façade. The art deco building features vertical and horizontal straight lines, as well as rounded corners, which gives it a softer look. The plaster sculpture is enhanced with door and window accents that are made of etched nickel silver.

product.name: Guggenheim Museum Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of New York City’s Guggenheim Museum, Chisel & Mouse captures the striking exterior that faces Central Park. Designed by Frank Lloyd Wright, the Guggenheim Museum features a large, spiraled rotunda structure and other angular and rounded forms. The sculpture includes intensive detailing of the museum’s roofs and façades.

product.name: Lescaze House Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of the Lescaze House in Manhattan, Chisel & Mouse captures New York’s first modernist house. The sculpture features the front façade, which includes detailed geometric designs and a recessed staircase. The plaster sculpture is enhanced with metal accents that define the doors and window frames.

product.name: Monadnock Building Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of the Monadnock Building in Chicago, Chisel & Mouse captures the north side façade of the building, which was designed by Burnham & Root in 1891. The sculpture features the flared base and top of the skyscraper, as well as its iconic bay windows. The plaster sculpture is enhanced by brass accents at the front base of the building.

product.name: News Building Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. In its rendering of the News Building—also known as the Daily News Building—Chisel & Mouse captures the 42nd Street façade of the art deco skyscraper. The sculpture features the intricate carvings on the front of the building, as well as its iconic signage. The plaster sculpture is enhanced with etched brass window frames and doors.

product.name: Postcard Row Architectural Sculpture
product.description: Brothers Robert and Gavin Paisley founded Chisel & Mouse to channel their passion for architecture by creating sculptures of iconic buildings. Each piece is made with plaster, which gives the sculpture weightiness and presence, as well as a cool, smooth finish. Chisel & Mouse combines traditional sculpting, molding, and casting with CAD and 3D printing to create each of its designs. Inspired by the houses on Steiner Street in San Francisco, this Postcard Row house depicts the façade of a classic Victorian house, commonly seen in postcards of San Francisco. The sculpture includes intricate molding details and etched brass details on the door and window frames.

product.name: Geneva Model S Wireless Sound System - White
product.description: The Model S system from Geneva is a small audio system with high-end stereo sound. The simply yet sophisticatedly designed system features wireless capability, enabling any Bluetooth-enabled device—from iPhones to tablets to laptops—to stream music with clear, exceptional sound. Although sized for a tabletop, the Model S offers full-sized high fidelity and a wide frequency range. The Model S is easy to operate, and features sleek, lacquered sides that give off a modern, yet timeless quality. With its small footprint and clean design, the Model S is a perfect addition to a coffee table, nightstand, or kitchen counter.

product.name: Geneva WorldRadio - Black
product.description: With throwback looks and simple features, the WorldRadio from Geneva has a retro-inspired appearance that is met with necessary modern advances. A contemporary version of the traditional world receiver, the WorldRadio can broadcast all radio stations, including those not found on FM and digital radio. By using the WorldRadio’s built-in wireless Bluetooth receiver and a compatible device—an iPhone or tablet, for example—the radio can broadcast all available Internet stations, greatly increasing the quantity of available programs. This modern radio has a high-performance audio system and features a digital color display with touch controls for easy use.

product.name: Soft-Map City Quilt - New York City
product.description: Brooklyn-based Haptic Lab designs intricate quilts of celebrated cities. Each quilt is made using 100 percent superfine cotton, ensuring a pleasant and soft tactile experience. From afar, the ivory quilt appears uniform, but upon closer look, the cotton quilt is interrupted by warm brown stitching, creating an elaborate and organized reproduction of your favorite city. Hand-stitched, the quit reveals detailed neighborhoods, from New York City’s Battery Park to Los Angeles’ Studio City. Haptic Lab’s quilts are a celebration of urban planning, revealing the elegant design of each city in a softer, pared down style.

product.name: Great Lakes Quilt
product.description: Brooklyn-based Haptic Lab designs intricate quilts of celebrated places. Each quilt is made using 100 percent natural cotton, ensuring a pleasant and soft tactile experience. The Great Lakes quilt is cast in a brilliant navy, featuring light blue poly-silk hand-appliqued lakes. In addition to the carefully designed lakes, the quilt also includes hand-stitched details, including the names of prominent cities in red thread and hills in light blue. The quilt is designed to be used as a throw blanket, but will also work as a distinctive wall-hanging for a Midwest enthusiast.

product.name: Triangle Dinner Bell
product.description: Designed by Pat Kim in his Brooklyn studio, the Triangle Dinner Bell is the perfect way to round up the troops for dinner, or delicately interrupt a marathon of video game-playing. Reminiscent of traditional, rustic triangles, it is crafted from hand-bent hot-rolled steel, and includes a solid brass striker and an English Bridle leather loop for hanging and holding. The pleasant sounding instrument is a gentle way to get people’s attention, and it also looks beautiful as a decorative accent on a kitchen or dining room wall.

product.name: Eames House Blocks
product.description: Although the real Eames House—number eight in the series of Case Study Houses—sits high atop the Pacific Palisades, this block set brings the iconic modernist house and studio to your own living room or children’s playroom. The set of 36 alphabet bocks forms an educational puzzle of the monument, but also showcases letters, numbers, and symbols from the Eames Century Modern collection—the blocks can also be used to stack, spell, and count. The set features carefully matched colors that required 29 separate hand-pulled print passes to create, and is made of replenishable Michigan-grown basswood. Whether the blocks are used as a display in an office or for play in a child’s room, the Eames House Blocks are a thoughtful tribute to Case Study House #8.

product.name: Falcon Enamalware Mug - White/Blue
product.description: Falcon’s iconic enamelware has been a staple brand for British home items since it’s opening nearly one hundred years ago. Enamelware is porcelain fused onto heavy-gauge steel, which makes it durable, smooth, and resistant to the effects of chemicals. Safe in temperatures of up to 530 degree fahrenheit, Falcon’s enamelware does not burn, and is resilient enough to be used in the dishwasher. This classic Falcon mug is safe for even your hottest cups of coffee and cocoa. Although it is extremely durable, the mug is not bulky. The expertly crafted enamelware is thin, and the simple handle appears delicate, while remaining stable and strong.

product.name: Falcon Enamelware Prep Set
product.description: Falcon’s iconic enamelware has been a staple brand for British home items since it’s opening nearly one hundred years ago. Enamelware is porcelain fused onto heavy-gauge steel, which makes it durable, smooth, and resistant to the effects of chemicals. Safe in temperatures of up to 530 degree Fahrenheit, Falcon’s enamelware does not burn, and is resilient enough to be used in the dishwasher. This Prep Set from Falcon is a baker’s dream. The six-piece set includes a colander and five mixing bowls, perfect for separating flour, sugar, and other ingredients. The durable bowls are also an attractive option for popcorn and chips. When not in use, the bowls stack together for easy storage.
product.category: Home > Tabletop & Kitchen > Kitchen Accessories > Cookware

product.name: Falcon Enamelware Plate Set
product.description: Falcon’s iconic enamelware has been a staple brand for British home items since it’s opening nearly one hundred years ago. Enamelware is porcelain fused onto heavy-gauge steel, which makes it durable, smooth, and resistant to the effects of chemicals. Safe in temperatures of up to 530 degree fahrenheit, Falcon’s enamelware does not burn, and is resilient enough to be used in the dishwasher. This plate set is an excellent addition to the cupboard. The four-piece set contains four durable dinner plates that feature Falcon’s signature white enamel and colored rim design. When not in use, the plates stack nicely for easy storage.

product.name: Crosscut Coat Hooks - Rust
product.description: Designed by Faudet-Harrison for SCP, the Crosscut Coat Hooks are a simple and stylish means for hanging coats, hats, scarves, and other accessories. Made from a single piece of laser-cut rectangular steel and five cylindrical oak hooks, the wall-mounted rack can be used in an entryway, bedroom, or even a kitchen space as a quick way to eliminate clutter. The design sits flush on the wall for a seamless finish, and the upward facing hooks ensure that items will not easily slip off. These hooks can be used on their own, or with other Crosscut Hooks for more substantial wall storage.

product.name: Crosscut Coat Hooks - Cream
product.description: Designed by Faudet-Harrison for SCP, the Crosscut Coat Hooks are a simple and stylish means for hanging coats, hats, scarves, and other accessories. Made from a single piece of laser-cut rectangular steel and five cylindrical oak hooks, the wall-mounted rack can be used in an entryway, bedroom, or even a kitchen space as a quick way to eliminate clutter. The design sits flush on the wall for a seamless finish, and the upward facing hooks ensure that items will not easily slip off. These hooks can be used on their own, or with other Crosscut Hooks for more substantial wall storage.

product.name: Crosscut Trestle Table - Rust
product.description: Designed by Faudet-Harrison for SCP, the Crosscut Trestles are a minimal design comprised of two laser-cut rectangular steel pieces and six cylindrical oak legs. The legs fit nearly into the three crosscuts in each steel piece—the two legs on either edge of the steel face outward, and the center leg faces inward. This creates a sturdy, yet simple support structure for a tabletop. Each piece of steel has three cork pads on the top of the legs to secure a tabletop into place. The spare design provides a light, clean aesthetic, while the solid construction creates robust stability. When not in use, the trestles are easily stored away.

product.name: Crosscut Trestle Table - Cream
product.description: Designed by Faudet-Harrison for SCP, the Crosscut Trestles are a minimal design comprised of two laser-cut rectangular steel pieces and six cylindrical oak legs. The legs fit nearly into the three crosscuts in each steel piece—the two legs on either edge of the steel face outward, and the center leg faces inward. This creates a sturdy, yet simple support structure for a tabletop. Each piece of steel has three cork pads on the top of the legs to secure a tabletop into place. The spare design provides a light, clean aesthetic, while the solid construction creates robust stability. When not in use, the trestles are easily stored away.

product.name: Jules Mirror
product.description: Designed by Andrea Stemmer for SCP, the Jules Mirror is an unframed, rectangular portrait mirror that works well in an entryway or above a bureau or vanity. The mirror features a solid oak storage shelf at its base, which can be used to hold knickknacks, makeup, keys, or favorite photographs and postcards. The shelf is made from a single piece of wood and is shaped like a half pipe, which counters the rigid straight lines of the mirror with a warm curvature. The result is a simple and sophisticated mirror that provides practical storage that does not overcomplicate the design. The frameless mirror is a versatile accent for modern interiors.

product.name: W Molded Ply Magazine Stand - Oak
product.description: The W Molded Magazine Stand by Offi is a desk or tabletop organizer that can store magazines, files, paperwork, and other items that need corralling. Designed in the shape of a W, the stand has two compartments so it is easy to divide past and current magazine issues, or even paid and unpaid bills. The stand is crafted from molded plywood and includes a handle to make it easy to transport. The curved lines and natural wood grain of the stand create an organic feel that will be a welcome addition to an office space.

product.name: Rhombins Desktop Organizer - Set of 3
product.description: AMAC’s Rhombin set is an attractive way to organize your desk space while making a graphic statement. Offering modular storage for desktop items like pens and pencils, paperclips, and tape, this set of three Rhombins can be arranged in different configurations to suit your space. Arranged in a cluster, line, or stacked, the Rhombins enable you to create your own distinct look for your desktop. These containers can also be used as small planters for succulents, or can be used to create a windowsill herb garden. Made using Cereplast, a plant-based bio-plastic, the Rhombins are an environmentally friendly storage solution. This Rhombins Desktop Organizer is sold exclusively at the Dwell Store.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Storage & Organization > Office & Desk Accessories

product.name: Acrylic Slot Table
product.description: Designed in 2012, the Slot Table is AMAC’s first venture into furniture. Resembling the classic M Series boxes by AMAC, the acrylic side table is transparent, which creates a sense of lightness in the boxy table. The smoky gray color is neutral, so it blends well into existing decors, while the table’s material provides a shine that makes it a striking visual element. The slot in the table provides a distinctive way to store and display reading materials, whether it’s an assortment of magazines or a selection of favorite books. The table can be rested with the slot facing upward or to the side, depending on the way you want to organize your items.
product.category: Home > Furniture > Living & Family Room > Coffee Tables & Side Tables

product.name: Bright Side Light - In The Right Light
product.description: Designed for Artecnica by Rich Brilliant Willing Studio, the Bright Side Light series is a collection of pendants designed to promote a message of optimism through their construction and function. Each cast glass pendant is durable, recyclable, and made directly from virtual models. Although intuitively pendant lamps, the Bright Side Lights can be rested on a tabletop to create a distinctive, unexpected table lamp. The In The Right Light lamp has a clear shade that has an etched interior. Debossed with the message, “In The Right Light,” this pendant is a positive way to illuminate your space.

product.name: Bright Side Light - Light Without Darkness
product.description: Designed for Artecnica by Rich Brilliant Willing Studio, the Bright Side Light series is a collection of pendants designed to promote a message of optimism through their construction and function. Each cast glass pendant is durable, recyclable, and made directly from virtual models. Although intuitively pendant lamps, the Bright Side Lights can be rested on a tabletop to create a distinctive, unexpected table lamp. The Light Without Darkness lamp has a clear shade with glass-sculpted prongs around the socket. Debossed with the message, “Light Without Darkness,” this pendant is a positive way to illuminate your space.

product.name: Bright Side Light - Bright Side Of Life
product.description: Designed for Artecnica by Rich Brilliant Willing Studio, the Bright Side Light series is a collection of pendants designed to promote a message of optimism through their construction and function. Each cast glass pendant is durable, recyclable, and made directly from virtual models. Although intuitively pendant lamps, the Bright Side Lights can be rested on a tabletop to create a distinctive, unexpected table lamp. The Bright Side Of Life lamp has a clear shade that is half surrounded in ridges, and half smooth glass. Debossed with the message, “Bright Side Of Life,” this pendant is a positive way to illuminate your space.

product.name: Artecnica Globe
product.description: Known for realizing imaginative concepts and using modern materials, designer Tord Boontje designed the enchanting Tangle Globe for Artecnica. The pendant is comprised of a clear sphere and an exposed light bulb that is encased in an interior glass funnel within the globe. The result is a fixture that feels remarkably light and open, while capturing and displaying direct light. When not illuminated, the transparent fixture blends into surrounding décor, while maintaining a subtle sculptural presence. As the light bulb is protected within the glass, other materials, like metal beads or a garland, can be added to the globe, making it into a one-of-a-kind, artful statement piece that is perfect for illuminating a formal dining room.

product.name: Soma Water Filter
product.description: The artfully designed Soma water purifying system is an innovative product that reaches beyond the limits of other purifying systems. The all-natural Soma filters are made from coconut shells, silk, and a plant-based casing. These biodegradable filters decompose naturally in commercial composting filters, which greatly limits the amount of waste produced. Instead of filtering into a plastic pitcher, Soma uses a handcrafted glass carafe that produces clean and crisp tasting water. Featuring an hourglass shape that is both attractive and functional—it makes pouring effortless—the Soma carafe is an elegant, smart design that is welcome wherever water is needed, from a formal dinner party to a lazy weekend breakfast.

product.name: Aura Light - Brass - 15"
product.description: Intending to take light to an elemental place, the Aura Light from Ladies & Gentlemen Studio features two simple, primary elements: the light source—the bulb—and the illumination, which is highlighted by a brass ring. The result is a simple but sophisticated fixture that can be used as a singular suspended piece, or can be grouped with other Aura Lights for a more dramatic, installation-like effect. When the Aura Light is turned off, the minimalist pendant looks delicate and spare; it does not interrupt its environment. When it is illuminated, the aptly named Aura Light produces a lovely, halo-like diffusion of light, enhanced by its brass ring.

product.name: Aura Light - Copper - 15"
product.description: Intending to take light to an elemental place, the Aura Light from Ladies & Gentlemen Studio features two simple, primary elements: the light source—the bulb—and the illumination, which is highlighted by a brass ring. The result is a simple but sophisticated fixture that can be used as a singular suspended piece, or can be grouped with other Aura Lights for a more dramatic, installation-like effect. When the Aura Light is turned off, the minimalist pendant looks delicate and spare; it does not interrupt its environment. When it is illuminated, the aptly named Aura Light produces a lovely, halo-like diffusion of light, enhanced by its brass ring.

product.name: Cylinder Shaker Set - Brass
product.description: A modern take on a classic tabletop accessory, the Cylinder Shaker Set from Ladies & Gentlemen Studio is a must-have for contemporary tables. Crafted in brass or copper, the shakers are finished with a vigorous polish and a protective coating to not only give off a lustrous shine, but also maintain it over time. The sleek metallic cylinders are fit with black and white food-safe plastic cores that make it easy to identify the salt from the pepper. Each shaker is outfitted with a cork stopper plug for easy refilling.

product.name: Cylinder Shaker Set - Copper
product.description: A modern take on a classic tabletop accessory, the Cylinder Shaker Set from Ladies & Gentlemen Studio is a must-have for contemporary tables. Crafted in brass or copper, the shakers are finished with a vigorous polish and a protective coating to not only give off a lustrous shine, but also maintain it over time. The sleek metallic cylinders are fit with black and white food-safe plastic cores that make it easy to identify the salt from the pepper. Each shaker is outfitted with a cork stopper plug for easy refilling.

product.name: Wyzer Wall Clock
product.description: With its Wyzer Wall Clock, Leff breaks the mold of traditional wall clocks by creating prominent hour and minute hands and eliminating a standard clock face. Lacking a frame and numbers altogether, the Wyzer clock instead utilizes the wall on which it is mounted as its background, which can create a small clock when centered between other wall hangings or windows, or a large, expansive clock when placed on an empty, uninterrupted wall. The effect of the Wyzer clock is artful—it feels like a sculpture that changes as the day progresses, and it creates a lasting and distinctive impact.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Hazy Wall Clock
product.description: While he was designing the Hazy Wall Clock, Ivan Kasner was inspired by blurred images. For Kasner, the images created a sense of excitement, imagination, and—despite their blurred nature—a sense of clarity. The clock features an opaque face, which recalls the experience of looking through fogged or frosted glass. As a result of the face’s opacity, the hour and minute hands are visible but slightly distorted. They appear fuzzy to the eye, causing the clock’s viewer to pause at the sight of the time. The result of the illusion is a timepiece with a dreamy and floating quality, making the Hazy clock a distinctive accent.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks

product.name: Felt Wall Clock
product.description: Designed by Sebastian Herkner for Leff, the Felt Wall Clock uses an unexpected material for a original look and feel. Created from 60 percent recycled PET felt, the clock’s face has a neutral, subtle presence that is paired with a soft texture, reminiscent of wool or other woven fabrics. In addition to the use of felt as an aesthetic choice, Herkner also used the material because of its recyclable nature, its sound dampening properties, and the ability to create a clock with single-step production. The contrasting hour and minute hands offer a decidedly modern element to the clock, making it a distinctive timepiece, without being disruptive to contemporary interiors.
product.category: Home > Decor & Accessories > Wall Decor > Clocks
